1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo na pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sA ga ra ma ti pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
1b2(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
1b3(mdo sde): po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
1b4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
2a1(mdo sde): 'das rgyal po'i khab/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/
2a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/ spyod pa chen po'i rgyu mthun pa/
2a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas bstan
2a4(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi ye
2a5(mdo sde): shes la 'jug pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pas 'jug pa/ kun nas ma smad pa /
2b1(mdo sde): ye shes kyis rnam par spyad pa de la ma chags par rtogs pas 'jug pa/ bskal pa mu med par mngon par bstod pa/ yon tan gyi
2b2(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni/ mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
2b3(mdo sde): dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni/ mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni/ mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang
2b4(mdo sde): ni| brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni/ legs par mkhyen/ dbang po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ brnyes/ bag
2b5(mdo sde): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni/ mkhas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni/ rgyun ma chad cing / dge
2b6(mdo sde): slong 'bum phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang chang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa thams
3a1(mdo sde): cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras/
3a2(mdo sde): chos zab mo la gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyis nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin gnas chen por gyur
3a3(mdo sde): pa| de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la
3a5(mdo sde): zhugs pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs
3a6(mdo sde): mi zad pa'i za ma tog rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba la dbang thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i so so
3b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa rjes su thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhun gyis grub pas nges par byung ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhag pa'i bsam
3b2(mdo sde): pa la shin tu gnas pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ dpag tu med pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3b3(mdo sde): chen po mdzod mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs
3b4(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3b5(mdo sde): po brtson 'grus gong na med ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus blo gros zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3b6(mdo sde): blo gros rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa med pa'i mi 'jigs pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po don nges par brtags te lta ba zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis
4a1(mdo sde): mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ dpag tu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
4a2(mdo sde): 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
4a3(mdo sde): cad yongs su 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas rnam par gdon
4a4(mdo sde): mi za ba la 'jug pa'i sgo/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'bab pas 'jug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa ston pa/ theg pa thams cad mnyam pa
4a5(mdo sde): nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med de tshul gcig pa rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po'i tshul la 'jug
4a6(mdo sde): pa ston pa/ snying po dang ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ tshul bzhin du chos kyi tshul la 'bab cing 'jug
4a7(mdo sde): pa| nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ kun tu bsngo ba'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams
4b1(mdo sde): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par gdon mi za ba ston pa/ mi rtog cing rnam par
4b2(mdo sde): mi rtog ste/ mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par byed pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po gsog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /
4b3(mdo sde): gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas
4b4(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang sems rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir
4b5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
4b6(mdo sde): brjod pa'i phyir gsung ngo / /ston to/ /rab tu 'chad do/ /'dzin du 'jug go /klog tu 'jug go /shes par mdzad do/ /rnam par shes par mdzad do/ /rab tu shes par mdzad
4b7(mdo sde): do| |rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /rnam par 'grel to/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don shin tu rnam
5a1(mdo sde): g ar nges pa 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi
5a2(mdo sde): s tong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu sa'i steng nas bzung ba yan chad rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi la thug pa'i bar chu sa yongs su gang ba'i rgya
5a3(mdo sde): mtsho gcig ltar kun tu snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sreg pa'i bskal pa 'das nas chags pa 'byung ba'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
5a4(mdo sde): thams cad chus yongs su gang bar 'gyur te/ chu'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su 'khor ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
5a5(mdo sde): cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas par kun tu snang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
5a6(mdo sde): rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la'ang sgrib pa med par kun tu snang ngo / /dzam+bu'i gling rnams dang / gling bzhi pa chen po
5a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang / ri rab rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la'ang sngon ji ltar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrib pa ci'ang med par
5b1(mdo sde): de kho na bzhin du kun tu snang ngo / /chu'i phung po de las kyang pad+ma chu ba ni/ bai DUR+ya/ sdong bu ni/ an+da rdo'i snying po las grub pa/ mu tig gi dra bas ni/ khebs par snying po/ /snying po ni/
5b2(mdo sde): rdo'i snying po las grub pa/ mu tig gi dra bas ni/ khebs par byas pa/ 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ni/ ldan pa/ tshad ni/ rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa
5b3(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po byung ste/ de dag rin po che'i bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi las thal nas shing ta la srid du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i
5b4(mdo sde): 'khor de'ang de'i tshe pad+ma la 'khod par kun tu snang ngo / /pad+ma de dag las kyang 'od gang dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos
5b5(mdo sde): khyab par gyur pa'i 'od de lta bu dag byung ngo / /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas ji ltar snga ltas 'di dag kun tu snang ba las na/ kye ma'o 'di ni/
5b6(mdo sde): chos bstan pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas cho 'phrul chen po de mthong nas pad+ma'i
5b7(mdo sde): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
6a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chab kyis yongs su gtams
6a2(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur kun tu gda' ba dang / pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig mngon par byung ba 'di dag dang / bcom ldan 'das/ sngon ma mthong ma thos
6a3(mdo sde): pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen po 'di dag kun tu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6a4(mdo sde): chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
6a5(mdo sde): r dul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin
6a6(mdo sde): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba
6a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
6b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang lhan cig tu nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos bstan pa 'di las gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig
6b2(mdo sde): dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ de'i snga ltas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
6b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho thag ring po de srid cig na mchis shing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
6b4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ khyod ji ltar nga'i mdun na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'ang 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'dug cing chos kyi
6b5(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di nyan to/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis ji ltar nga dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos kyang nga dang /
6b6(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma'o ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i
6b7(mdo sde): ye shes kyi stobs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'di ltar thag ring po de srid na mchis kyang mig gis gzugs mthong ba la sgrib pa ma mchis shing rna bas sgra thos pa la sgrib pa ma
7a1(mdo sde): mchis pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos
7a2(mdo sde): nas su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha'i bu nyi khri bzhi stong gis bla na med
7a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
7a4(mdo sde): b grang ba las 'das pa dag gis kun nas bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags
7a5(mdo sde): pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das des gnang ste/ sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / mngon par
7a6(mdo sde): 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems gcig gis thob pa'i dran pas mig phye ba tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che'i dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa
7a7(mdo sde): bkod pas brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi las thal nas shing ta la bdun
7b1(mdo sde): tsam du mngon par 'phags te pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug par kun tu snang ngo / /de las gzhan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po rnams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'khod
7b2(mdo sde): par kun tu snang ngo / /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
7b3(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang
7b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma la 'khod pa dag gis rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams shin tu rgyas pas mdzes te/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas thams
7b5(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba thob nas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag btsal to/ /de nas
7b6(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa na yod pa'i me tog
7b7(mdo sde): mya ngan med cing yid du 'ong ba/ mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ tshad rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
8a1(mdo sde): la mchod par 'os pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas rnam par dag pa/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sbyangs pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ mig tu sdug pa/
8a2(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa/ kun nas 'od dang ldan pa/ kun nas shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i dri dang ldan pa'i me tog de 'dra ba dag mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bcom ldan
8a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ me tog gi char des rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyi me tog dgram pa
8a4(mdo sde): bkram par gyur to/ /rab tu dben pa'i bsam gtan gyi zas zhes bya ba'i sil snyan yang bsgrags te/ sil snyan gyi sgra des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bsam gtan
8a5(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du bdag bde bas tshim par shes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la mchod
8a6(mdo sde): p a 'di lta bu 'di byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug
8a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags
8b1(mdo sde): pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to/ /byang
8b2(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas slar rang rang gi stan la
8b3(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba mya ngan med pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po na gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug
8b4(mdo sde): pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bu'ang mthong / pad+ma rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
8b5(mdo sde): phrag stong mngon par byung ba'ang mthong / rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khams byang chub sems dpas gang ba'ang mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sreg
8b6(mdo sde): pa'i bskal pa ni/ ma byung na/ chus 'jig pa 'di byung ste/ 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul 'di dag kun tu snang ba 'di la rgyu ci yod bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ bcom
8b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos chen po 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags zhes zhu'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa
9a1(mdo sde): changs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rin po
9a2(mdo sde): che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stong gi bar snang la 'dug ste lus btud thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag btsal to/ /de
9a3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ci lags/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
9a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di chab kyis yongs su gtams pa'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur kun tu gda' ba dang / pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig byung ba 'di dang / de
9a5(mdo sde): dag la'ang skyes bu dam pa dag mchis pa 'di lta bu kun tu gda' yang bcom ldan 'das/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grong dang / grong khyer dang /
9a6(mdo sde): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la'ang sgrib pa ma mchis par kun tu gda' ba dang / dzam+bu'i gling rnams dang / gling bzhi pa chen po
9a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / rgya mtsho rnams dang / ri rab rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la'ang sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrib pa ci'ang ma mchis par de kho
9b1(mdo sde): na bzhin du kun tu gda' ba de la bcom ldan 'das/ 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur snyam du bdag ngo mtshar cher gyur na/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol
9b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa/ 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog
9b3(mdo sde): m nga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa
9b4(mdo sde): b kod pas brgyan pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang lhan cig tu nga
9b5(mdo sde): la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig yongs su dri ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams
9b6(mdo sde): mi mjed 'dir 'ong ba yin te/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chus yongs su gang bar kun tu snang ba 'di lta bu 'di ni/ de'i rnam par sprul pa'i
9b7(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ da dung du'ang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chang ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/
10a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa ni/ rgyun chad pa cung zad kyang med de/ gang gi tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung bar gyur pa mthang
10a2(mdo sde): ba de'i tshe na'ang |nga ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos rnam par nges pa'i gtam yang dag par rab tu ston te/
10a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di lta bu 'di rnam par sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
10a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ khyod kyis pad+ma dpag tshad bcu'i khyon tsam yod pa de'i dkyil
10a5(mdo sde): na pad+ma'i snying po la rin po che bkod pa'i seng+ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam pa srog chags bye ba phrag mang pos phyag byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
10a6(mdo sde): mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ khyod kyis seng+ge'i khri de la byang chub sems dpa' lus gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ lus mtshan
10a7(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa 'dug ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ma gtogs par gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i lus zil gyis mnan nas 'dug
10b1(mdo sde): pa| byang chub sems dpa' mang pos phyag byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ 'di ni/
10b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste/ 'di ni/ de'i rnam par sprul pa'o/ /de nas tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pas byang chub sems dpa'
10b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag btsal nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu dag thob
10b4(mdo sde): par gyur cig / gang dag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang
10b5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'di'i ming thos shing gzugs kyi lus kyang mthong bas bdag gis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs
10b6(mdo sde): 'di yun ji srid gcig tu 'chad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
10b7(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / rgyas par byed kyi bar du'o/ /
11a1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni/ 'di'i nang du 'dus
11a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos 'khor thams cad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / tshangs pa snying
11a3(mdo sde): rje chen po sems pa 'dun par bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brgyan par bya ba dang / bdag nyid kyi shes rab dang / spobs pa'i stobs nye bar bstan pa'i phyir pad+ma dang
11a4(mdo sde): lhan cig/ seng+ge'i khri dang lhan cig tu steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun srid tsam na 'dug ste/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /khrag khrig sangs rgyas zhing
11a5(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi zhing rnams 'das pa'i 'og logs na/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas zhing yon tan kun ldan rab mdzes pa/ /de na 'dren pa'i bstan pa rgya mtshos
11a6(mdo sde): blo thugs mtshungs pa med bzhugs te/ /der ni bdag gis thub pa'i chos thos gyur te thos nas de bzhin bzung / /bdag ni stobs bcu ldan la blta bar bgyi dang de
11a7(mdo sde): bzhin phyag bgyi dang / /byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'di rnams phan tshun dri slad 'dir mchis te/ /skyob la phyag bgyi bas ni chos rgyal mtshungs med khyod la 'dir
11b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas mchad pa gang lags rgya chen shin tu rgyas pas mchod pa 'tshal/ /gang gis gzugs la gzugs su ma rtog tshor ba 'dus bgyis ma lags shing / /rnam
11b2(mdo sde): par shes pa'ang tshor gsum bzhin du rtag par shin tu rnam dag ste/ /gang zhig 'dren la mtshan du ma lags skyes dang rigs su ma lags rtogs/ /mig ldan des ni chos kyi rgyal po
11b3(mdo sde): dri med yang dag don du mthong / /bdag gam bdag med ces bya'i mtha' de gnyi ga mi len mi 'dor te/ /nang du gyur pa zhi zhing thugs kyang zhi ste phyi rol rgyu mi mnga'/ /mi rtog rnam mi
11b4(mdo sde): rtog cing rtog bral thub pa'i thugs ni nam mkha' 'dra/ /des ni phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan gsal mdzad rnams la mchod/ /gang blo sbyin pa rnams la 'di ni
11b5(mdo sde): sgyu ma len pa stong pa nyid/ /g.yo ba med pa'i yid kyis nor rnams de dag re ba med par gtong / /byang chub don du nges kyi lta bar nges min spros la gnas ma yin/ /gang blo sems
11b6(mdo sde): can nyes pa mthar 'byin de ni sbyin bdag ser sna med/ /de ni rab tu zhi bas zhi ste ngag med yid med lus gdung med/ /gdung ba med pas bcing ba rgya chen bral te des pa dbang po
11b7(mdo sde): zhi| |bdag med shes par gnas nas byang chub dmigs pa med cing de mi 'dor/ /khrims gnas blo ldan khrims 'chal mthar byed 'dod pa tshul khrims dri ma med/ /chos rnams
12a1(mdo sde): skad cig par ni rtogs par shes bya rnams la smras pa med/ /nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma ji bzhin mthong / /gang zhig
12a2(mdo sde): lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang yid ni khro mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig byang chub brtul zhugs gnas pa'i blo ldan mkhas de bzod pa smra/ /gang zhig chos rnams chu zla chu bur mnyam
12a3(mdo sde): zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra/ /rtogs nas mi min srog ma yin zhing shed bu ldan pa ma yin mthong / /byang chub dang ni sems can tshogs mi dmigs kyang byang chub gzhan don brtson//
12a4(mdo sde): tshul 'dir gang zhig skrag pa med pa de ni brtson 'grus tha mar phyin/ /gang gis sems ni yul la chags pa med cing the tshom yod min la/ /sems can gzhan gyi sems
12a5(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa dus gsum gyur pa'ang shes pa dang / /gang sems spyod par gyur pa gang yin de yi bdud kyis mi shes pa/ /pha rol phyin thob bsam gtan dang ni mngon par
12a6(mdo sde): shes la blo gros gnas/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung kun nyan cing de bzhin 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa dpag tu med par smras kyang spobs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur
12a7(mdo sde): te| |sangs rgyas chos rtogs sems can mi ltung de ni gang du'ang gnas med pa/ /bcom ldan thub nyid mkhyen gter shes rab ldan zhing 'jig rten gsum na dpa'/ /gang
12b1(mdo sde): zhig pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol gshegs min ma gshegs min/ /gang zhig sems can spyod pa mthar phyin mi gnas g.yo ba mi mnga' zhing / /yon tan kun mthar gang phyin yon
12b2(mdo sde): tan rnams la rlom sems mi mnga' ba/ /thub pa'i dbang po shAkya sangs rgyas khyu mchog de la mgo bos thug /'od zer rnam dag nyi mas srin bu me khyer 'od rnams zil gyis mnan//
12b3(mdo sde): me lce rtse thon bskal mtha'i me yis sa la ji snyed yod pa sreg /ri mchog ri rab kyis ni sa la yod pa'i ri kun zil gyis mnan/ /shAkya khyu mchog spu 'dis 'jig rten gsum gyi
12b4(mdo sde): 'od gzhan zil du brlag / zhing brgya dag nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog ji snyed pa/ /de dag gtso bo khyod kyi mdog dang gzi brjid kyis ni tshim par gyur/ /gang
12b5(mdo sde): dag smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar kun gyis mthun par mthong / /bdag cag gang nas ma 'ongs rang gi zhing nyid na ni 'dug par shes/ /ji ltar gang gis rang rig de ltar khyod
12b6(mdo sde): kyi gsung ni shin tu 'jug / srid pa gsum na skad rnams ji snyed ci mchis de dang mthun par 'jug /rdul gyi rdul dang mi rnams kyis ni sems kyi bsam pa bgrang nus srid/ /
12b7(mdo sde): thub pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad med nam mkha' 'dra 'di bgrang bar nus ma lags/ /nam mkha'i mtha' dang mi rnams kyi ni mtha' ma bgrang bar mi nus te/ /'khor ba'i sngon gyi
13a1(mdo sde): mtha' ma nyid ni rnam pa kun tu bgrang mi nus/ /nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'khor ba'i mtha' ni mi yis bgrang bar nus kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen dang ting
13a2(mdo sde): 'dzin tshul khrims yul ni gang du'ang shes mi nus/ /gzhal yas bskal par gang gi bsngags pa brjod par sla ba ma lags pa/ /khyu mchog dpag yas chos kyi dbang phyug
13a3(mdo sde): 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye bo gang dag shes dang mos pas sangs rgyas che ba rjes rtogs pa/ /de dag gis ni blo gros bsam yas rmad byung kun lhag 'dren pa mthong //
13a4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
13a5(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye
13a6(mdo sde): na| bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
13a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
13b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de ngas lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka'
13b2(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
13b3(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de la rab tu gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na
13b4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bdag gis thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin tu dkar ba
13b5(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'thob pa dang / ci'i slad du shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas de legs par
13b6(mdo sde): bshad du gsol/ ting nge 'dzin de la 'jug pa'i sgor 'jug pa gang thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob cing myur du bla na med
13b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad
14a1(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam
14a2(mdo sde): pa| legs so legs so/ /kye ma dri ba 'di bzang zhing dpyod pa de tshul bzhin te/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / byang chub sems
14a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar 'thob pa dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
14a4(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14a5(mdo sde): po blo gros rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
14a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ni/ dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa yin te/ dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ nges pa'i phung po la rab tu gnas pa/ tshogs bsags pa/ dbang po rno ba/ dge ba'i
14a7(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ rgyu'i stobs can yin te/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed/ bsti
14b1(mdo sde): stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong zhing gsung snyan pa thos te/ 'khor
14b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa'ang mthong zhing chags pa med pa'i mkhyen pa'ang thos la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis
14b3(mdo sde): s ems can 'dul ba mdzad pa'ang mthong nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas brtson 'grus
14b4(mdo sde): brtsams pa yin te/ dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brjed pa med pas sems yongs su dag par rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de sems
14b5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che nor bu mkhan mkhas pa'i lag tu
14b6(mdo sde): son pa| ji tsam na yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu dkar ba dang / mthing bu dang bral ba dang / skyon med par gyur pa de srid du yongs su sbyangs na/ skyes bu mkhas pa nor bu rin po che
14b7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che bskyed
15a1(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam na mthing bu dang bral zhing rlom sems kyi mthing
15a2(mdo sde): bu dang bral bar 'gyur ba de srid du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyang ba bya ba dang / thos pa la mkhas pa yongs su sbyang ba bya bas thams cad
15a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rin po che de yongs su sbyangs na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'du zhing shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
15a4(mdo sde): 'di'ang 'thob bo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu rin po che de ni/ rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par 'byung ste/ dgu gang
15a5(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rigs dang / dngul gyi rigs dang / shel gyi rigs dang / bai DUR+ya'i rigs dang / rdo'i snying po'i rigs dang / spug gi rigs dang / mu tig dmar
15a6(mdo sde): po'i rigs dang / ke sa ra'i rigs dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las shin tu 'das nas dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i
15a7(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rigs de las de rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po cher 'gyur te/ de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yongs su spyad par 'gyur
15b1(mdo sde): gyi| de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi ma yin te/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od gang yin pa des ni/ de ma yin pa'i nor bu rin po che gzhan rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byed
15b2(mdo sde): do| |blo gros rgya mtsho/ /de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rin po che de'ang rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par byung ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
15b3(mdo sde): so so'i skye bo dge ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang / dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa
15b4(mdo sde): rin po che'i rigs dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rin po che'i rigs dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rin po che'i rigs dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rin po che'i rigs dang / dgra bcom pa rin
15b5(mdo sde): po che'i rigs dang / rang sangs rgyas rin po che'i rigs dang rin po che'i rigs dgu po 'di dag las shin tu 'das nas bcu pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhag pa'i
15b6(mdo sde): bsam pa snying rje chen po'i rin po che'i rigs las thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa de rin po che 'byung ste/ de yongs su sbyangs na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
15b7(mdo sde): cad zil gyis non cing / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud rnams la'ang snang bar byed do/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang gi tshe sbyang bzod
16a1(mdo sde): cing gnod pa bzod la/ phug nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na/ nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/ 'di ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
16a2(mdo sde): pa rnams la phan par byed par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'ang gang gi tshe sbyang bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/
16a3(mdo sde): phug nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na/ thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba de 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa byed par 'gyur
16a4(mdo sde): ro| |blo gros rgya mtsho/ de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdom pa gsum gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su
16a5(mdo sde): dag pa dang / byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad la byams shing dang ba dang / snying rje'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam
16a6(mdo sde): pa la brtson pa dang / dga' pa'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba dang / btang snyoms kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing
16a7(mdo sde): rtag tu sems drang ba dang / g.yo dang sgyu med pas phan pa'i dngos po bsam par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa sbyor ba dang / cang
16b1(mdo sde): shes kyi sems kyis dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / sems shin tu dul bas sems las su rung ba dang / dgang sla bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa'i cho ga
16b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / gso ba slabs 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang / bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud cing rab tu 'dud pa dang / nga rgyal med pas khengs pa dang rtsod pa
16b3(mdo sde): rnam par spong ba dang / sems nges par sems pas nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par spong ba dang / rnyog pa med pas sems gsal ba dang / bdag la mi bstod pas bdag shes
16b4(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pas sems can rjes su srung pa dang / sman gyi sems kyis chos la gus pa dang / de'i don so sor myong bas chos don du gnyer ba dang / de
16b5(mdo sde): la gzhol 'bab pas chos 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pas chos la dga' ba dang / chos ma yin pa rnam par spang bas chos yongs su tshol ba dang / rtag tu
16b6(mdo sde): ngo tsha shes pas dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas dge ba thams cad yid la byed pa'i bya ba la 'jug pa dang /
16b7(mdo sde): drang bas spyod lam spas pa dang / khengs pa med pas mnyen pa dang / zhi gnas yongs su tshol bas rgod pa dang bral ba dang / blo brtan pas snyom las med pa dang / rab tu mi g.yo
17a1(mdo sde): bas sems ri dang mtshungs pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral bas sems dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam pa dag pas sems chu dang mtshungs pa
17a2(mdo sde): dang / rlom sems med pas sems me dang mtshungs pa dang / gnas med pas sems rlung dang mtshungs pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pas sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /
17a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang / lus dpen pa'i phyir dgon pa la dga' ba dang / sems dben pa'i phyir chos la spyod
17a4(mdo sde): pa dang / de byed cing yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir tshig bden pa dang / kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pa'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / nyon mongs pas mi rdzi
17a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sems dpa' ba dang / shin tu nyams pa med pa'i phyir bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab la'ang 'jigs par lta ba'i phyir tshul khrims
17a6(mdo sde): lhod pa med pa dang / skye bar smon pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims skyon med pa dang / gcig tu dkar po spyod pa'i phyir tshul khrims thun tshags ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi
17a7(mdo sde): yan lag sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'od zer thogs pa med pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir sgra la thogs
17b1(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa'i phyir dri la thogs pa med pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro la thogs pa med pa dang / lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir reg bya la thogs pa med
17b2(mdo sde): pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos la thogs pa med pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mi sdug pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi
17b3(mdo sde): gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ byams pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la shin tu brtags pa'i phyir gti mug gi gdung
17b4(mdo sde): ba dang bral ba yin/ dbang po rnams la shin tu brtags pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral ba yin/ stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir sgrib pa yang dag par bsal ba yin/ 'byung bar bya ba'i
17b5(mdo sde): khams yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun nas ldang ba bsal ba yin/ yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pa dang / nga rgyal dang bral ba
17b6(mdo sde): yin| chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa la kun 'dzin pa'i sems med pa yin/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bsam pa yin/
17b7(mdo sde): dbang po spas pa'i phyir nang nye bar zhi ba yin/ skyon shin tu mthong ba'i phyir phyi rol nye bar zhi ba yin/ sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir 'khor bas skrag pa yin/ dge ba'i rtsa
18a1(mdo sde): pa gsog pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin/ chu bo bzhi las bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par spyor ba yin/ pha rol tu 'gro
18a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir stegs dang zam pa shin tu bcas pa yin/ thang la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir 'dam dang 'obs las brgal ba yin te/ blo gros rgyal mtsho/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
18a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe chos 'di lta bu de dag gis dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / sbyin pa 'phags pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen
18a4(mdo sde): par sems bskyed pa rin po che de sbyong ba'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid bsdams shing / /rnam
18a5(mdo sde): par dag pa'i las lam bcu la slob/ /byams pas sems can kun la yang dag lta/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /snying rje ldan pas gzhan gyi bya bar
18a6(mdo sde): brtson| |dga' dang ldan pas chos la pha rol sbyor/ /btang snyoms ldan pas chos mchog 'tshe ba med/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /rtag tu drang zhing
18a7(mdo sde): g.yo ni rnam par spangs/ /gzhan la phan byed sdig pa rnam par spangs/ /lhag bsam dge ba ci yod rjes su 'jug /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /shes
18b1(mdo sde): rab rab 'jug dran dang shes bzhin can/ /sems rab dul bas sems ni las su rang / /sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang gso gla ba/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /
18b2(mdo sde): 'phags rigs chog shes pa dang tshig mnyen dang / /bla ma rnams la rtag tu 'dud byed dang / /rtsod brdzun nga rgyal spangs dang stobs ldan dang / /brnyas dang log pa nam yang byed ma yin/
18b3(mdo sde): sems ni nges sems mngon pa'i nga rgyal bral/ /rnyog pa med cing rab tu dad la gsal/ /bdag shes pa la rim gyis 'jug par byed/ /gzhan la mi brnyas sems can rjes su srung / /
18b4(mdo sde): chos la gus par dga' zhing gus dang bcas/ /bsgrims te nyon mongs rnams ni spong bar byed/ /chos don gnyer zhing chos la rton par byed/ /rtag tu chos don gzhol zhing 'bab par byed/ /
18b5(mdo sde): chos la brtson zhing nyon mongs med pa bsgoms/ /chos min spangs shin chos rnams yongs su tshol/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi phyed ldan/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i
18b6(mdo sde): sems sbyong yin/ /rtag tu 'dzem dang ldan zhing nyes spyod ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun la ngo tshas sdom/ /khrel yod ldan zhing 'dir ni dbang po bsdams/ /'di ni thams cad
18b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /rab tu sbyor bas las kyi bya bar 'jug/ bag yod pas na mtha' gnyis 'dzin mi byed/ /mkhas pa sten pa'i chos rnams rjes rtogs pa/ /'di ni thams
19a1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /spyod lam gyis ni rang ba'i dngos dang ldan/ /khengs pa med pas rtag tu mnyen pa nyid/ /zhi gnas cho ga ldan pas rgod
19a2(mdo sde): pa med| |'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /blo ni rab tu brtan pas nyams pa med/ /lhag mthong la ni ri rgyal ji bzhin te/ /dam bcas brtan zhing bar skabs
19a3(mdo sde): nyams pa med/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /sdug bsngal bde bas mi g.yo sa dang mtshungs/ /bsam pa dag bas chu ltar dri ma 'khru/ /rtag tu rlom
19a4(mdo sde): sems med bas me dang mtshungs/ /gnas med rgyu bas rtag tu rlung dang 'dra/ /shin tu dri ma med pas mkha' mnyam sems/ /rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas bstan pa rnyed/ /lus
19a5(mdo sde): ni dpen zhing zhi bas dgon par dga'/ /sems dben pas ni chos kyi mchog la spyod/ /dge bar bden par smra dang yang dag smra/ /ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin byed/ /nyon
19a6(mdo sde): mongs mi rdzi dge la dpa' bo mchog / shin tu bslabs pas bslab pa yang dag 'dzin/ /de la lhod pa nam yang yod ma yin/ /kha na ma tho chung la'ang rtag tu 'jigs/ /
19a7(mdo sde): byang chub mchog rgyu'i tshul khrims nyams pa med/ /yon tan dkar spyod tshul khrims 'dres pa med/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten cing sdig pa min/ /rdzogs pa'i byang
19b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bya phyir brtan/ /de ltar de yi mig ni dri med kyis/ /'jig rten kun la 'od zer mnyam par lta/ /mkhas pa de ni sna tshogs sgra thos nas/ /dga' med rangs pa med
19b2(mdo sde): cing zhum pa med/ /blo ldan de ni sgra yi don rtogs shes/ /de yi rna ba de ltar rnam dag nyid/ /sna yis dri dang lce yis ro rnams dang / /lus kyis rig dang yid kyis chos rnams la/ /
19b3(mdo sde): reg gnas ma khengs ma dud zhum pa med/ /de ltar de yi dbang po dag pa nyid/ /chags pas mi chags sdang bas sdang ba med/ /gti mug ma rmongs mi sdug gnas pa can/ /byams
19b4(mdo sde): la dga' zhing rkyen gyis chos sems pa/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin/ /sgrib pa lnga po dag gis bsgribs pa med/ /de ltar des ni dbang po lnga yang bsgoms/ /
19b5(mdo sde): de ni gang du'ang sgrib med bcings pa'ang med/ /stobs rnams lnga dpag la rab tu gnas/ kun nas ldang ba shes shing byung ba nyid/ /tshul bzhin ma yin spangs shing tshul bzhin
19b6(mdo sde): gnas| |dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sten/ /yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan/ /byang chub yan lag sten dang rtag tu ldan/ /brtan pa de ni yan lag brgyad la mchog
19b7(mdo sde): de ni 'dod dang sdang dang 'jigs mi 'gro / gti mug bral zhing dbang po shin tu bsdams/ /chos kyi sbyin la de ni ser sna med/ /slob dpon nam yang chos 'chab mi byed do/ /zang zing
20a1(mdo sde): med par chos ni ston par byed/ /des na de ni byang chub sems dag 'gyur/ /de ni zang zing rnams la kun 'dzin med/ /rnam smin re med 'dod rgu gtong bar byed
20a2(mdo sde): sbyin dang snyan dang don byed don mthun pas/ /de ni sems can brgya dag rab tu sdud/ /de yi byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur/ /theg pa dman la nam yang re ba med/ /ji lta ji
20a3(mdo sde): ltar sangs rgyas yon tan mthong / /de lta de ltar de bas ri rab 'dra/ /nad ni rab zhi srid pa'i nyes pa mthong / /de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul la lta mi byed/ /'dus byas nyes pa dag kyang
20a4(mdo sde): shin tu mthong / /'khor bas 'jigs pas sdig pa rnams mi byed/ /legs spyod khur khyer bas ni skyo ba med/ /zhing rnams sbyong bar 'dod pa nyams pa med/ /chos rnams yongs
20a5(mdo sde): su bzung bas zhum pa med/ /sems can thar byed rgyu la 'jigs pa med/ /chu bo bzhi po dag las bsgral ba'i phyir/ /de ni chos gru yang dag sbyor bar byed/ /lus can mya ngan
20a6(mdo sde): 'das lam gzud pa'i phyir/ /de ni stegs dang zam pa 'cha' bar byed/ /'dam las 'das shin 'bas las brgal nas ni/ /thang la gnas shing de dag 'jigs med
20a7(mdo sde): gnas| |'jigs pas g.yen spyos rnams la 'jigs med ston/ /bdag nyid rgal nas de dag gzhan yang sgrol/ /gang dag chos tshul 'di dag rnam dag cing / /rdzogs
20b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems brtan kha lo sgyur/ /de dag byang chub sems mchog rnam dag ste/ /nyon mongs dri mas gzhar yang gos mi 'gyur/ /de ste nam mtha' nyon mongs bya bar nus/ /de
20b2(mdo sde): la rjes kyang bstan par nus srid kyi/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /de ni nam yang nyon mongs byar mi nus/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che yongs
20b3(mdo sde): su sbyang ba'i le'u ste/ dang po'o// //'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i
20b4(mdo sde): gnod pa bzod pa ni/ ji lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che di'i gnod pa ni/ gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
20b5(mdo sde): po thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de ltar bskyed nas 'phags pa ma yin pa tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can rnams sam/ bdud rnams sam/ bdud kyi
20b6(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams sam/ bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams sam/ bdud kyi kho nya rnams kyis gtses sam/ rnam par gtses sam/ bskyod dam/ kun tu bskyod dam/ dkrugs
20b7(mdo sde): sam| kun tu dkrugs sam/ bsdigs sam/ brdegs kyang byang chub tu bsam pa'i sems bskyed pa de las mi phyed pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i snying
21a1(mdo sde): rje chen pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa las mi phyed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya bar brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang / sangs
21a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba las mi phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi
21a3(mdo sde): tshogs bsags pa las mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos
21a4(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin par mngon par brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon par brtson shing bdag bde ba la mi chags pa las mi
21a5(mdo sde): phyed pa ste/ de de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas sems can thams cad kyis dpyas kyang bzod/ thing slad byas pa dang / smad pa dang / bshung ba byas
21a6(mdo sde): kyang bzod/ sems can thams cad kyis spyos sam/ bsdigs sam/ ngan du brjod dam/ ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam yang bzod/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa'ang
21a7(mdo sde): bzod/ sems can thams cad kyi khur yang bzod/ sgrol bas kyang skyo ba med/ zhum pa med/ kun tu zhum pa med/ sgyid lug pa med/ yi chad pa med kyi/ stobs nye bar
21b1(mdo sde): ston par byed/ mthu skyed par byed cing brtson 'grus rtsom la rtul bas rtul bar byed/ spro ba skyed cing rmongs pa'i sems mi 'dzin to/ /de spyos kyang slar mi gshe/ brdegs kyang slar mi
21b2(mdo sde): rdeg / khros kyang slar mi khro/ 'khrugs kyang slar mi 'khrug ste/ de ltar sems brang ba'i go cha gyon no/ /'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di ni/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i theg
21b3(mdo sde): pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni/ rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag go /bdag ni/ rgyun las ldog par rtsol bar 'dod pa'o/ /sems can de dag ni/ phan tshun mi mthun pa
21b4(mdo sde): dag go / bdag ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mi mthun pa spang ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa'o/ /sems can de dag ni/ gnod sems la dpa' ba dag go /bdag ni/ bzod pa dang / des
21b5(mdo sde): pa yongs su tshol ba'o/ /sems can de dag ni/ gcig la gcig yongs su 'drid par gnas pa dag go /bdag ni/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa yongs su tshol ba'o/ /gal te sems
21b6(mdo sde): can de dag phyogs bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu dbye ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che lag na thogs te bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang yang / sa
21b7(mdo sde): phyogs gang du 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ 'chags gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i sems sam/ tshul khrims kyi sems sam/ bzod
22a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems sam/ brtson 'grus kyi sems sam/ bsam gtan gyi sems sam/ shes rab kyi sems sam/ thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i
22a2(mdo sde): sa phyogs der de dag lus rgya shug gi lo ma'i brgya cha tsam du gtubs sam/ rnam par gtor tam/ rnam par bcom mam/ sems can de dag thams cad las gzhan mi byed
22a3(mdo sde): par rgyun du gshe'am/ bsdigs sam/ smod dam/ bshung ngam/ tshig ngan pa dang ngag rtsu ba po smra ba de ltar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can 'ga' la'ang 'khrug pa'i sems
22a4(mdo sde): bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' nas 'khor ba tshad med par byas te gang du bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal bar song ngam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
22a5(mdo sde): song ngam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dus song ngam/ mir gyur kyang rung ste 'dod pa'i zas kyi dri mas dri ma can du gyur nas chos thos pa dang mi ldan zhing yang ba'i 'tsho ba'i spyod yul
22a6(mdo sde): don med pas 'tsho ba can du gyur te yan lag dang / nying lag brgyar gshegs shing gtubs te phye zhing phral la bya ba rnam pa mang po byas kyang bdag gis gzhi de las bdag
22a7(mdo sde): gi don byas kyi/ gzhan gyi don ma byas pas gal te sems can de dag thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mthar bdag gi lus gshegs/ gtubs/ rnam par gtor/ rnam par
22b1(mdo sde): bcom pa de lta bur gyur kyang bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su mi gtong ngo / /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ngo / /dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yongs su mi gtong
22b2(mdo sde): ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus gtubs pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di lta bu thams cad ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i
22b3(mdo sde): du'ang mi bzod do/ /bdag ni/ sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro'o/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gtang bar ni/ mi bya'o/ /sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba
22b4(mdo sde): la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po mi gtong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te/ dge ba la ni/ bar chang mang ngo / /mi dge ba'i phyogs la
22b5(mdo sde): ni| grogs byed pa mang ngo / /dge ba'i phyogs la ni/ grogs byed pa nyung ngo / /zhes gsungs pas bdag gis mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs mi bya'i/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs
22b6(mdo sde): bya'o| |sems can thams cad la bzod par bya'o/ gnod sems su mi bya'o/ /sems can de dag la gang yod pa de byin na'ang bdag la gang yod pa de bdag gis sbyin par
22b7(mdo sde): bya ste| sems can de dag la gnod sems dang / khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa yod pa de dag de rnams kyis byin yang bdag la bzod pa dang / des pa gang yod pa de bdag
23a1(mdo sde): gis sbyin par bya'o/ /bdag gis bzod pa'i stobs bstan par bya'i/ gnod sems ni/ ma yin no snyam mo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ lus dang / srog 'dor
23a2(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' ba ma yin no/ /gang gi gzhi las gnod sems 'byung ba'i chos de
23a3(mdo sde): bdag gis spang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /chos de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dga' ba dang / lus la gnas pa dang / lus la chags pa ste/ lus btang na/ gnod sems
23a4(mdo sde): kyang gtong ngo / /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar bgrang ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa bzod de mi skyo
23a5(mdo sde): mi khro'o/ /de gnod pa gsum bzod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi gnod pa dang / ngag gi gnod pa dang / sems kyi gnod pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de la byang chub sems
23a6(mdo sde): dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang yan lag dang / nying lag rnams bcad kyang chos nyid la rton te/ gang de'i lus gcod pa'i sems can de nyid la lta ba'o/
23a7(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ de la thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/
23b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ gang lus 'dor ba dang / lus yongs
23b2(mdo sde): su gtong ba dang / lus la mi lta ba 'di ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang lus gcod pa na sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa dang / tshor ba
23b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi 'phrog pa 'di ni/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang lus yongs su gcod pa na gang dag de'i lus gcod pa de dag nyid rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir
23b4(mdo sde): bzod cing sems kyi rma mi phyin te bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston pa 'di ni/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dun pa mi
23b5(mdo sde): 'dor zhing sems kyi stobs bskyed pa'ang rab tu 'dzin la 'khor ba nyid du mtshams kyang sbyor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa'ang rtsom pa 'di ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
23b6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'o/ /gang lus rnam par 'thor ba na thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de mi brjed cing byang chub nyid la lta ba dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba la so sor
23b7(mdo sde): rtog pa 'di ni/ de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang lus gcod pa na lus la rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / rdo dang / mig yor lta bur so sor rtog cing lus la
24a1(mdo sde): sgyu ma'i chos nyid du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par na mi rtag pa nyid dang / yang dag par na sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / yang dag par na bdag med pa nyid dang /
24a2(mdo sde): yang dag par na zhi ba nyid du lus la rtog pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
24a3(mdo sde): gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las nyams par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa
24a4(mdo sde): bzod pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang dan du brjod pa'i tshig thams cad dang du len pa dang / gshe ba dang /
24a5(mdo sde): sdigs pa dang / smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / sdigs mo byed pa thams cad bzod pa dang / yod pa'am/ med pas gleng bas kyang mi khro ba dang / 'khon du mi 'dzin pa dang /
24a6(mdo sde): bag la nyal spong ba'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de la thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang /
24a7(mdo sde): gshe ba dang / sdigs pa dag pha rol las thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ ji ltar na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i
24b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam gshe ba dang / sdigs pa dag pha rol las thos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
24b2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang / gshe ba dang / sdigs pa dag pha
24b3(mdo sde): rol las thos na/ dran pa 'di lta bu rab tu 'thob ste/ sems can 'di ni/ sngon nas ser sna can du gyur pa 'jungs pa ste/ ser sna'i dri mas kun nas kun tu bskor ba des gang
24b4(mdo sde): dag de'i gnod sems kyi dri ma spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ma brten/ gus par ma byas/ bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o/ /bdag ni/ gtong ba la
24b5(mdo sde): mos shing ser sna med par bya/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam ste/ de dag srung zhing gnod sems kyang spong ba 'di ni/ de'i sbyin
24b6(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni/ tshul khrims 'chal pa las ma mthong ba ste/ de ni/ bdag la gshe zhing sdigs pa'o/ /bdag ni/
24b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa las mi nyams par bya'o/ /gnod sems med par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/ /las kyi rnam par
25a1(mdo sde): smin pa la brten par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni/ zhe sdang
25a2(mdo sde): gi shas che zhing gnod sems mang ba ste/ de ni/ bdag la gshe zhing sdigs pa'o/ /bdag ni/ bzod pa'i stobs mang du byas te byams pa la gnas par bya'o snyam pa 'di
25a3(mdo sde): ni| de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni/ le lo can dge ba'i chos dang bral ba ste/ de ni/ bdag la gshe zhing
25a4(mdo sde): sdigs pa'o/ /bdag ni/ brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btsal ba la mi ngoms par bya ste/ sems can 'di byang chub kyi snying por sngar je 'dug par
25a5(mdo sde): byas la phyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du de ltar go cha gyon pa de ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
25a6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'o/ /gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni/ brjed ngas pa/ shes bzhin med pa/ nyon mongs pa nges par bsam pa ste/ de ni/ bdag la gshe
25a7(mdo sde): zhing sdigs pa'o/ /bdag ni/ nyon mongs pa nges par bsam par bya/ dran pa dang shes bzhin can du bya/ rtse gcig tu byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par bya ste/ sems can
25b1(mdo sde): ma dul ba/ ma zhi ba/ ma spas pa/ nye bar ma zhi ba 'di lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis go cha chen po bgos te 'di ltar sems des par sems su gzhug go snyam pa 'di ni/ de'i
25b2(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gzhan yang de 'di snyam du bsam ste/ sems can 'di ni/ shes rab 'chal ba/ bdag tu smra ba/ sems can du lta bar dmigs pa'i spyod
25b3(mdo sde): yul ba ste/ de ni/ bdag la gshe zhing sdigs pa'o/ /bdag ni/ chos nyid la brten par bya'o snyam ste/ 'di la gshe ba dang / khro ba su yin zhes des yongs su tshol ba na gang gshe
25b4(mdo sde): ba dang / khro ba'i chos de mi dmigs so/ /de bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs par dmigs par lta ba dang bral bar bzod pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /blo gros rgya
25b5(mdo sde): mtsho| de ltar na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang / gshe ba dang / sdigs pa dag pha rol las thos nas pha
25b6(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las kyang mi nyams te/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnod pa bzod pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/
25b7(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhe na/ gang bdud thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems de las phral yang mi g.yo ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba dmigs
26a1(mdo sde): p ar lta ba la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyis yang dag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de las mos pa bzlog kyang mi brjed
26a2(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su 'dug kyang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems de las nyams par byed mi nus te/ bdud rdzu 'phrul chen po dag gis khyod kyis theg pa
26a3(mdo sde): chen po yang dag par sgrub par mi nus kyi/ khyod kyis gces par bya ba 'di thong zhig /khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di 'or cig /byang chub ni/ rnyed par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas
26a4(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams ni/ rnyed par dka' ba ste/ 'dir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang du myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa de dag ni/ bde ba yin gyi/ skyes bu dam
26a5(mdo sde): pa| khyod myur du mya ngan las 'das par gyis shig ces de la sems skul zhing sems dran par byed la/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
26a6(mdo sde): chen po la de ltar bral bar byed/ de ltar mos pa zlog par byed kyang sngon gyi go cha mi 'dor zhing bsam pa rnam par 'khrug par mi byed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
26a7(mdo sde): gis nges par byang chub kyi snying po mnan par bya/ bdag gis nges par bdud dpung dang bcas par pham par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
26b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ bdag gis nges par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/ bdag gis nges par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi
26b2(mdo sde): gtam chen po brjod par bya/ bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
26b3(mdo sde): bdag dang gzhan gyi sems rig pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub tu bsam pa rig gi /bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang /
26b4(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / sems can thams cad dang / bdag la bslu bar mi bya'o snyam pa 'di lta bu ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnod pa bzod cing theg pa chen
26b5(mdo sde): po de las mi phyed pa ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha gang yin
26b6(mdo sde): pa de ni| brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gong na med pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems
26b7(mdo sde): kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /byang chub lam las bsam pa mi phyed cing / /de ni snying rje las kyang
27a1(mdo sde): phyed ma yin/ /bdag gis dkon mchog gsum po bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams yang dag bsgrub par bya/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis khyad 'phags
27a2(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang / /gang dag gis ni stobs bcu rnams kyis lus mdzes pa/ /de dag yongs su btsal phyir mchod sbyin bye ba byed/ /gnod pa shin tu rnam mang bzod
27a3(mdo sde): cing yon tan phyug / brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing rnams de dag bdag gis spyad/ /rin chen chos mchog 'di dag bdag gis bsrung bar bya/ /brgya phrag mtha' yas sems can
27a4(mdo sde): de dag bdag gis dgrol/ /des na gnod pa bzod cing bsam pa mi phyed do/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can khams ni mtha' yas ji snyed pa/ /thams cad 'dus par gyur nas
27a5(mdo sde): lag na mtshon thogs te/ /de dag de la 'jigs sbyin gshe zhing sdigs byed kyang / /yon tan phyir ni sdigs dang 'phya ba bzod par byed/ /sngon mtha'i bskal pa brgya phrag
27a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas ji snyed par/ /de dag rgyun mi 'chad par tshig rtsub smras kyang ni/ /bdag nyid chen po de bzod mi khro gshe ba med/ /de ltar rtogs pa rnams ni gnod pa dag par
27a7(mdo sde): 'gyur| |sems can de dag lag na mtshon thogs lhan cig tu/ /bdag gi lus kyi yan lag dum bu dum bur gtubs/ /'on kyang bdag gi sems yid khro bar mi bya ste/ /
27b1(mdo sde): byang chub yid la byas na gnod 'di dag par 'gyur/ /'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam 'on te nyal yang rung / /gang du byang chub sems mchog 'di dang sbyin pa dang / /dul ba'i
27b2(mdo sde): sems dang gzhan yang dkar sems mi 'dor ba/ /der ni de'i lus dum bu dum bur rnam par 'thor/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro'i skye gnas yi dwags 'jig rten mir/ /bskal pa brgya
27b3(mdo sde): phrag mtha' yas don med lus kyang gtubs/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par 'dod pas lus 'dor zhes/ /skyes bu des ni yid kyang yang dag tshim par byed/ /mi yi sdug bsngal rgyu
27b4(mdo sde): ni rnam pa du ma dag / mtshams med sdug bsngal rgya cher nye bar mi 'gro ba'i/ /dmyal ba rnams su bskal pa brgyar ni gnas par spro/ /rgyal ba dang ni chos dang sems can mi gtong
27b5(mdo sde): ngo / /bdag lus mi rtag ring du mi thub sgyu ma 'dra/ /khams bzhi de dag gdug pa'i sprul dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /bdag gis lus por byas te dug med 'gyur bar bya/ /nyon mongs
27b6(mdo sde): dug zhi nas ni rang byung sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /srid gsum 'jig rten 'di na lus bde 'gyur ba'i gzhi/ /'dod pa'i zas rgyu cung zad ji snyed 'jigs pa ste/ /bdag gis lus btang
27b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med par 'gyur bar bya/ /bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de dag gnod pa bzod/ /nag po'i phyogs la grogs ni brgya stong phrag kyang mang / /dkar po'i phyogs ni gang la'ang
28a1(mdo sde): grogs po gcig pur 'gyur/ /bdag ni mi dge rnams dang rtsod par mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas bzod pa gsung bas bzod pa bdag gi grogs/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs
28a2(mdo sde): rgyas de dag 'dir ni bdag gi dbang / /ji ltar sangs rgyas sku la sems ni mi phyed do/ /sangs rgyas dang ni bdag nyid che lha bdag gi grogs/ /gnod pa bzod par bya yi sdang bar
28a3(mdo sde): mi bya'o| |gnod pa bzod pa ngag yid rnam pa gsum du gsungs/ /gang bzod dpa' bo de ni mi phyed bzod pa yin/ /lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa mtha' yas yod pa dag /gal te
28a4(mdo sde): lus la bzod pa lus gnod dag par 'gyur/ /lus ni dum bu dum bur gtubs te rnam gtor tshe/ /thabs ldan che ba'i bdag nyid pha rol phyin rdzogs 'gyur/ /sbyin dang tshul
28a5(mdo sde): khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang / /shes rab khyad 'phags dam pa skad cig tsam gyis 'dzin/ /lus dang lus la sred pa'i nyon mongs rnams kyang 'dor/ /sbyin
28a6(mdo sde): dang rab tu ldan pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /byams pas 'jig rten khyab byed tshul khrims nyams mi 'gyur/ /byang chub rjes su 'gro bas tshul khrims dag pa 'dzin/ /bzod
28a7(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bskyed yan lag rnams dang nying lag gcod/ /de yang de yi bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la sbyor/ /brtson 'grus gces pa ma zhum par skabs sgyid lug med/ /lus ni
28b1(mdo sde): rnam par 'thor zhing brtson 'grus pha rol 'gro/ /byang chub sems kyi bsam pa dran pa mi 'dor zhing / /nyon mongs mun pa rdul rnams bsal phyir rab tu brtson/ /lus bshig nas ni
28b2(mdo sde): bsam gtan stobs dang rnam par 'thob/ /'dir yang rdul bral bsam gtan pha rol phyin la sbyor/ /bdag gi lus ni bdag mad rmi lam glog dang 'dra/ /'di la byed pa po med
28b3(mdo sde): tshor ba po yang med/ /lus kyi gzings pas bcings pa'i sems can bdag gis dgrol/ /shes rab 'di ni khyad 'phags pha rol phyin pa mchog /gang zhig 'di la sbyor zhing tshul
28b4(mdo sde): bzhin chos sems la/ /lus kyi gnod pa bzod cing rab sdang mi byed de/ /mi snyan pa dang smad dang bshung ba'i tshig thos kyang / /de ni zhe sdang mi 'gyur byams ldan sems kyang
28b5(mdo sde): dul| |tha ba rab tu zhe sdang bor 'di sbyin pa dag / byams pa'i yid du gyur pa 'di ni tshul khrims dag /bzod pa'i stobs bskyed 'di ni bzod pa dag pa yin/ /sangs rgyas ye
28b6(mdo sde): shes 'dod nas brtson 'grus phyir zhing bskyed/ /sems dang yid rab zhi ba 'di ni bsam gtan dag /sgra skad mi rnyed 'di ni shes rab dag pa yin/ /mi yi tshig thos nas ni gang chos 'di
28b7(mdo sde): sems pa/ /de 'dir gnod bzod ngag gi skyon la chags pa med/ /bdud dang mu stegs can gyi lta gyur brgya stong gis/ /gnas 'di rnyed dka'i sbyor ba 'ong brjod kyang / /mi skrag
29a1(mdo sde): zhum pa med cing phyi phyir mthu bskyed de/ /mkhas pa de ni gnod dang sems gnod mtha' yas bzod/ /gang zhig bzod dang brtson 'grus rab gnas ri rab
29a2(mdo sde): 'dra| |sems can kun nang dpa' bo de 'dir gnod pa bzod/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi sbyang ba dang ni gnod shes nas/ /byang chub rjes su 'gro bas phyi nas lung ston to/ /blo
29a3(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho/ de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i 'bigs pa gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
29a4(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che des rlom sems su mi byed de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de la brten par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ len par mi
29a5(mdo sde): byed| 'dor bar mi byed/ spros par mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed kyi/ rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa yin te/ de chos zab mo rnams la blos
29a6(mdo sde): rnam par dpyod do/ /chos zab mo de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang / rgyu la dmigs pa khong du chud pa dang / rtag pa ma
29a7(mdo sde): yin pa dang / chad pa ma yin pa dang / mthar lta ba dang bral ba dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa dang / bdag ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
29b1(mdo sde): gdod ma nas ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la yid ches pa dang / smon pa med pa la som nyi med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa
29b2(mdo sde): med pa la de kho na'i blo dang ldan pa dang / shin tu mi rtag pa nyid dang / gzugs dbu ba dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / tshor ba chu bur dang 'dra ba nyid dang / 'du shes smig rgyu dang mtshungs
29b3(mdo sde): te gnyis su med pa nyid dang / 'du byed rnams la chu shing dang mtshungs par so sor rtog pa dang / rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang / khams rnams g.yo ba med pa
29b4(mdo sde): nyid dang / skye mched rnams phan tshun du shes pa med pa nyid dang / sems gnas pa med pa dang / nga rgyal yid la mi byed pa dang / lhag par byed pa lhag par mi byed pa dang /
29b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / tha dad du bya ba med pa dang / ro gcig pa dang / bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / lam gyi tshogs shes pa yongs
29b6(mdo sde): su tshol ba dang / ngas pa'i don gyi don la rton pa dang / don gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i blo dang / skad thams cad la skad med par 'jug pa dang / sgra thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' dang
29b7(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par shes pa dang / don dang tshig 'bru gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa shes pas don brjod du med par rtogs pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa ngar
30a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa de shin tu zad pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa sgro btags pa med pa dang / lam shes pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas
30a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar 'pho ba med pa dang / tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa skye ba dang 'jig par gnas pa
30a3(mdo sde): dang / sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa dmigs pa la shin tu brtags pa dang / chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa chos kyi dbyings la ma yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba mnyam pas
30a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sems la dbang bsgyur bar gyur pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po chags pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po
30a5(mdo sde): dben pas nges par byung ba dang / dran pa'i dbang po dran pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po yid la byed pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po spros pa las shin tu
30a6(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / dad pa'i stobs gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dmigs pa rtogs pa med pa dang / dran pa'i stobs nyams pa med pa dang ldan pa
30a7(mdo sde): dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs nges par sems par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs mi 'khrugs pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa med
30b1(mdo sde): cing brjed pa med pa dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag len
30b2(mdo sde): pa med cing 'dor ba med pa dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dba' rlabs med pa dang / rab tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag lus dang sems la zhugs pa dang /
30b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gnyis dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba lta ba thams
30b4(mdo sde): cad spong ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i ngag sgra skad thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug
30b5(mdo sde): pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' lus dang / sems kyi las dang bral ba dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba tshol ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba 'deg pa med
30b6(mdo sde): cing 'jog pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rnam par rig pa la mi 'jug pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi dmigs pa mnyam pa nyid la
30b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / zhi ba zhi gnas kyi mthar song ba dang / lhag mthong lta ba rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba med pa'i don mi rtag pa'i don dang / gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i don sdug
31a1(mdo sde): bsngal gyi don dang / rgyu ba med pa'i don bdag med pa'i don dang / nye bar zhi ba'i don zhi ba'i don dang / dul bas sbyin pa dang / bsil ba'i dngos por gyur
31a2(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims dang / zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bzod pa dang / shin tu rnam par phye bas rnam par 'byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang / nang nye bar zhi ba'i bsam gtan dang /
31a3(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab dang / sems can gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i byams pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
31a4(mdo sde): snying rje dang / dga' ba med pa'i dga' ba dang / rtsom pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i btang snyoms dang / chos thams cad 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
31a5(mdo sde): nas stong pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar dben pa dang / da ltar byung ba na bdag med pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar gang chos zab mo rgyun chad pa/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba/ nam
31a6(mdo sde): mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rtogs pa dang / khong du chud pa dang / 'jug pa shes pa la dpyod pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / bgrang ba dang / nye bar rtog
31a7(mdo sde): pa dang / nan tan byed pa 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de 'bigs pa'o/ /de ltar thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che phigs na/
31b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba nyid lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma gzhal med khang lhun gyis grub
31b2(mdo sde): par rnam par rgyu zhing dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du snang bar byed kyang lha'i bu nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di snyam du bdag cag 'gro'am/ 'on te ldog snyam du mi sems par sems can rnams kyi
31b3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas de dag 'gro'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du rab tu phigs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang
31b4(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag na sems can gyi don byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ yang mngon par 'du byed pa med par bya ba de
31b5(mdo sde): dag kun tu ston to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'bigs pa shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
31b6(mdo sde): yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag na/ lhag mthong gi chos rnams mthong gi mnyam par ma bzhag pas ni/ ma yin no/ /de'i
31b7(mdo sde): mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab ste/ shes rab des mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /gang mngon sum du 'gyur zhe na/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon sum du
32a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi gzhi de la kun tu mi spyod pa'o/ /chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gang zhe na/
32a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rnam par rig pa ni/ chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'o/ /rnam par rig pa de'i yang dag pa ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni/ chos rnams kyi yang dag
32a3(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o/ /gang gi tshe tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad par gyur pa de'i tshe snang bar yang mi byed/ mi snang bar yang mi byed do/ /de la snang ba ni/ gang / mi snang ba
32a4(mdo sde): ni| gang zhe na/ snang ba zhes bya ba ni/ skye ba'o/ /mi snang ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'gag pa'o/ /gang gi tshe snang bar yang mi byed/ mi snang bar yang mi byed pa de'i tshe skye bar yang mi byed/
32a5(mdo sde): 'gag par yang mi byed do/ /gang gi tshe skye bar mi byed/ 'gag par yang mi byed pa de'i tshe chos nyid la gnas pa yin te/ chos kyi dbyings 'khrug par mi byed/ de bzhin nyid
32a6(mdo sde): rjes su rtogs pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni/ de chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid ni/ de
32a7(mdo sde): kho na'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ gnyis su med pa'i yang dag par mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar mngon sum du shes
32b1(mdo sde): pa rig pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu phigs pa shes pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyang ba dang / gnod pa dang / nges par 'bigs pa'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das
32b2(mdo sde): kyis bshad pa'i tshe lha dang / mi'i skye rgu'i srog chags khrag khrig bcu gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /srog chags khri drug stong
32b3(mdo sde): gis bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /chos kun nges par rtogs pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni sgrog
32b4(mdo sde): par byed/ /de tshe nges rtogs ye shes kyis/ /chos rnams kun la chags pa med/ /zab mo'i chos rnams khong du chud/ /mkhas pa skrag par 'gyur ba med/ /skrag med kun tu
32b5(mdo sde): 'jigs med pas/ /khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyu la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /brten pa'i chos rnams khong du chud/ /shes rab ldan de rjes mthun byed/ /mthar
32b6(mdo sde): lta ba ni mi 'dzin to/ /rtag pa dang ni chad pa la/ /blo ni thogs pa yod ma yin/ /yang dag mtha' ni bsam yas pa'i/ /dbu ma'i mtha' ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /bdag gis mtha'
32b7(mdo sde): yi rang bzhin gyis/ /chos rnams bdag med ngo bo nyid/ /chos kun de yi rang bzhin te/ /gdong nas ma skyes 'gag pa med/ /skyes pa med cing 'byung ba med/ /stong pa gzung
33a1(mdo sde): med dri ma med/ /mtshan ma med cing spros pa med/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs shing 'dra/ /de dag sems kyis mi smon par/ /'dod cing chags pa rnam
33a2(mdo sde): par spangs/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin mngon sum du/ /dbu ba lta bur rab tu shes/ /tshor ba chu bur 'dra ba ste/ /'du shes smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid do/ /'du byed chu shing snying
33a3(mdo sde): po 'dra| |rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra/ /khams bzhi g.yo ba med pa ste/ /nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yin no/ /gang dag skye mched thams cad ni/ /bem po phan
33a4(mdo sde): tshun spyod yul lo/ /sems ni nang na ma yin te/ /phyi rol tu yang mi dmigs so/ /yid la nga yi yod ma yin/ /rnam pa shes pa gnas pa med/ /chos rnams yid la mi
