63b3(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po'o/ /sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni/ de byed
63b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos la bzod pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ thos pa yongs su tshol ba'o/ /rtul ba ni/ thos pa ston pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/
63b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcod pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ sems
63b6(mdo sde): can thams cad dang thun mong du byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ gtong ba chen po sgrog pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ gang
63b7(mdo sde): slong ba po rnams la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ kye ma'o longs spyod 'di dag mi rtag pa'o snyam pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'o/ /
64a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ chos kyi longs spyod yongs su tshol ba'o/ /rtul ba ni/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ bdag gis snying po blang
64a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma sel ba'o/ /rtul ba ni/ tshul khrims
64a3(mdo sde): dang brtul zhugs ma nyams pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyis rlom sems
64a4(mdo sde): su mi byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ lus yongs su dag pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ ngag yongs su dag pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ sems yongs su dag pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni /chos
64a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ gnod sems kyi sems kyi skabs med pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ bzod pa'i stobs rnams rnam par dag pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/
64a6(mdo sde): bdag dang gzhan srung ba'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ bzod pa'i rlom sems su mi byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ gshe ba dang / sdang ba dang par byed pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ gshe ba
64a7(mdo sde): dang / sdang ba 'dris par mi byed pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ nang yongs su gdung ba med par byed pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa
64b1(mdo sde): ni| le lo'i dri ma sel pa'o/ /rtul pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dri ma las dben pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ sems can le lo can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ de bya ba byed pa'o//
64b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ bya ba yang dag par sgrub pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ bya ba nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ theg pa gzhan la mi re ba'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ las kyi rnam
64b3(mdo sde): par smin pa chud mi gzon pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ dran pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ rtogs pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ blo gros so/ /sgrub pa ni/ mos pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ rig
64b4(mdo sde): pa'o| |rtul ba ni/ tshul lo/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ sgo'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ 'byung ba'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ tshig 'bru kun chub par byed pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ tshig 'bru 'dzin pa'o/ /so
64b5(mdo sde): sor rtog pa ni/ tshig 'bru sel ba'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ chos brjod du med par rtog pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ sdig pa'i grogs
64b6(mdo sde): po yongs su spong ba'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams la sems snyoms pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ ji skad smras pa'i tshig dang mi 'gal bar byed pa'o/ /gzhan
64b7(mdo sde): yang rtsom pa ni/ rab tu byung ba'i sems so/ /rtul ba ni/ dga' ba dang / mi dga' la mi lta ba'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ dge ba ci zhes tshol ba'o/ /sgrub ba ni/ gzhan la rag ma
65a1(mdo sde): lus par ye shes rab tu thob pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ dgon pa la gnas pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ 'du 'dzin la mi dga' ba'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ dben par
65a2(mdo sde): gnas pa la dga' ba'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ 'dod pa chung ba'o/ /rtul ba ni/ chog shes pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ dgang sla ba'o/ /
65a3(mdo sde): sgrub pa ni/ rung ba la tshod shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims la slob pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ tshul khrims mi lhod pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ lhag pa'i sems
65a4(mdo sde): la slob pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ lhag pa'i shes rab la slob pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ bzod
65a5(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /sgrub pa
65a6(mdo sde): ni| ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ sbyin pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ snyan par smra ba'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ don
65a7(mdo sde): byed pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ don mthun pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ byams pa chen po'o/ /rtul ba ni/ snying rje chen po'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ dga' ba chen po'o/ /sgrub pa ni/
65b1(mdo sde): btang snyoms chen po'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/
65b2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ phung po'i bdud yongs su shes pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ nyon mongs
65b3(mdo sde): pa'i bdud las shin tu 'da'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ 'chi bdag gi bdud rnam par spong ba'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ lha'i bu'i bdud pham bar byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ sdug bsngal
65b4(mdo sde): yongs su shes pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ kun 'byung ba spong ba'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ lam sgom pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ lus la
65b5(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i dran pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa'o/ /gzhan
65b6(mdo sde): yang rtsom pa ni/ dad pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ brtson 'grus so/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin to/ /sgrub pa ni/ shes rab bo/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ mi dge ba'i
65b7(mdo sde): chos spong ba'o/ /rtul ba ni/ dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ lus dang sems las su rung bar byed pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ mngon par 'du bya
66a1(mdo sde): ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la'o/ /rtul ba ni/ lam la'o/ /so sor rtog pa
66a2(mdo sde): ni| zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ reg pa dang / rnam par grol ba la'o/ /gzhan yang rtsom pa ni/ 'jug pa'i spyod pa'o/ /rtul ba ni/ dkar po rnam par mthong
66a3(mdo sde): ba'i spyod pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa ni/ sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o/ /sgrub pa ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes so/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
66a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa brtson 'grus 'bar ba des byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ brtson 'grus de ni/ gang lus dang / sems
66a5(mdo sde): yongs su sbyangs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang rgyu dang / lta ba dang bral ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang ming dang / gzugs yongs su shes pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/
66a6(mdo sde): gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang 'dzin pa dang / 'ching ba 'dor ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang sgrib pa rnams dang / kun
66a7(mdo sde): nas ldang ba rnams rnam par sel ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang 'gyod pa dang / the tshom spong ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang mdud pa rnams dang / zug rdu rnams yang
66b1(mdo sde): dag par sel ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang dmigs pa dang / rgyun chad pa las shin tu 'da' ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgya rnam par spong ba'o//
66b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus de ni/ gzhi dang / gnas las shin tu 'da' ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang ma rig pa dang / srid
66b3(mdo sde): pa'i sred pa rab tu sbyangs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang chags pa dang / zhe sdang kun tu mi rgyu ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang gti mug dang / so sor mi rtog pa dang bral ba'o/ /brtson
66b4(mdo sde): 'grus de ni/ gang nang dang / phyi'i skye mched rnams yongs su shes pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang phung po dang / khams rnams gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/
66b5(mdo sde): gang sems zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang rnam par bsam na chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang gnyis su
66b6(mdo sde): med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ /gang chos nyid gnas par shes pa'o/ /brtson 'grus da ni/ gang 'phro ba med cing mi 'phro ba med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus
66b7(mdo sde): de ni| gang len pa med cing 'dor pa med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang byed pa med cing byed pa dang bral ba ma yin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang gdeg pa med cing gzhag
67a1(mdo sde): pa med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang blang ba med cing dor ba med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang la bcings pa med cing grol ba med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus
67a2(mdo sde): de ni| gang la gnod pa med pa dang / pha rol gnon pa med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang la rgyags pa med pa dang / bag med pa ma yin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang
67a3(mdo sde): la bya ba med cing byed pa po med pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang lta bar mi byed pa dang / rnam par lta bar mi byed pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang zhi bar mi byed pa dang / rab
67a4(mdo sde): tu zhi bar mi byed pa'o/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang srung bar mi byed pa dang / srung ba dang bral ba ma yin no/ /brtson 'grus de ni/ gang kun tu mi 'ong ba dang / 'ong ba dang bral ba
67a5(mdo sde): ma yin pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus 'bar bas brtson 'grus dang rab tu ldan pa'i gtam 'di dag rgya cher yang
67a6(mdo sde): dag par rab tu bshad pa na srog chags khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra bas bcom ldan 'das de las brtson
67a7(mdo sde): 'grus bstan pa de thos nas dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson te/ brtson 'grus brtsams nas gnas par gyur to/ /de brtson 'grus brtsams te
67b1(mdo sde): gces pa ma bor bar lo bye ba 'das pa dang chung ngu'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /de brtson 'grus brtsams te dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson
67b2(mdo sde): pas 'dug bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /de shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi spyan sngar brdzus te skyes par gyur nas des yang de bzhin gshegs pa de las
67b3(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur to/ /de'ang chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pas 'dug bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /
67b4(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub sems dpa' des rnam grangs 'dis sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mnyes par byed cing / gang dag bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas de la
67b5(mdo sde): byung ba thams cad las brtson 'grus brtsams te/ dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson par gyur nas 'dug bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to/ /blo gros
67b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho| de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' go chas ba zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi
67b7(mdo sde): lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ ngas brtson 'grus 'di 'dra bas
68a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dag phyir bsnyil to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ ngas de tsam du brtson 'grus brtsams pa de lta bu de dang / tshogs de lta bus byang
68a2(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ltos/ /gang dag le lo can dang / brtson 'grus dman par gyur pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag la byang chub yod par
68a3(mdo sde): ga la 'gyur te de dag la byang chub shin tu ring zhing rnam par ring ngo / /blo gros rgya mtsho/ bstan pa 'di la brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ dag par 'gyur gyi/ le lo can ni/ ma
68a4(mdo sde): yin no| |blo gros rgya mtsho/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gang la brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa de la byang chub yod par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus
68a5(mdo sde): dang rab tu ldan pa'i sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur to/ /lha dang mi'i skye rgu'i srog chags
68a6(mdo sde): bdun stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ngas dran
68a7(mdo sde): snga ma 'das pa'i dus na ni/ bskal pa me tog 'byung gnas blta sdug la/ /shin tu rnam bltas 'jig rten khams mchog tu/ /brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i bde bar gshegs
68b1(mdo sde): pa byung / bskal pa de la rgyal ba gang byung ba/ /de dag brgyad khri bzhi stong tham pa'o/ /'jig rten khams ni dga' ldan gnas 'dra ste/ /mi yi bza' dang btung ba bsam pas 'byer/
68b2(mdo sde): bud med yod min mngal na gnas pa min/ /sems can thams cad brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa dman pa grags par ma gyur te/ /thams cad bdag nyid che ba'i theg chen zhugs/
68b3(mdo sde): shin tu rnam bltas 'jig rten khams blta'i phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas lhags pa/ /de dag dga' ba'i rnam pa'i ting 'dzin thob /sngon chad ma mthong ba yi bde
68b4(mdo sde): ba myong / /rkang gnyis kyi ni tshogs gyur grags chen po/ /bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa drug yod/ /gzhan yang lha dang mi ni mang po dag /sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la zhugs par gyur/ /
68b5(mdo sde): yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho drang srong che/ /de ni brtson 'grus bsngags pa yang yang brjod/ /de nas brtson 'grus brtan pa mkhas pa de/ /langs nas don 'di nyid ni rgyal la zhus/ /
68b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams gyur pa/ /ji tsam gyis ni brtson 'grus stobs la gnas/ /de don bcom ldan 'das bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bdag ni de la rab tu nan
68b7(mdo sde): tan bgyid/ /de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos rje des/ /brtson 'grus las brtsams yon tan rab gsung ba/ /rtsom pa dang ni de bzhin rtul ba dang / /rtag tu so sor rtog dang sgrub
69a1(mdo sde): pa'o| |rtsom pa de ni byang chug sems zhes bya/ /rtul ba dge ba stong dag sgrub byed pa/ /so sor rtog pa sems can phan pa'i dngos/ /sgrub pa de byed chos la
69a2(mdo sde): bzod pa yin/ /rtsom pa gus par byas te thos tshol ba/ /rtul ba brtan pa yang dag ston byed pa/ /so sor rtog pa 'di ni tshul bzhin brjod/ /sgrub pa gang tshe yang dag lta skye
69a3(mdo sde): ba| |rtsom pa ser sna'i dri ma sel ba yin/ /rtul ba bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong ba/ /so sor rtog pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /sgrub pa gang tshe rnam par mi re ba/ /rtsom
69a4(mdo sde): pa gtong ba chen po gang bsgrubs pa/ /rtul ba slong ba rnams la byams byed pa/ /so sor rtog 'di longs spyod mi rtag snyam/ /sgrub pa byin nas gdung ba med pa yin/ /rtsom pa
69a5(mdo sde): chos kyis longs spyod gang tshol ba/ /rtul ba de ni tshol ba dag pa yin/ /bdag gis snying po blang snyam so sor rtog /sgrub pa sbyin pa byin pas rlom sems med/ /rtsom pa 'chal
69a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims dri ma sel/ /rtul ba tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyams pa med/ /tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sbyin byed so sor rtog /sgrub pa gang tshe tshul khrims rlom
69a7(mdo sde): sems med/ /rtsom pa ngag ni yongs su dag pa ste/ /rtul pa lus ni yongs su dag pa yin/ /so sor rtog pa gang yin 'di sems dag/ sgrub pa gang yin chos rnams
69b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag / rtsom pa gnod sems go skabs med pa yin/ /rtul ba bzod pa'i stobs ni nye bar ston/ /so sor rtog pa bdag dang gzhan srung byed/ /sgrub pa gang tsha rlom sems
69b2(mdo sde): gang med pa/ /rtsom pa gshe la rtag tu dad byed pa/ /rtul pa de dag thag ring spong ba ste/ /so sor rtog pa nang ni zhi ba yin/ /sgrub pa bdag dang gzhan du dmigs pa med/ /rtsom
69b3(mdo sde): pa le lo'i dri ma sel ba ste/ /rtul ba brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu yin no/ /le lo can dag smin byed so sor rtog /de byed chos la bzod pa sgrub pa yin/ /rtsom pa bya ba yang dag
69b4(mdo sde): sgrub byed pa/ /rtul ba bya ba nyams 'og chud par byed/ /theg pa gzhan la mi re so sor rtog /sgrub pa las rnams chud mi gson pa yin/ /rtsom pa yang dag dran dang shes bzhin
69b5(mdo sde): can| |rtul pa chos rtogs pa la 'jug pa yin/ /blo gros kun tu bsrungs pa so sor rtog /sgrub pa de la mos shing 'gyur ba med/ /rtsom pa rig pa rtul ba tshul yin te/ /so sor rtog
69b6(mdo sde): pa de ni chos sgo yin/ /sgrub pa de ni 'byung ba rab tu shes/ /'di dag brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sbyor ba yin/ /rtsom pa tshig 'bru kun tu 'dzin pa ste/ /rtul pa bstan pa yang
69b7(mdo sde): dag ston par byed/ /so sor rtog pa sgra ni sel byed pa/ /sgrub pa chos rnams brjod pa med pa nyid/ /rtsom pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yin/ /rtul ba sdig pa'i grogs
70a1(mdo sde): po rnam par slong / /thos nas chos nyid la ni so sor rtog /sgrub pa chos rnams dang ni 'gal mi byed/ /rtsom pas sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu 'byung / /rtul
70a2(mdo sde): ba dga' ba thams cad spong ba yin/ /dge la gnas pa gang yin pa so sor rtog /chos rnams 'gal ba med pa sgrub pa yin/ /rtsom pa dgon par dga' ba gang thob pa/ /rtul
70a3(mdo sde): ba 'du 'dzin rnam par slong pa yin/ /dben par gnas par dga' ba so sor rtog /sgrub pa gang yin nyon mongs med par gnas/ /rtsom pa 'dod pa chung zhing bka' blo bde/ /
70a4(mdo sde): rtul ba de ni chog shes gyur pa yin/ /nges par gang gyur de ni so sor rtog /sgrub pa gang yin rung ba'i tshod shes pa/ /rtsom pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims slob ces bya/ /rtul ba'i
70a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims lhod pa med pa yin/ /lhag pa'i sems slob 'di ni so sor rtog /lhag pa'i shes rab slob pa sgrub pa mchog /rtsom pa sbyin dang de bzhin tshul khrims yin/ /
70a6(mdo sde): rtul pa bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus so/ /so sor rtog 'di bsam gtan shes rab ste/ /sgrub pa ye shes dang ni de bzhin thabs/ /rtsom pa 'jig rten zang zing chos sbyin
70a7(mdo sde): pa| |snyan par smra ba de ni rtul ba yin/ /don spyod gang yin de ni so sor rtog /sgrub pa don mthun pa ste snying po yin/ /rtsom pa gang yin byams pa yongs su dag /rdul ba
70b1(mdo sde): de ni snying rje ldan pa yin/ /dga' ba chos la so sor rtog pa ste/ /btang snyoms ye shes sgrub par brjod pa yin/ /rtsom pa zhing ni rnam par sbyong ba ste/ /rtul ba mtshan rnams
70b2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /so sor rtog pa dam chos yongs su 'dzin/ /sgrub pa sems can yongs su smin par byed/ /rtsom pa gang yin phung po'i bdud sel ba/ /rtul ba nyon
70b3(mdo sde): mongs bdud ni tshar gcod pa/ /so sor rtog pa 'chi bdag tshar gcod de/ /snying po sgrub pa bdud kyis ci byar yod/ /rtsom pa sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa ste/ /srid pa'i gnas
70b4(mdo sde): med 'di ni rtul pa yin/ /lam sgom gang yin de ni so sor rtog/ 'gog pa shes pa sgrub par brjod pa yin/ /rtsom pa lus la dran pa bcings pa med/ /rtul ba tshor pa la ni
70b5(mdo sde): lta ba med/ /sems la dran pa 'di ni so sor rtog/ chos la dran pa sgrub pa dam pa yin/ /rtsom pa dad pa'i stobs dang de dbang po/ /rtul ba brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu yin
70b6(mdo sde): te| |dran dang ting 'dzin dbang po so sor rtog / shes rab dbang po sgrub par brjod pa yin/ /rtsom pa mi dge rnam par spong zhes brjod/ /rtul ba gang yin dge ba chud mi
70b7(mdo sde): gson| |lus dang sems kyang gang yin so sor rtog / sgrub pa rdzu 'phrul rnams par 'phrul zhes brjod/ /rtsam pa mkhas par byang chub yan lag sgom/ /rtul ba gang tshe lam
71a1(mdo sde): ni rtog pa yin/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong de ni so sor rtog /rig dang rnam grol sgrub pa snying po yin/ /rtsom pa 'jug pa brtul ba spyod pa yin/ /so sor rtag
71a2(mdo sde): pa sems ni rab sbyangs pa/ /mtshan ma'i spyod yul thams cad gang log pa/ /de ni sgrub pa'i tshul du brjod pa yin/ /lus dang sems ni rab tu sbyangs pa dang / /rgyu dang lta
71a3(mdo sde): las rab tu 'da' ba dang / /ming dang gzugs ni yongs su gang shes pa/ /de ni brtson 'grus mchog ces 'phags pas bsngags/ /nga dang nga yi zhes pa nam 'gag pa/ /de tshe
71a4(mdo sde): bcings pa kun las rnam par grol/ /kun nas ldang med sgrib pa lnga las grol/ /mkhas pa the tshom dang ni 'gyod pa spangs/ /mdud pa rnams dang zug rdu bsal ba gang / /bsgribs
71a5(mdo sde): pa med cing rgyun chad yod pa min/ /nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal gang tshe spangs/ /de tshe brtson 'grus stobs kyis las byas yin/ /mtshan ma thams cad sel ba gang yin dang / /
71a6(mdo sde): spros pa thams cad 'jug pa med pa dang / /nyon mongs thams cad spong ba gang yin pa/ /brtson 'grus de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags/ /brtson 'grus 'bar bas rab
71a7(mdo sde): tu bsngags pa'i tshe/ /brtson 'grus yon tan 'di dag thos nas ni/ /grags pa chen po stong phrag bcu kun gyis/ /mi skye'i bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /'di thos nas ni
71b1(mdo sde): stong phrag lnga zhig kyang / /sangs rgyas zhing 'di bzod pa rnam par sbyangs/ /mi dang lha dang lha min mi'am ci/ /bdun stong byang chub mchog rab tu zhugs/ /de na gang gis brtson 'grus
71b2(mdo sde): mchog reg pa/ /dge slong brtson 'grus brtan par nga yin te/ /brtson 'grus brtsams nas ngas ni lus btang ste/ /'dug bzhin de tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas gyur/ /brgyad khri las ni bzhi
71b3(mdo sde): stong lhag pa la/ /bdag gi lus ni rab tu bskams par byas/ /bskal pa gcig la 'dren pa mnyes byas te/ /bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' phyir bsnyil te/ /brtson 'grus
71b4(mdo sde): brtsams pa'i le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// //de nas tshangs pa chen po snying rje chen po sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di
71b5(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba de dag gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/
71b6(mdo sde): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mthos tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sangs
71b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongs
72a1(mdo sde): su chad pa'i rnam pas tshad dang ldan par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su ma chad pa'i rnam pas
72a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam pas tshad med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /tshangs pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa ni/
72a3(mdo sde): byang chub ste/ tshangs pa/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o/ /tshangs pa/ chos thams cad ci 'dra ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang de
72a4(mdo sde): 'dra ba nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas sangs rgyas kyi chos dben pa nyid
72a5(mdo sde): du khong du chud par bya'o/ /chos thams cad stong pas sangs rgyas kyi chos stong pa nyid khong du chud par bya'o/ /tshangs pa/ chos thams cad ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
72a6(mdo sde): dag ste| rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba khong du chud pa ni/ byang chub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad ji ltar gzigs pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang de
72a7(mdo sde): 'dra ba nyid do/ /tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams khams gsum las shin tu 'das pa ma yin nam/ blo gros rgya
72b1(mdo sde): mtshos smras pa/ tshangs pa/ khams gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan ma nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la tha ma'am/
72b2(mdo sde): mchog gang yang med do/ /tshangs pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni/ tha ma'am/ mchog gang yang med do/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni/ nam
72b3(mdo sde): mkha' dang mnyam ste/ de dag la tha ma'am/ mchog gang yang med do/ /tshangs pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid de/ de la'ang tha ma'am/
72b4(mdo sde): mchog gang yang med do/ /tshangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos rtogs pas med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de ltar
72b5(mdo sde): rtogs par bya'o/ /tshangs pa/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ yul na mi gnas pa/ phyogs na mi gnas pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ sngon po ma yin pa/ ser po ma yin pa/
72b6(mdo sde): dmar po ma yin pa/ dkar po ma yin pa/ le brgan ma yin pa/ shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ma yin pa dag ste/ de dag ni/ kha dog med pa/ dbyibs med pa/ rtags med pa
72b7(mdo sde): dag go / de dag ni /mtshan ma med pa dag go /tshangs pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i don ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos kyi don no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi chos kyi don ni/ 'chi 'pho
73a1(mdo sde): mid pa'i tshig gi don no/ /'chi 'pho med pa'i tshig gi don ni/ zhi ba'i don no/ /zhi ba'i don ni/ /dben pa'i don no/ /dpen pa'i don ni/ stong pa'i don no/ /
73a2(mdo sde): stong pa'i don ni/ gnas med pa'i don no/ /gnas med pa'i don ni/ de kho na'i don no/ /de kho na'i don ni/ shin tu skye ba med pa'i don no/ /skye ba med pa'i don ni/ 'gag pa
73a3(mdo sde): med pa'i don no/ /'gag pa med pa'i don ni/ gnas med pa'i don no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ /mtshan ma med pa'i don brjod 'di/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi dam pa ste/ /sangs
73a4(mdo sde): rgyas chos don bstan pa ni/ /'chi 'pho med pa'i tshig ces bya/ /'chi 'pho med don zhi ba'i don/ /rnam par dben pa'i don du bstan/ /dben pa'i don ni stong pa'i don/ /stong pa'i
73a5(mdo sde): don ni gnas med don/ /gnas med don ni de kho na/ /de nyid don ni de bzhin nyid/ /shin tu skye dang bral ba ni/ /'gag pa med pa'i don du bstan/ /'gag pa med don gnas
73a6(mdo sde): med don/ /gnas pa med pa'i chos don tshig /chos dbyings ji ltar gnas pa ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad de ltar gnas/ /chos kun ji ltar gnas pa ltar/ /sangs rgyas
73a7(mdo sde): chos rnams de ltar gnas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos gnas ltar/ /slob pa'i chos rnams de ltar gnas/ /chags med chos ni mtshungs pa'i don/ /de ltar de dag gzhan med
73b1(mdo sde): gnas| |rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang / /'dir ni mnyam pa ji bzhin gnas/ /de lta'i gnas la gnas pa'i chos/ /sangs rgyas chos te bla na med/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams de dag
73b2(mdo sde): ni| |yul dang phyogs na gnas pa med/ /skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yis/ /nam yang rab tu phye ba min/ /gang du'ang chos rnams de dag la/ /dbyibs dang kha dog rnyed mi 'gyur/ /mtshan
73b3(mdo sde): ma med cing rtags med par/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu bstan/ /chos kun rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams de lta'i tshul/ /des na de dag mnyam par bstan/
73b4(mdo sde): khyad par med de mtshan nyid med/ /sangs rgyas chos rtogs 'dod pa yis/ /chos rnams kun la blta bar bya/ /gang tshe cung zad mi dmigs pa/ /de tshe rnam par bltas pa yin/ /
73b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos/ /chos rnams kun kyang thams cad du/ /byang chub snying por drang srong ches/ /de dag yang dag mnyam par rtogs/ /sangs rgyas chos gang sangs
73b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis| |byang chub snying por gang bltas pa/ /sangs rgyas chos bstan de dag ni/ /rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam/ /mnyam ste mi mnyam med pa'i chos/ /nam mkha' lta bu dri
73b7(mdo sde): med par/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mkhyen pas rtogs/ /des 'dir sangs rgyas yin zhes brjod/ /rten cing 'brel par gang byung ba/ /de dag gang la'ang rang bzhin med/ /gang dag ngo bo
74a1(mdo sde): nyid med par/ /de dag gang du'ang 'byung ba med/ /'gro ba mtha' med mnyam par ni/ /gang gis mtha' 'dir rab shes pa/ /de yi ye shes mthar son pas/ /
74a2(mdo sde): chos rnams kun la 'jug par 'gyur/ /chos rnams gang dag 'das pa dang / /chos rnams gang dag ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar byung ba'i chos gang dag /de rnams sangs rgyas
74a3(mdo sde): chos su 'dod/ /de ltar dus gsum rnams la yang / /sangs rgyas ye shes chags pa med/ /gang du yi ges mi chags pa/ /de dag thub pa'i chos su bstan/ /stobs ni rnam pa
74a4(mdo sde): bcu dag dang / /mi 'jigs rnam bzhi gang dag dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rnam pa bco brgyad gang yin dang / /gzhan yang chos gang ci yod pa/ /thams cad
74a5(mdo sde): 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /des ni chos rnams de dag kun/ /sangs rgyas chos zhes brjod pa yin/ /'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po lnga pa/ tshangs pa snying rje
74a6(mdo sde): chen po sems pas gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci rigs kyi bu/ khyod la chos 'di dag mngon sum du
74a7(mdo sde): gyur tam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/ ci sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzugs su bgrang ngam/ smras pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshangs pa/ chos gang gzugs med pa/ bstan du
74b1(mdo sde): med| thogs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med pa de la gang yang mngon sum du 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshangs pa/ de ltar na/ chos thams cad ni/ mngon
74b2(mdo sde): sum ma yin pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la gnyis su cung zad kyang med de/ tshangs pa/ chos thams cad ni/ gnyis su med pa'o/ /de la mngon sum gang yin pa de'ang de'i mtshan
74b3(mdo sde): nyid kho na'o/ /tshangs pa/ mngon sum yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ mngon sum gang yin pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /sangs rgyas kyi
74b4(mdo sde): chos gang yin pa de nyid mngon sum nyid do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon sum ma yin nam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/ gal te de bzhin
74b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rung ste/ 'ga' zhig yang dag par yongs su grub par gyur na ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum
74b6(mdo sde): du 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang med dam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/ chos gang yongs su grub pa med de/ yod pa'am/ med par khas blang du med do/ /
74b7(mdo sde): chos gang yod pa'am/ med par khas blang du med pa de la mngon sum du 'gyur ba gang yang med do/ /smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bstan/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/
75a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la nam mkha' zhes bstan kyang nam mkha' la yang dag par yongs su grub pa gang yang med do/ /tshangs pa/ de bzhin du sangs
75a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bstan kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni/ yang dag par yongs su grub pa gang yang med do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
75a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas bstan pa 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur gyi/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ched du go cha gyon pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /smras pa/
75a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyed de/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /
75a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa/ 'dzin pa dang / mngon par zhen par gyur na/ skrag par 'gyur gyi/ 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med na/ skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnas dang chags
75a6(mdo sde): par gyur na/ skrag par 'gyur gyi/ gnas med cing chags pa med na/ skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par gyur na/ skrag par 'gyur gyi/ ngar
75a7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral na/ skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ stobs gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dag la skrag
75b1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i stobs gang yin/ smras pa/ tshangs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni/ brgyad po 'di dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
75b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dag la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mos pas thogs pa med pa'i
75b3(mdo sde): dad pa'i stobs dang / ston pa dang mtshungs pa'i blos gus pa las nges par byung ba dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi stobs dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs
75b4(mdo sde): par byed pas thos pa las nges par byung ba shes rab kyi stobs dang / bsod nams tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bsod nams las nges par byung ba bsnyen bkur
75b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i stobs dang / bdu thams cad nges par gzhom pa'i phyir tshul bzhin las nges par byung ba ye shes kyi stobs dang / chos rnams bdag med pa la dogs pa med pas
75b6(mdo sde): byams pa chen po las nges par byung ba snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems brjed pa med pas nges par sems pa las nges par byung ba'i sems kyi stobs dang /
75b7(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa las nges par byung ba'i bzod pa'i stobs so/ /tshangs pa/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
76a1(mdo sde): kyi stobs de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dag la skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
76a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so/ /zhes bya ba yin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs de dag legs par bshad pa ni/
76a3(mdo sde): legs so legs so/ /stobs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang thos nas skrag par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de gang yang med do/ /blo gros rgya
76a4(mdo sde): mtshos bstan pa'i sgra de dag thams cad ni/ 'jigs pa'o/ /byang chub kyi don dam pa gang yin pa de'ang brjod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brjod du med pa de ni/
76a5(mdo sde): bsnyad du med pa ste/ de la yi ge rnams kun tu mi rgyu'o/ /de la ni/ sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang kun tu mi rgyu na/ yi ge rnams kun tu rgyu bar 'gyur
76a6(mdo sde): ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di ltar chos zab mo yi ge med pa/ bsnyad du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ smrar med pa 'di lta bu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang yi ge'i
76a7(mdo sde): rnam par rig pas sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams la ston te/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
76b1(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po ji snyed 'jug pa la ltos/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gang la la zhig gis nam mkha' gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa
76b2(mdo sde): rnam par rig pa med pa 'di la tshon sna tshogs kyis ri mo bris te rta pa dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon pa rnams su 'dir nye bar ston tam/ lha dang /
76b3(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i gzugs rnams 'dir nye bar ston na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ /'di la ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de dka' ba byed pa ma yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
76b4(mdo sde): 'das| dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mchog tu dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
76b5(mdo sde): gang dag brjod du med pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams la brjod du med pa'i don de brjod pas rnam
76b6(mdo sde): par rig par byed cing go bar byed pa ni/ de bas kyang ches dka' ba mdzad pa'o/ /gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo 'di dag la mi skrag /mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba
76b7(mdo sde): de dag ni/ de bas kyang ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ /gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo 'di dag la skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ dge
77a1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ mdo sde zab mo 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa
77a2(mdo sde): 'di dag rig nas 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dang / de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa
77a3(mdo sde): dag go / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i phyogs 'dzin pa dag go /blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas
77a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing tshad med pa thams cad rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dbul ba phul na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di la
77a5(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ tshad
77a6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags so/ /bsod nams kyi phung po de ni/ ji tsam du dpe bgyi bar sla ba ma lags pa de tsam du bsod nams kyi phung po de tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /
77a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa kun tu bsrung
77b1(mdo sde): ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed nas mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
77b2(mdo sde): shes sgrub par rig nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ de bas kyang ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ gang de bzhin nyid du
77b3(mdo sde): sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ zang zing gi sbyin pa de thams cad ni/ 'jig rten la brten pa'o/ /chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni/ 'jig rten thams
77b4(mdo sde): cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ yongs su bzung ba bzhi rab tu 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyis
77b5(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba rab tu 'thob pa dang / lhas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ye shes kyis yongs su bzung ba 'thob pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/
77b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'gyur ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang / de
77b7(mdo sde): la bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs rab tu thob pas mi zad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa myur te phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur
78a1(mdo sde): ba ste| blo gros rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'gyur ba bzhi po de dag go /blo gros rgya mtsho/ lha sa yongs
78a2(mdo sde): su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyong ba dang / chos mnyam pa
78a3(mdo sde): la sems rtse gcig tu bya bar 'jug pa dang / de la pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad mi 'byung bar byed pa dang / de la sems ma dang pa thams cad kyang lha rnams kyi dbang gis
78a4(mdo sde): dad par byed pa ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ lhas yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag par 'gro ba bzhi po de dag go /blo gros rgya mtsho/ bsod nams kyis
78a5(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan du 'gyur ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi rgyan dang / sems can
78a6(mdo sde): thams cad mgu bar byed pas ngag gi rgyan dang / bya ba thams cad kun tu ston pas zhing gi rgyan dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong du skye ba rab tu thob pas
78a7(mdo sde): skye ba'i rgyan te/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan du 'gyur ba bzhi po de dag go /blo gros rgya mtsho/ ye shes kyis
78b1(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so sor ci rigs par chos ston pas sems can gyi dbang po snang ba dang / chos kyi sman yang dag
78b2(mdo sde): par sbyor bas nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'gro bas mngon par shes pa snang ba dang / chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs
78b3(mdo sde): su shes pas chos kyi dbyings snang ba ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ /ye shes kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i snang bar 'gyur ba bzhi po de dag go /blo gros rgya mtsho/ /de
78b4(mdo sde): lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pas dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la mngon par brtson par
78b5(mdo sde): bya'o| |blo gros rgya mtsho/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe
78b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam chos gang 'dzin pa/ /de dag phan yon rnam pa mang 'gyur te/ /de las phyogs
78b7(mdo sde): tsam yongs su brjod par bya/ /dper na rgya mtsho'i chu las thigs pa bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam chos gang 'dzin pa/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs la byas gzo yin/ /
79a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod 'dzin yid brtan zhing / /phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i zhing mang po/ /
79a2(mdo sde): rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs la phul/ /zad pa'i dus na ji ltar chos 'dzin ltar/ /bsod nams phung po de tsam 'phel ma yin/ /'jig rten zang zing rgyal la bsti
79a3(mdo sde): stang byas/ /'jig rten byed la nam yang grol mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i chos ni gang tshol ba/ /mkhas pa de ni 'jig rten chos las 'da'/ /de bzhin gshegs
79a4(mdo sde): pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ /lha dang klu dang mi'am ci rnams dang / bsod nams ye shes kyis ni yongs su bzung / /de
79a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing blo ldan 'gyur/ /shes rab rgya chen kun nas ye shes ldan/ /mkhas pa bag chags bcas pa'i
79a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs spong / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /de la bdud kyi skyon chags rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de la 'gyod dang de bzhin dogs pa med/ /de la bcings
79a7(mdo sde): med sgrib pa cung zad med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /zhing stong dag tu nam yang mi skye ste/ /skye ba kun tu de ni rgyal ba mthong / /mthong nas de
79b1(mdo sde): la dad pa rab tu 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /chos kyi bdag nyid chen po skye dran 'gyur/ /yang dang yang du rab tu 'byung ba 'thob/ /spyod pa yongs
79b2(mdo sde): dag sgrub pa snying por byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /tshul khrims thos pas 'phags pa'i chos spyod pa/ /mkhas pa mngon shes lnga la myur du reg/
79b3(mdo sde): ma smad bsam gtan rnam par thar ba 'thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /de ni zab chos rtogs par khong du chud/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul stong nyid the
79b4(mdo sde): tshom med/ /sems can bdag med par yang mos par 'gyur /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /de ni so so yang dag rig pa 'thob/ /'jigs med shes rab
79b5(mdo sde): rno zhing chags med dag / de ni srog chags kun gyi the tshom gcod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /mkhas pa de ni gzungs rnams 'thob par 'gyur/ /bskal
79b6(mdo sde): pa brgyar yang gang thos chud mi za/ /spobs dang ldan zhing chags pa med par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /de la mkhas pa rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur//
79b7(mdo sde): lha dang lha min mi ci'i yid du 'ong / /de la sangs rgyas bu gcig bzhin du bstod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /brgya byin tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten
80a1(mdo sde): skyong / /'khor lo sgyur dang mi yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /bde dang yid bde byang chub de 'tshang rgya/ /de bzhan gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /de lus
80a2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing / /mkhas pa yang lag smad pa med par 'gyur/ /de la lta bas ngoms par yong mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin
80a3(mdo sde): pa| |gang dag chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ston pa'i/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen de la dkon mi 'gyur/ /chos mdzod zad mi shes pa nyan par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i
80a4(mdo sde): chos 'dzin pa/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam par dag/ tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par dag /rnam grol ye shes shin tu rnam par dag /de bzhin gshegs
80a5(mdo sde): pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /de ni byang chub sems brjod 'gyur ba med/ /pha rol phyin pa spyod dang 'gal mi 'gyur/ /dge ba brgya rnams kyis kyang rab tu bzung / /de dag
80a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi yon tan phan yon rnams/ /bskal pa rgyun mi 'chad par rab brjod kyang / /dam chos 'dzin pa'i phan yon 'di dag ni/ brjod pas mtha' mar phyin par mi 'gyur
80a7(mdo sde): ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor
80b1(mdo sde): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ngas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de brjod du
80b2(mdo sde): med do| |zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos brjod du ma mchis pa lag sna dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
80b3(mdo sde): pa| rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ chos gang ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de brjod du med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'on kyang yi ge'i nges pa'i tshig
80b4(mdo sde): gang dag gis brjod du med pa 'dus ma byas kyi chos de bsnyad pa'i ye ge'i nges pa'i tshig de dag gang len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu shes par byed pa dang /
80b5(mdo sde): 'jog pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs
80b6(mdo sde): kyi bu| gzhan yang chos smra ba gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / ston pa dang / sgrub pa'i chos smra ba de dag la gang bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur
80b7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / ldang ba dang / rim gro byed pa dang / gus par byed pa dang / zhes byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / kun tu srung ba dang / sbed pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gos
81a1(mdo sde): dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa dang / legs so/ /zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang / rdzi bo ltar kun tu srung ba dang / dge
81a2(mdo sde): ba srung ba dang / bsngags pa brjod pa dang / mi snyan pa 'chab pa 'di'ang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan
81a3(mdo sde): ma med pa la yid ches pa dang / smon pa med pa la som nyi med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la de kho na nyid du nges par sems pa 'di'ang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
81a4(mdo sde): pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa dang / chos ma yin pas rtsod pa rnams chos dang mthun pas tshar gcod pa 'di'ang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o//
81a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang zhe sdang med pa'i rgyud dang / sems can bsdu ba dang rab tu thar par bya ba'i blo dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la chos sbyin pa 'di'ang
81a6(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang lus dang srog 'dor zhing mdo sde 'di dag kun tu srung ba dang / sbed pa dang / sgrub par dkon pa la gnas pa
81a7(mdo sde): 'di'ang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang chos mnyan pa'i rgyu las byung ba'am/ chos bstan pa'i rgyu las byung bas tha na gom pa gcig 'dor
81b1(mdo sde): ram| tha na dbugs 'byin pa'am rdub pa gcig kyang rung ste/ 'di'ang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang chos thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin cing mi len
81b2(mdo sde): pa 'di'ang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba/ khyod kyis rnam gangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
81b3(mdo sde): d us na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang chos grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na dga' ba 'phags pa'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od rnam par dag par bcom
81b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
81b5(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /
81b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od rnam par dag pa de ni/ bai DUR+ya las grub pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa/ byang chub sems
81b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par brtson pa/ chos zab mo la nges par byung ba nyi tshe'i gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de'i tshe sems can de dag
82a1(mdo sde): gi longs spyod ni/ lha'i bu rab 'phrul gyi dang 'dra bar gyur cing lha'i bu'i gzugs nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de la chos nyan to/ /de na khyim pa dang /
82a2(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba tha dad du bya ba med do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des rigs kyi bu dag /khyed kyis lus srog 'dor
82a3(mdo sde): zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson par bya'o/ /zhes dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i gtam nyid rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de'i tshe
82a4(mdo sde): de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos smra ba zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i
82a5(mdo sde): stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos smra bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang
82a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags/ byang chub sems dpas gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa
82a7(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
82b1(mdo sde): kyi bu| kye ma'o sems 'di ni/ yul la rab tu 'phyar ba ste/ gang de zlog pa dang / yongs su srung ba dang / rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba dang / dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / 'dul
82b2(mdo sde): ba 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig dang / gzugs rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba chos ma yin pa 'di ni/ chos
82b3(mdo sde): ma yin pa'o/ /rna ba dang / sgra rnams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / dri rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang / ro rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
82b4(mdo sde): dang | lus dang / reg bya rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid dang / chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba chos ma yin pa 'di ni/ chos ma yin
82b5(mdo sde): pa'o| |gang mig dang gzugs stong par rig nas mig dang gzugs rnams la rnam par mi rtog cing mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa med pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs
82b6(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa'o/ /gang yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis de gzhan dag la go bar byed pa la mkhas pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra dang / sna
82b7(mdo sde): dang dri dang / lce dang ro dang / lus dang reg bya dang / yid dang chos rnams stong par rig gnas yid dang chos rnams la rnam par mi rtog cing yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa
83a1(mdo sde): med pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de'ang yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis gzhan dag la go bar byed pa la mkhas pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i
83a2(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang chos gang gis chos gang byung ba'i chos de la yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi len pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
83a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'o/ /lta ba gang gis log par lta ba la gnas par byed pa'i lta ba de la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mi len pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /mi shes pa
83a4(mdo sde): gti mug gi ling tog gang gis sems yongs su dkar bar mi 'gyur ba'i mi shes pa'i gti mug gi ling tog de la gang yongs su mi 'dzin cing mi len pa 'di ni/ dam pa'i
83a5(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang bsgrubs nas spang bar bya ba de ni/ chos ma yin/ 'dul ba ma yin no/ /gang bsgrub par yang mi bya/
83a6(mdo sde): spang bar yang mi bya ba 'di ni/ chos so/ /de ni/ 'dul ba'o/ /bsgrubs nas spang bar bya ba'i chos gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi lam ste/ bsgrubs nas spang bar bya ba de ni/
83a7(mdo sde): chos ma yin/ 'dul ba ma yin no/ /bsgrub par bya ba'ang ma yin/ spang bar bya ba'ang ma yin pa gang zhe na/ gang brjod du med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa
83b1(mdo sde): ste| de ni/ bsgrub par bya ba'ang ma yin/ spang bar bya ba'ang ma yin pa'o/ /gang bsgrub par bya ba'ang ma yin/ spang bar bya ba'ang ma yin pa de chos so/ /de ni/ 'dul ba'o/ /ci'i
83b2(mdo sde): phyir de chos yin/ de 'dul ba yin zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams skye bar mi byed pas de'i phyir chos de yin/ de 'dul ba yin zhes bya'o/ /chos dang
83b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa'o/ /gang skye ba med 'gag pa med pa de ni/ zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar zad pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i chos dang /
83b4(mdo sde): 'dul ba de ni/ ji ltar 'byung ba med pa de ltar yongs su bzung ba med do/ /gang yongs su bzung ba med pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar bcom
83b5(mdo sde): l dan 'das ye shes chen po'i stobs bsgrags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa des bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri nyis stong mi skye
83b6(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos smra bas bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste
83b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
84a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
84a2(mdo sde): don 'tshal ba ltar na/ bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ chos ma lags so/ /gang chos ma lags pa de ni/ chos so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
84a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ mngon par zhen pas chos ma lags so/ /gang mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa de ni/ chos so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos dang / chos
84a4(mdo sde): ma lags pa gnyis kyi 'du shes dang ldan pa'i chos thams cad ni/ chos ma lags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'du shes yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa'i chos thams cad ni/
84a5(mdo sde): chos so| |bcom ldan 'das/ don dam par bstan na chos dang / chos ma lags pa mi dmigs so/ /gang la chos kyi 'du shes kyang ma mchis/ chos ma lags pa'i 'du shes
84a6(mdo sde): kyang ma mchis pa de la chos su bgrang ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /gang la chos su bgrang ba gang yang ma mchis pa de mtha' ma lags pa'o/ /gang mtha' ma lags pa de yang
84a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtha'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam mkha'i mtha' ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ nam mkha' la ni/ tshar gcad pa'i mtha' gang yang ma mchis so/ /ji ltar nam mkha'
84b1(mdo sde): la tshar gcad pa'i mtha' gang yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang tshar gcad pa'i mtha' gang yang ma mchis te/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha'i mtha'
84b2(mdo sde): zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis yang dag pa'i bstan pa 'di thos nas de bzhin du yang dag pa nyid du khas len pa de dag ni/ chos gang la'ang
84b3(mdo sde): gnyis su dbye bar khas len pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ chos gang yongs su bzung bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa'i chos gang yang yang dag
84b4(mdo sde): par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de ltar bstan na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa smra ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos su lung ston pa
84b5(mdo sde): lta lags sam/ yang dag pa'i lung bstan pas lung ston pa lta lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yang dag pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
84b6(mdo sde): pa smra ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos su lung ston pa yin no/ /yang dag pa'i lung bstan pas lung ston pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems
84b7(mdo sde): dpa' chos smra bas lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i 'khor de las lha'i bu khris rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba/ de'i tshe de'i
85a1(mdo sde): dus na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra bar gyur pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/
85a2(mdo sde): de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i phyir yon tan gyi
85a3(mdo sde): rgyal po snang ba/ ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye bar bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyod la gtad do/ /gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / kun chub
85a4(mdo sde): par bya ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'khor 'di'i mdun du ngas khyod la bcol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung 'di gsungs ma
85a5(mdo sde): thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu stan las langs te mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di gzung
85a6(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed
85a7(mdo sde): kyis chos ji lta bu zhig la gnas te ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye bar bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ri dbang gi rgyal po zhes
85b1(mdo sde): bya ba der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus dang srog la lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/
85b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis lus dang srog la mi lta bar bgyis la bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal brtsegs rgyal
85b3(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ thams cad bor la 'phags pa ma lags pa dang stan pa thams cad pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan
85b4(mdo sde): ' das| bdag gis rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad bor la 'phags pa ma lags pa dang stan pa thams cad yongs su spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
85b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' tog chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos dang chos ma lags pa gnyis kyi 'du shes dang ldan pas dam
85b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos thams cad gnyis dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyis te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar
85b7(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |byang chub sems dpa' dpal sbas kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/
86a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar
86a2(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |byang chub sems dpa' sgron ma 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gti mug gi mun pa'i spyod yul gyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom
86a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ bdag gis chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bgyis la chos thams cad la gti mug gi mun pa dang bral bar bgyis te dam pa'i chos yongs
86a4(mdo sde): su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog ltas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan la rag las pa'i ye shes kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus
86a5(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par mngon sum gyi ye shes thob par bgyis te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang
86a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kun tu sbas kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dbang po phal pa dang 'khrul pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das
86a7(mdo sde): bdag gis dbang po thams cad dang sgo dang skye mched thams cad shin tu sbas shing shin tu brtul la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
86b1(mdo sde): 'od dri ma med pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can dang chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
86b2(mdo sde): gis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyis te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyad
86b3(mdo sde): par du 'gro bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mnyam par ma bzhag cing g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
86b4(mdo sde): gis mnyam par bzhag la mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' deng dpon gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ /lam
86b5(mdo sde): shes pa'i cho ga ma 'tshal cing lam ngan par zhugs pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis lam shes pa'i cho ga 'tshal bar bgyis
86b6(mdo sde): la sems can rnams lam ngan pa las yang dag pa'i lam la rab tu dgod cing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros legs pas gsol
86b7(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ dogs pa'i sems the tshom du gyur pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dogs pa dang bral zhing the tshom
87a1(mdo sde): thams cad spangs la dogs pa'i zug rngu thams cad bsal ba thob par bgyis te dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis
87a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos la mi gnas shing sgrub pa nyams pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis chos la gnas shing
87a3(mdo sde): sgrub pa snying por bgyis te sems can rnams yang dag pa'i nan tan la rab tu dgod cing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba mthong
87a4(mdo sde): bos gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /shes rab 'chal pa chos kyi snang ba dang bral bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ /bcom ldan 'das/
87a5(mdo sde): bdag gis shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas shing chos kyi snang ba dang ldan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems
87a6(mdo sde): dpa' zhe 'gras pa med pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang / /sems can rjes su mi srung ba'i blos dam pa'i chos yongs
87a7(mdo sde): su gzung bar mi nus te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang / /sems can rjes su srung ba la gnas pas dam pa'i chos yongs su
87b1(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam dag blo gros kyis gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can gyi dbang po la mi mkhas shing sems can gyi spyod pa'i cho
87b2(mdo sde): ga ma 'tshal bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis sems can gyi dbang po dang / /spyod pa shes pa la zhugs la dam pa'i chos yongs
87b3(mdo sde): su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i rgyal pos gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /chos la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa bdag dang sems can dang chos
87b4(mdo sde): la gnas pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing 'khor gsum yongs su dag
87b5(mdo sde): la bdag dang sems can dang chos la ma gnas par bgyid cing bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i tog gis gsol pa/
87b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ /'jig rten 'di ni/ /'di lta ste/ /chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / /ma byung ba la skrag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis ni/ /chos thams
87b7(mdo sde): cad ma skyes pa dang / /ma byung bar 'tshal nas skrag pa ma mchis/ /kun tu skrag pa ma mchis shing chos gang la'ang nye ba'am ring bar mi gnas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam
88a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub la ring ba'i 'du shes can gyis dam pa'i
88a2(mdo sde): chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas byang chub
88a3(mdo sde): lus dang sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin par mthong ngo snyam pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar nus so/ /byang chub sems
88a4(mdo sde): dpa' yon tan gyi rgyal po snang bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yon tan la mi gnas shing yon tan dang bral la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer bas dam
88a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis yon tan thams cad dang ma bral zhing byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yang dag pa la gnas te de
88a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson pas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur
88a7(mdo sde): gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di skad du bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ngo / /zhes de skad mchi ba'i 'jig rten de ni/ rnam par smra ba legs
88b1(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas chos gang ma brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa de la yongs
88b2(mdo sde): su gzung ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su mi gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa 'dor du stsal ba'i
88b3(mdo sde): slad du snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'di gzung bar bgyi/ chos gang yang 'phros par mi bgyi/ 'phros pa dang bral bar yang mi bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
88b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal/ legs so legs so/ /de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ ngas chos gang yang ma thob par byang chub kyi
88b5(mdo sde): snying po la 'dug go/ ma thob bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po las langs so/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs sam/ ci nas gang
88b6(mdo sde): 'di skad du ngas ma thob bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po las langs zhes gsung / gal te bzhugs na ni/ byang chub la gnyis 'jug par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang gzhan la
88b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po'ang gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub ni/ gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
89a1(mdo sde): dpal| nga byang chub kyi snying po'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug go / nga'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi snying po'i ngo bo
89a2(mdo sde): nyid de| byang chub kyang de'i ngo bo nyid/ sems can thams cad kyang de'i ngo bo nyid/ chos thams cad kyang de'i ngo bo nyid do/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub kyi snying por gang ngas mngon
89a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid gcig pa'o/ /ro gcig pa'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub kyi snying po las
89a4(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i chos gang yang ma gzigs so/ /byang chub mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mnyam pa nyid ni
89a5(mdo sde): chos gang gi grangs su 'gro ba ma yin te/ grangs med pa/ grangs dang bral ba'o/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus ma byas pa zhes bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin gshegs
89a6(mdo sde): pa ni| 'dus ma byas thob pa ste/ 'dus byas thams cad las shin tu 'das so/ /'jam dpal/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la mos pa de dag thams cad
89a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol bas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol nas chos nyid de las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
89b1(mdo sde): g ang dag byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros rgya mtsho dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing
89b2(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir legs par lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang
89b3(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'di dag kyang mthong ba dang / chos zab mo bstan pa 'di'ang thos pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /gang du
89b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas par 'gyur pa de na sangs rgyas byung bar blta'o/ /gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur pa der chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar blta'o/ /
89b5(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'am de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
89b6(mdo sde): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang rnyed pa legs pa rnyed pa dag go /bcom
89b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed kyis ji ltar byang chub sems dpas rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa shes sam/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
90a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnyed pa ni/ bcu po 'di dag ste/ rnyed pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab bar 'gyur ba dag go/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di sta ste/ sangs
90a2(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa rab tu 'thob pa dang / mthong nas kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas de la dad pa rab tu 'thob pa dang / sems dad nas chos mnyan pa rab tu 'thob
90a3(mdo sde): ba dang / chos thos nas kyang the tshom ma mchis pa rab tu 'thob pa dang / the tshom ma mchis nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'thob pa dang / rab tu byung nas kyang 'tsho ba yongs su
90a4(mdo sde): dag pa rab tu 'thob pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag nas kyang chos bstan pa la mkhas pa rab tu 'thob pa dang / tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'thob pa dang
90a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems ma brjed nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos mnyan pa rab tu 'thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos nas kyang sgrub pa rab tu
90a6(mdo sde): 'thob pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnyed pa bcu po de dag ni/ rnyed pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dag go /de la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
90a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dag ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa zhes bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag /khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
90b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnyed pa de dag legs par smras pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum khri drug stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
90b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa rdzogs te/ /'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa phyed gong ma'o// //bam po drug pa/ de
90b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong bar bgyi ba dang /
90b4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bla na med pa thob par bgyi ba'i slad du ji tsam du theg pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa bgyid par gyur pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /
90b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams ni/ gang lags/ theg pa chen po la gces spras bgyid pa'i chos rnams ni/ gang lags/ theg pa chen po la dka'
90b6(mdo sde): ba bgyid pa'i chos rnams ni/ gang lags/ theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams
90b7(mdo sde): ni| gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du theg pa chen po la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
91a1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i
91a2(mdo sde): chos gcig ste/ chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems brjod pa med cing bag yod pa ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di ni/ theg pa chen po sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos

91a4(mdo sde): par smin pa la yid ches pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ bstan pa'i chos dang mi 'gal ba yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ de sdug

91a7(mdo sde): chos gcig ste/ chos sgrub pa'i snying po byed pa'i chos rjes su dran pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa'i dag 'dun rjes su dran

92a1(mdo sde): cad yongs su gtong ba la zhum pa med pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ rang gi tshul khrims kyis tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed

93b1(mdo sde): kyis rnyed pa gzhan dag dang kun tu 'ged pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa la mkhas pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ shes pa thams cad la
93b2(mdo sde): slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ ma bslab pa rnams bslab pa la sbyor zhing mi brnyas pa'o/ /gzhan yang chos gcig ste/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa
