126b2(mdo sde): gsum yongs su dag pa'i lung bstan pa ste/ gang la sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa med pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa med pa dang / lung bstan pa'i bstan par 'du shes pa med pa
126b3(mdo sde): 'di ni| 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ gang la bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / sems can du 'dzin pa
126b4(mdo sde): med pa dang / chos su 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni/ gang la ming du 'dzin pa med pa dang / gzugs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dmigs par 'dzin
126b5(mdo sde): pa med pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni/ 'das pa la zad par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la ma phyin par shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba la gnas pa med par shes
126b6(mdo sde): pa'o| |gzhan yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni/ lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang / ngag la brag ca lta bur shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma lta bur shes pa'o/ /gzhan
126b7(mdo sde): yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni/ phung po rnams la chos kyi phung po dang mnyam pa nyid dang / khams rnams la chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa nyid dang / skye mched rnams la grong stong lta
127a1(mdo sde): bur so sor rtog pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la yid ches pa dang / smon pa med
127a2(mdo sde): pa la som nyi med pa ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de lta bas na/
127a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya'o/ /'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ de nas bcom
127a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo 'tshal
127a5(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos 'tshal ba 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ci 'dra lags/ de skad
127a6(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub
127a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams sngon gyi shugs kyis bya ba byed de/ de dag gang gi tshe mnyam par ma bzhag par gnas pa de'i tshe na'ang sngon 'phangs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di brgya
127b1(mdo sde): lam na'ang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i phyir skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig dpe bstan pas bshad pa'i don shes par 'gyur bas khyod la dpe bya'o/ /blo
127b2(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang gi tshe bu ram shing gi zhing ngam/ 'bras sA lu'i zhing ngam/ rgun 'brum gyi zhing rnang sgal byas par gyur pa de la mi zhig gis rnang
127b3(mdo sde): thams cad la yur ba ci rigs par btod nas rka nas chu phab ste yal bar bor nas nyal ba dang / de nas mi de nyal yang yur ba ji lta btod pa bzhin du chu 'bab ste/ de la mi
127b4(mdo sde): de brtson par bya mi dgos shing sgrim mi dgos par rnang thams cad chus gang bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par ma bzhag kyang
127b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi rgyud rnams la yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ thabs kyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
127b6(mdo sde): cad kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /de bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag cing tshul khrims kyi phung po kun tu bsrungs pa'i phyir mnyam par bzhag par gnas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de
127b7(mdo sde): dag sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi phyir yongs su bsngo zhing / sngon gyi smon lam legs par btab pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi rgyud rnams rlan par byed do/ /blo
128a1(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa las langs kyang rung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sngon shin
128a2(mdo sde): tu 'phangs pa dang / sems las su rung ba dang / dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang / theg pa dman pa dang bral ba dang / theg pa chen por smon lam btab pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams brgya
128a3(mdo sde): lam na'ang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su mi bsngo mi srid par 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ re sul chen po zhig na shing zhig skyes par gyur
128a4(mdo sde): la de mi zhig gis rtsa ba nas gcad par brtsams nas de chod ma thag tu gang du yo ba dang / gang du phyogs pa der 'gyel lo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
128a5(mdo sde): dpa' yang yun ring po nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gsog ste bsags nas kyang thams cad
128a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcad par bya ba'i
128a7(mdo sde): phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed/ lus kyi rgyan dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed/ tshig gi rgyan dang / chos bstan pa don
128b1(mdo sde): yod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed/ sems kyi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yeng bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ sgrim pa
128b2(mdo sde): med cing lhun gyis grub par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/ /sngon thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngos pa des theg pa gzhan du mi ltung
128b3(mdo sde): zhing mnyam par bzhag kyang rung / langs kyang rung ste/ brgya lam na'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur mi srid do/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di
128b4(mdo sde): lta ste| dper na/ dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe gaN+Di'i sgra la gnas par byas te snyoms par zhugs na/ gaN+Di'i sgra de de'i 'gog pa la'ang mi gnas ma 'brel
128b5(mdo sde): mod kyi| gaN+Di'i sgra des 'gog pa las ldang ngo / /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la
128b6(mdo sde): gnas par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya/ yongs su dgrol bar bya'o/ /zhes byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par sgrub pa'i byams pas sems
128b7(mdo sde): can thams cad khyab par byas nas zab pa/ zab mor snang ba/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa mi rgyu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang de sngon sems can rab tu
129a1(mdo sde): thar par bya ba'i snying rje chen po la gnas pa de dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi sar mi ltung / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ste/ dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ting
129a2(mdo sde): nge 'dzin de las langs nas yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub cing sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di ltar zhi ba'i ting
129a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyang nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol bar mi ltung ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su sbyang ba byed pa'i
129a4(mdo sde): khyad par la ltos/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gnyis shig yod pa la de la mi gcig ni/ bdag rdo rje'i go cha bgos nas me 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs/ mi gcig
129a5(mdo sde): shos ni| bdag rtswa dang / sog ma'i go cha bgos nas me 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ /'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de gnyis las gang tshig par 'gyur/ gang
129a6(mdo sde): tshig par mi 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi gang rdo rje'i go cha 'tshal nas zhugs 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs pa de ni/ rdo rje'i go cha des yongs su bsrungs pas zhugs
129a7(mdo sde): kyi nang du mchis kyang mi 'tshig go / bcom ldan 'das/ mi gang rtswa dang / sog ma'i go cha 'tshal nas zhugs 'bar ba'i nang du mchongs pa de ni/ der mchongs ma thag tu tshig par
129b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rtswa dang / sog ma ni/ 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid lags te/ zhugs kyis 'tshig pa srung mi bzod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
129b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ ji ltar rdo rje'i go cha bgos pa'i mi de me'i nang du song yang mi 'tshig pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'byams pa chen po dang / snying rje'i go
129b3(mdo sde): cha dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sra ba'i rdo rje'i go cha bgos nas sems can rab tu thar par bya bar dmigs pa la gnas te chos thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
129b4(mdo sde): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar rtogs pa'ang btang la zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing nyan thos dang rang sangs
129b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa la'ang mi 'jug / 'bras bu thob par yang mi byed par ting nge 'dzin de'ang myong zhing zil gyis mnan cing ma nyams ma snad par ldang ngo / /langs nas kyang
129b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ ji ltar rtswa dang / sog ma'i go cha bgos pa'i mi de mchongs ma thag tu
129b7(mdo sde): mes tshig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du blo gros rgya mtsho/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa srid pa la kun tu 'bar bar blta ste/ sems can rnams yal
130a1(mdo sde): bar bor nas snying rje chen po dang bral te zhi ba zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la reg nas gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang brgyad pa la 'bras bu ma thob
130a2(mdo sde): par ldang ba de ni/ gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos ni/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs ma bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bsod nams dang /
130a3(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pa ste/ de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar skabs su yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do//
130a4(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma
130a5(mdo sde): byung ba'i chos thams cad la me 'bar ba lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed la chos de dag la'ang so sor brtag par bya/ chos de dag shes pa la'ang rnam par dpyad par bya zhing yang
130a6(mdo sde): dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ yongs su bsngo
130a7(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos zab mo rnams la'ang spyod la bar skabs su yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ yongs su bsngo ba
130b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ci la bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po de nyid la sems gzhol ba dang / 'dun pa dang / mngon par phyogs pa dang / yongs su phyogs te theg pa gzhan du ma yin pa'o/ /
130b2(mdo sde): de'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdza mkhan gyis 'jim pa'i gong bu 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag kyang ma bskor na/ snod kyi ming mi 'thob ste/
130b3(mdo sde): 'dzim pa'i gong bu nyid kyi grangs su 'gro'o/ /gang gi tshe bskor bar gyur pa de'i tshe snod kyi ming 'thob bo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mang
130b4(mdo sde): po bsags pa'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsdos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob kyi/ gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos par gyur pa de'i tshe pha
130b5(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gser dul ma'i gar bu yongs su ma bsgyur na/ rgyan gyi ming mi 'thob ste/ gser gyi gar bu nyid kyi grangs su
130b6(mdo sde): 'gro'o| |de nyid yongs su bsgyur na/ rgyan gyi ming 'thob bo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang yongs su ma bsngos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming
130b7(mdo sde): mi 'thob kyi/ de nyid yongs su bsdos na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpas rtag par rgyun du 'dres pa med pa'i yid kyis dge
131a1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i byang chub sems
131a2(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ chos zab mo rnams la'ang spyod la bar skabs su yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do/ /yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ dgu pa'o// //de nas
131a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khrul pa 'di snyed cig srung yang 'khrul
131a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba ni/ bgyid dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags kyis kyang byang chub sems dpas thams cad du yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa dang / thabs la
131a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ thabs kyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
131a6(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs kyang bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'khrugs par mi 'gyur te/
131a7(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa des bgyi ba thams cad kyang ston la bgyi bar ltung bar yang mi 'gyur/ chos mnyam pa nyid la'ang gnas la sems can log pa nyid du mchis pa rnams la
131b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa nyid kyi nges par gyur pa'i slad du chos kyang ston cing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs kyi par du bdag nges par gyur pa der yang mi ltung ngo / /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
131b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ /de de bzhin no/ /ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpas thams
131b3(mdo sde): cad du thabs la mkhas pa 'dod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub yod kyi/ thabs la mi mkhas pa la ni/
131b4(mdo sde): byang chub med do/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ snod gcig gi nang du tshon sna gsum ste/ sna gcig ni/ kha dog sngon po/ /sna gcig ni/ kha dog dmar po/ sna gcig ni/
131b5(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog lta bu ser po blugs la tshon gyi snod gcig pu der ras kha bsgyur ba gsum ste/ gcig ni/ ras shog po yug sngon por kha bsgyur ba/ gcig ni/ ras phran yug
131b6(mdo sde): dmar por kha bsgyur ba/ gcig ni/ ras bcos bu rin thang med pa ser po gser gyi kha dog lta bur kha bsgyur ba zung gcig bcug la/ de dag snod gcig gi nang du bcug ste bstsubs
131b7(mdo sde): na| ji ltar kha bsgyur ba'i bye brag bzhin du tshon 'dzin te/ gang tshon sngon pos kha bsgyur ba de ni/ kha dog sngon por 'gyur/ gang tshon dmar pos kha bsgyur ba de ni/ kha dog dmar por
132a1(mdo sde): 'gyur| gang tshon ser po gser lta bus kha bsgyur ba de ni/ kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur yang snod de la ni/ rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba gang yang med do/ /
132a2(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i snod gcig la gang zag gsum ste/ gcig ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa/ gcig ni/ rang
132a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa/ gcig ni/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa btsud la de dag tshud pa dang / gang gis ci 'dra ba'i bsam pa dang / sems kyi tshon bsags pa de
132a4(mdo sde): 'dra bar de ye shes kyi tshon yongs su 'dzin kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i snod la ni/ rnam par rtog pa gang yang med do/ /de la ras shog po'i yug
132a5(mdo sde): lta bur ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa blta'o/ /ras phran gyi yug lta bur ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa blta'o/ /rin thang med pa'i ras bcos bu'i zung lta bur ni/ theg pa chen
132a6(mdo sde): po la yang dag par zhugs pa blta'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos rnams ni/ snying po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/
132a7(mdo sde): bdag po med pa ste/ 'di ltar ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar rnam par sgrub ste rnam par bsgrubs kyang sems pa ma yin/ rab tu rtogs pa ma yin pa la ltos/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos rnam
132b1(mdo sde): par sgrub pa 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos gang la'ang yongs su skyo ba mi bskyed do/ /de de ltar ye shes mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/ 'dir gang la'ang
132b2(mdo sde): phan pa'am gnod pa mi byed do/ /de ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa ni/ snying rje chen po'i go cha de'ang mi 'dor ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/
132b3(mdo sde): dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+ya rin thang med pa/ shin tu byang ba/ shin tu rnam par dag pa/ shin tu dri ma med pa rdzab kyi nang du bcug nas lo stong lon la de lo stong 'das nas rdzab
132b4(mdo sde): de nas phyung ste bkrus shing yongs su sbyangs te byi dor byas na/ shin tu dag cing shin tu yongs su dag la shin tu byang nas de nyid ngag pa dri ma med pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin mi
132b5(mdo sde): 'dor ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar rab tu shes la de'ang glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon
132b6(mdo sde): mongs pas nyon mongs pa can du byas par mthong ngo / /de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ nyon mongs pa 'di dag ni/ sems can rnams kyi sems rang bzhin
132b7(mdo sde): gyis 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa med kyi/ nyon mongs pa de dag ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa las byung du zad pas bdag gis sems can de dag gi glo bur gyi nyon
133a1(mdo sde): mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan nus so snyam nas de zhum pa'i sems mi skyed kyi/ de de bas kyang shas cher sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i
133a2(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa skyed do/ /de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ nyon mongs pa de dag la ni/ stobs dang / mthu cung zad kyang med de/ nyon mongs pa de dag ni/ stobs med pa/ nyam chung ba
133a3(mdo sde): dag go / de dag ni/ yang dag pa la cung zad kyang mi gnas kyi/ nyon mongs pa de dag ni/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dag ste/ de dag la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
133a4(mdo sde): tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags na 'khrugs par mi 'gyur bas bdag gis de dag la ci nas kyang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtag par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams
133a5(mdo sde): dang mi 'dre ba ni/ legs pa yin gyi/ 'dre ba ni/ ma yin no/ /gal te bdag nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dre bar gyur na/ nyon mongs pa'i bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can
133a6(mdo sde): r nams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba spang ba'i phyir ji ltar chos bstan gyis bdag nyon mongs pa rnams dang mi 'dre bar byas la nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba spang ba'i phyir sems
133a7(mdo sde): can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o/ /bdag sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir gang dag 'khor ba'i rgyun byed la dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon
133b1(mdo sde): mongs pa de dag dang mi 'dre bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'khor ba'i rgyun byed la dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs
133b2(mdo sde): yongs su btsal bar mi ngoms pa dang / bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas dang phrad par smon pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs
133b3(mdo sde): su mi skyo ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la spro ba dang / chos 'dod pa'i bag la nyal mi 'dor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin
133b4(mdo sde): pa la sbyor ba rnams yongs su mi gtong ba'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de dag dang
133b5(mdo sde): 'dre'ang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos so/ /blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i rtsa ba lags na/ ci'i slad du nyon mongs pa rnams zhes bgyi/
133b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum dang 'dre zhing khams gsum pa ni/
133b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa las byung ba yin yang de la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ thabs la mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas bsam bzhin du khams gsum dang 'dre'o/ /de'i
134a1(mdo sde): phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste/ khams gsum du 'dre bas de skad bya yi/ sems nye bar nyon mongs pas ni/ ma yin
134a2(mdo sde): no| |blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon nam khyim bdag cig la bu sdug pa/ phangs pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ blta ba dang mthun pa gcig pu zhig yod par gyur la/ khye'u
134a3(mdo sde): de'ang byis par gyur pas gar byed bzhin du khron pa btsog pa zhig tu lhung ba dang / de nas khye'u de'i ma dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dag gis khye'u de khron pa btsog par
134a4(mdo sde): lhung bar mthong la/ mthong nas kyang sgra cher phyung ste mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don gyi/ khron pa btsog pa der zhugs te bu gcig pa de mi 'byin la/ de nas khye'u de'i pha 'ongs
134a5(mdo sde): t e des bu gcig pa khron pa btsog par lhung ba de mthong la mthong nas kyang bu gcig pa de la bsam pa thag pa nas byams shing rjes su chags pas mi smod par myur du skyen par
134a6(mdo sde): la gor du khron pa btsog pa der zhugs te bu gcig pa phyung ba 'di lta bu 'di ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ ji tsam du don shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa yin no/ /'dir don du blta
134a7(mdo sde): ba gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ khron pa btsog pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi tshig bla dwags te/
134b1(mdo sde): de dag la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa ltar 'du shes so/ /ma dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du zhes bya ba de ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag rnams kyi
134b2(mdo sde): tshig bla drags te/ de dag ni/ 'khor bar lhung ba'i sems can rnams mthong na/ mya ngan byed cing smre sngags 'don gyi/ 'byin ni/ mi nus so/ /tshong dpon nam khyim bdag ces
134b3(mdo sde): bya ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dwags te/ de ni/ sems dag cing dri ma med de dri ma dang bral la 'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon sum du gyur kyang sems can yongs su smin
134b4(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du khams gsum du mtshams sbyor ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po ste/ gang nyon mongs pa'i bcing
134b5(mdo sde): b a thams cad las shin tu yongs su grol yang thabs mkhas pas srid par skye ba nye bar len la shes rab kyis yongs su zin pas rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis kyang gnod
134b6(mdo sde): pa med cing nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
134b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dri ma ma mchis shing dri ma dang bral te/ de dag kyang 'khor ba la mi smod cing chos zab mo la ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas kyang 'dus ma byas su mi ltung
135a1(mdo sde): zhing 'bras bu'ang thob par mi bgyid pa ni/ bgyi dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems
135a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi yan lag gnyis dang rab tu ldan pa'i lam ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gang gi tshe byang chub
135a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te dag par gyur pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
135a4(mdo sde): ba la mi smod cing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye bar yang 'dzin pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub
135a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'du byed thams cad la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar so sor
135a6(mdo sde): rtog pa 'di ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang gi tshe snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas su mi ltung zhing 'bras bu thob par yang mi
135a7(mdo sde): byed pa 'di ni/ de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du bya ba'i chos gang
135b1(mdo sde): yang mi mthong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi khams kyi mnyam pa/ sems can gyi khams kyi mnyam pa gang yin pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'i
135b2(mdo sde): dbyings kyi mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mnyam pa gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa 'di ni/
135b3(mdo sde): de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams gcig tu rab tu shes shing mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyang mngon sum du mi byed la/ sems can gyi
135b4(mdo sde): khams la lta bas chos kyi dbyings la mi lta bar yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i thabs la mkhas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang sbyin pa dag pa ni/ shes rab bo/ /yongs su bsngo ba
135b5(mdo sde): dag pa ni/ thabs so/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dag pa ni/ shes rab bo/ /yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni/ thabs so/ /mdor bsdu na/ dge ba'i
135b6(mdo sde): rtsa ba thams cad dag pa ni/ shes rab bo/ /yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni/ thabs so/ /blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
135b7(mdo sde): su bug pa ni/ gang lags/ yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni/ gang lags/ shes rab dag pa ni/ gang lags/ thabs dag pa ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo
136a1(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni/ gang bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang bral bar dge ba'i rtsa
136a2(mdo sde): ba de dag gsog pa'o/ /yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni/ gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su 'dris par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub tu yongs su
136a3(mdo sde): bsngo ba'o/ /shes rab dag pa ni/ gang sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes so/ /thabs dag pa ni/ gang sems can thams cad la so
136a4(mdo sde): so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni/ gang srid par 'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad la mi gnas par dge ba'i rtsa
136a5(mdo sde): ba de dag thams cad gsog pa'o/ /yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni/ gang theg pa thams cad la yang dag par gzhol pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la
136a6(mdo sde): byed pa dang bral bar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo'o/ /shes rab dag pa ni/ gang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
136a7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'joms pa'o/ /thabs dag pa ni/ sems can gang dag yongs su smin par byed pa de dag don mthun pas theg pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/ /gzhan
136b1(mdo sde): yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag na rin po che'o/ /yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni/ gang sems can thams cad dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang /
136b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo ba des yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par
136b3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'o/ /shes rab dag pa ni/ gang gzungs kyi phyag rgyas btab nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin cing chud mi za bar byed pa'o/ /thabs dag pa ni/ gang
136b4(mdo sde): spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / spobs pa chags pa med pa dang / chos bstan pa don yod pas legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa'o/ /
136b5(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag pa ni/ gang tshe rabs tshe rabs dag tu byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o/ /yongs su bsngo ba dag pa ni/ gang byang chub kyi sems ma
136b6(mdo sde): brjed par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /shes rab dag pa ni/ gang mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de byang chub kyi sems su shes pa'o/ /

137a1(mdo sde): gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag 'di
137a2(mdo sde): snyam bgyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi byang chub ni/ kun tu 'gro ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das/
137a3(mdo sde): de dag gi byang chub ma lags pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni/ byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan
137a4(mdo sde): 'das/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub la ring ba'i 'du shes mi bgyi'o/ /yul drug po dag gi nang nas chos gang de la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba

137b1(mdo sde): rnams la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ni/ byang chub ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ /khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ /

137b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
137b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob cing byang
137b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas lus las 'od 'di lta bu phyung ste/ 'od rab tu phyung ba nges phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med bgrang ba

138a1(mdo sde): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de ga la ba de logs su me tog

138a3(mdo sde): bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyi me tog bkram pa gcig pu gnas par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i lha gang dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'

138b5(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod do/ /dpag tshad brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi re re la yang grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong bzhi stong yod par gyur to/ /grong khyer re re yang grong dang / tshong

139a2(mdo sde): dngul dang / shel dang / bai dUr+ya dang / rin po che sna bzhi las grub par gyur to/ /de na bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / yongs su spyad pa dag bsams pa

139a7(mdo sde): mtsho/ de'i tshe de'i dus na grong khyer chen po dga' ba 'byung ba der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yul shin du rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
139b1(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che

139b4(mdo sde): yul shin tu rnam par dag pa da'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med ni/ bye ba phrag bzhi yod de/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang 'dra ba/

141b3(mdo sde): po la gnas pa rnams yin/ gong nas gong ma'i khyad par 'dod pas rgya chen po la mos pa rnams yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos

142a2(mdo sde): byed pa dang / chos thams cad brjod du med par yang rab tu shes la yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis sems can rnams la chos kyang ston cing dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin
