142a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ thabs dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa rnams yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'
142a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ rgyang ring du'ang lta la/ rtsa ba'ang ma chad pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi snying po la'ang lta la byang chub kyi
142a7(mdo sde): sems kyang mi 'dor ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la'ang lta la rang gi shes pas kyang zhum pa med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba la'ang lta la ji ltar
142b1(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la'ang lta la tshe dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba la'ang mi smod pa rnams yin te/
142b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rgyang ring du'ang lta zhing rtsa ba'ang ma chad pa rnams yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub
142b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yul yang 'byor la bag yod pa'ang mi 'dor ba rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ mi yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
142b4(mdo sde): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por yang gyur la 'du byed la mi rtag par so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/ lha yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
142b5(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du'ang gyur la 'du byed sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha yongs su smin
142b6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir bdud nyid du'ang nye bar ston la chos la bdag med par so sor rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin/ tshangs ris kyi lha yongs su smin
142b7(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir tshangs pa dbang bsgyur du'ang gyur la mya ngan las 'das pa la zhi bar rtog pas yul 'byor kyang bag med par mi 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub
143a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ yul yang 'byor la bag yod pa'ang mi 'dor ba rnams yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang
143a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ don zab mo'i tshul la mi skrag pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang
143a3(mdo sde): dag phyi rol tu mi byed par rgyun du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub zab mo 'di yang dag par rab tu ston pa la brten pa dang / mdo sde zab mo tshul 'di lta bu de dag mnyan pa'i phyir dpag tshad
143a4(mdo sde): brgyar yang 'gro ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la tshul bzhin du dpyod pa dang / don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub
143a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ don zab mo'i tshul la mi skrag pa rnams yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
143a6(mdo sde): po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus
143a7(mdo sde): dang / sems can thams cad la yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la brtson pa'i stobs
143b1(mdo sde): kyis rnam par gnon pa dang / 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi skyo bar brtson pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/
143b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das
143b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des bzhi pa sgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
143b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /dge slong bye ba phrag brgyad len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams
143b5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor ni/ chung ngu'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ /rgyal po chen po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa ni/ rno ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos
143b6(mdo sde): la bzod pa skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal srid thams cad bcom
143b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de la yongs su spyad pa'i phyir phul lo/ /'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po dgu pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
144a1(mdo sde): pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas des rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rgyal
144a2(mdo sde): srid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la phul zin na/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod dad pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhig /de ci'i
144a3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni/ don che ba/ phan yon che ba/ rgya che ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ rab tu byung bar gtogs
144a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i thob pa chen po ni/ nyi shu po 'di dag ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa bla na med pa'i thob pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dag go /nyi shu po gang zhe na/
144a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rgyal srid dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug 'dor bas nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa thob pa dang / khyim nas 'byung ba la
144a6(mdo sde): gzhol bas nyon mongs pa las byung ba thob pa dang / dur smrig 'dzin pas rnyog pa med pa'i sems thob pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pas dgang sla ba dang /
144a7(mdo sde): gso sla ba thob pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa yang dag par len pas 'dod pa che ba dang / sdig pa 'dod pa spong ba thob pa dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po
144b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye ba thob pa dang / byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug thob pa dang / dgon pa dben pa na gnas pas 'du 'dzi dang mi 'dre ba thob
144b2(mdo sde): pa dang / gnod pa med pas chos sems pa'i bde ba thob pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub pas sems las su rung ba thob pa dang / thos pa yongs su tshol
144b3(mdo sde): bas shes rab chen po thob pa dang / nga rgyal med pas ye shes chen po thob pa dang / don nyung zhing byed pa nyung bas chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad
144b4(mdo sde): la sems mnyam ba nyid pas byams pa chen po thob pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar byed pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po thob pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta
144b5(mdo sde): bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa thob pa dang / sems rab tu sbyangs pas mngon par shes pa chen po thob pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa
144b6(mdo sde): dang / tshul bzhin gyis chos la so sor rtog pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa thob pa dang / yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i spyod pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa
144b7(mdo sde): rab tu thob pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thob pa chen po nyi shu po 'di dag rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas
145a1(mdo sde): na| khyod legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhig / blo gros rgya mtsho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po yul shin tu rnam par
145a2(mdo sde): dag pa rab tu 'byung ba yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas rgyal srid thams cad spangs/ rgyal srid kyi dpal yang spangs te khyim na gnas pas yid byung bas skra dang / kha spu bregs
145a3(mdo sde): te gos ngur smrig bgos nas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de rab tu byung par rig nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor kyang
145a4(mdo sde): rab tu byung ngo / /de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams kyang rab tu byung ngo / /de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i bu mo gzhon nu ma rnams kyang rab tu byung
145a5(mdo sde): ngo / /de dag rab tu byung bar rig nas rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'ang rab tu byung ngo / /de ltar de dag rab tu byung nas
145a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos tshol ba la yongs su brtson pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas so/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ sems can bsod nams byas pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur
145a7(mdo sde): pas ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab mdzes par gyur pa la ltos/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ de nas rgyal po chen po yul shin tu rnam par dag pa de ltar rab tu byung nas bcom
145b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gang la sgrub
145b2(mdo sde): pa snying por bgyid par gnas shing don mchis par yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa bdag la stsal du gsol/ de
145b3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das des dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong / khyod kyi ming ni/ yul shin tu rnam par dag pa
145b4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /khyod song la rang gi yul rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig /rang gi yul la tshul bzhin gyis so sor rtogs shig /ci nas kyang yul drug po dag gi nang
145b5(mdo sde): nas chos gang khyod la snang bar 'gyur ba de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa khong du chud pas byang chub mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar so sor rtogs shig / byang
145b6(mdo sde): chub la ring ba'i 'du shes ma byed cig / nye ba'i 'du shes kyang ma byed cig /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa la gdams ngag
145b7(mdo sde): 'dis gdams pa dang gcig pu dben par brtun cing shes bzhin dang ldan la bag yod par gnas te rang gi yul la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go / de'i tshul bzhin
146a1(mdo sde): gyis so sor rtog pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi yul ni/ stong pa nyid kyi yul lo/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/ /sems
146a2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/ /rna ba'i yul ni/ stong pa nyid kyi yul lo/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/ /sems can
146a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/ /de bzhin du sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi yul ni/ stong pa nyid kyi yul lo/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul ni/ sems can
146a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi yul lo/ /sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid kyi yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/ /mig gi yul ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i yul lo/ /mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni/
146a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/ /sems can thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pa'i yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/ /yid kyi bar gyi yul ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i yul lo/ /
146a6(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i yul ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/ /sems can thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pa'i yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/ /de bzhin du mig gi yul
146a7(mdo sde): ni| smon pa med pa'i yul lo/ /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i yul lo/ /ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba'i yul lo/ /ma byung ba'i yul ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yul lo/ /sems
146b1(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang ma byung ba'i yul te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul lo/ /de bzhin du yid kyi bar gyi yul dang sbyar ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar dge slong yul shin tu rnam par dag pa yul la
146b2(mdo sde): 'jug pa 'dis lus dang sems las su rung ste 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgoms pas ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa
146b3(mdo sde): lnga bskyed par gyur to/ /bag yod pa'i spyod pa des kyang don dang nges par byung ba'i tshig thams cad sdud pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rab tu thob bo/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gang
146b4(mdo sde): ' khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'byor pa spangs te bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas yul shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong du gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin
146b5(mdo sde): ba snyam du khyod dogs shing yid gnyis su gyur tam/ the tshom za na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong yul shin
146b6(mdo sde): tu rnam par dag ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dag dge slong rab tu byung ba de'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang bor
146b7(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag gzhan dag cig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta ste/ chos ma nyan pa'i phyir gang dag khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag go/
147a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
147a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
147a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ de lta bas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
147a4(mdo sde): bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpas tshig tu byas shing tshig lhur blang bar mi bya'i/
147a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya bar bya'o/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas su
147a6(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di ni/ brjod par sla'i/ dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgrub pa ni/ dka' snyam pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
147a7(mdo sde): la las chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer te kho bos sems can khyod chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o/ /zhes byas la mang du thos pa dang / de las gzhan
147b1(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la'ang brtson par mi byed na/ de sems can de dag la slu ba yin te/ de ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma yin no/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/
147b2(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer te kho bos sems can khyod chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o/ /zhes byas la mang du thos pa
147b3(mdo sde): dang | de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la'ang brtson par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa yin no/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/
147b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon pos grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad la sang zan sbyin no/ /zhes mgron du bos la yal bar bor te bza' ba dang btung ba ma sbyar na /
147b5(mdo sde): des skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bslus pa yin te/ de dag kyang bza' ba dang / btung ba'i zas ma thob pas 'phya zhing slar 'ong ba de bzhin du/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub sems
147b6(mdo sde): dpas ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sems
147b7(mdo sde): can thams cad dbugs phyung la mang du thos pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la'ang brtson par mi byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ ji skad
148a1(mdo sde): smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma yin te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba yin no/ /de lta bu de sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mthong na/ 'phya
148a2(mdo sde): zhing gzhogs 'phyas byed la rnam par smod de/ gang dag mchod sbyin bya bar dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i mchod sbyin gyi bdag po byed pa de dag ni/ dkon no//
148a3(mdo sde): de bas kyang gang dag mchod sbyin chen po de brtsams na bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dag ni/ ches dkon no/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub sems
148a4(mdo sde): dpas gang gis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu bar 'gyur ba'i tshig brjod par mi bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang la la zhig gis byang chub sems
148a5(mdo sde): dpa' gang la chos kyi don bya bar gsol ba btab la/ de la byang chub sems dpas kho bos khyed kyi chos kyi don 'di yongs su thob par bya'o/ /zhes tshig smras par gyur na/
148a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas de la lus ni/ yongs su gtang bar bya'i/ sems can bslu bar ni/ mi bya'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /
148a7(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ sngon byung ba'i 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang chos grangs med pa dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na seng+ge'i rgyal po dar dkar lta bu'i
148b1(mdo sde): ral pa can yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad la byams pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la mos pa zhig ri'i phug bgrod
148b2(mdo sde): dka' ba zhig na gnas so/ /ri phug bgrod dka' ba de na spre'u pho mo gnyis shig kyang gnas so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na spre'u mo de la bu 'brangs nas de las phru gu gnyis byung ngo / /
148b3(mdo sde): de nas spre'u de dang / spre'u mo des phru gu de gnyis ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ge la gtams te spyod yul du dong ngo / /de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri ba zhes bya ba steng gi bar snang las babs
148b4(mdo sde): te spre'u'i phru gu de gnyis blangs nas steng gi bar snang la gnas par gyur pa dang / ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ges bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri bas spre'u'i phru ge de gnyis khyer ba mthong ngo / /mthong
148b5(mdo sde): nas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bya rgod rgyal po khyod la bdag gsol ba/ /bdag gi spre'u phrug de gnyis khyed kyis thong / /bdag ni de dag 'jigs med bya phyir gnas/ /skyabs
148b6(mdo sde): su dong ba ma bsad khyed kyis thong / /de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal pos ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ge de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ri dwags rgyal po gal te khyod ni bdag 'dor na/ /de ltar na ni
148b7(mdo sde): 'di gnyis mi gsad gtang bar bya/ /kho bos 'di gnyis thos nas kho bo mkha' la gnas/ /khyod ni khros par gyur kyang bdag la ci byar yod/ /ri dwags kyi rgyal pos yang smras pa/ bdag
149a1(mdo sde): ni gtang gi yongs su bza' bar gyis/ /bdag gi spre'u phrug gnyis ni gtang bar gsol/ /byang chub zhugs pa dam bcas srung bar byed/ /mkhas pa dag ni
149a2(mdo sde): brdzun du smra ba med/ /bdag rdzun 'gyur du 'ong ste lhag bsam pas/ /de nas drang srong chen po lus 'dor te/ /de nas lhag pa'i bsam pas dgar gyur nas/ /sems can rnams kyi
149a3(mdo sde): ched du lus gtong ngo / /de nas bya rgod kyi rgyal po des rmad du byung ba de mthong nas nam mkha' la gnas te ched du brjod de ched du brjod pa/ gang dag gzhan phyir rang gi lus 'dor
149a4(mdo sde): ba| |de dag 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir bder 'tsho/ /kho bos spre'u phrug 'di gnyis gtang bar bya/ /khyod kyang 'tsho zhing ring du chos spyod cig /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
149a5(mdo sde): ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng+ger gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dwags kyi rgyal po
149a6(mdo sde): seng+ger gyur to/ /'od srung chen po ni/ spre'ur gyur to/ /ser skya bzang mo ni/ spre'u mor gyur to/ /sgra gcan zin dang / kun dga' bo ni/ spre'u phrug tu gyur to/ /dge slong phreng ba bzang po
149a7(mdo sde): ni| de'i tshe de'i dus na bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lus ni/ yongs su gtang bar bya'i/
149b1(mdo sde): skyabs su dong ba rnams ni/ yongs su gtang bar mi bya ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub
149b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyin pa smra ba ni/ ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar snang ba 'di ni/ de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/ /de ltar na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa
149b3(mdo sde): yin no| |byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims smra ba ni/ ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing spyod par
149b4(mdo sde): kun tu snang ba 'di ni/ de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa smra ba ni/ de skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang spong bar snang ba 'di ni/ de'i
149b5(mdo sde): de bzhin byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus smra ba ni/ ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson 'grus snang ba 'di ni/ de'i de bzhin
149b6(mdo sde): byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan smra ba ni/ ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snang ba
149b7(mdo sde): 'di ni| de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smra ba ni/ ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe rab tu dbye ba'i spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas
150a1(mdo sde): par snang ba 'di ni/ de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar dag spong bar smra ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs
150a2(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya ba smra ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smra ba ste/ gang gi tshe mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la
150a3(mdo sde): brtson par snang ba 'di ni/ de'i de bzhin byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang bsam pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /g.yo med cing sgyu med pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /sbyor ba ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /
150a4(mdo sde): sbyor ba nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /rtsom pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /rtsom pa la zhum pa med pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ ji skad
150a5(mdo sde): smra ba'o| |de la ma chags par khyad par du 'gro ba ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /dam bcas pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ni/ de bzhin byed
150a6(mdo sde): pa'o| |thos pa kun tu 'dzin pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /thos pa sgrub pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /tshig gis yang dag par blangs pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /lus dang / sems zhum pa
150a7(mdo sde): med pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /nga rgyal med pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa ni/ ji skad
150b1(mdo sde): smra ba'o| |bslab pa ma nyams pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /sems dang po bskyed pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /mi skye ba'i chos la
150b2(mdo sde): bzod pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /
150b3(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs pa brtan pa ni/ ji skad smra ba'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba ni/ ji
150b4(mdo sde): skad smra ba'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par byed pa ni/ de bzhin byed pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu ni/ ji skad smras
150b5(mdo sde): pa de bzhin byed pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu
150b6(mdo sde): thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du de bzhin
150b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas ji skad smras pa de bzhin bgyid pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di thams cad bstan pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
151a1(mdo sde): sgrub pa 'di'ang ji skad smras pa de bzhin bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod sgrub pa shes sam/ gsol pa/
151a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod sgrub pa las rtsoms la spobs par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
151a3(mdo sde): sgrub pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ gang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du 'tshal nas yang dag pa nyid kyi nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas kyang mngon
151a4(mdo sde): sum du'ang mi bgyid pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgrub pa yang dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ri dbang rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
151a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ bdag kyang sgrub pa las brtsams te spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /gsol pa/
151a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ sgrub pa ni/ sgrub pa ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad ma dmigs te/ gang
151a7(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang / gang la sgrub pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi rgyal po snang bas
151b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang la sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pa de la sgrub pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos
151b2(mdo sde): thams cad la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de chos gang la'ang mi gnas pa lags so/ /gang chos thams cad la'ang mi gnas pa de nyid de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang
151b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lhun po'i sgron me'i rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lta ba ma mchis pa ni/ sgrub pa lags te/ lta ba dang bcas pa la sgrub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom
151b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad gdeg pa ma mchis pa dang / gzhag pa ma mchis pas chos gang la mi lta ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags
151b5(mdo sde): so| |byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas pa ni/ g.yo ba lags te/ mi gnas pa la g.yo ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
151b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas par mi bgyid pa de ni/ mi g.yo'o/ /gang mi g.yo ba de chos thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs te/ 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /
151b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten ni/ sems kyis spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten ni/ sems kyis rgyug go/ rjes su rgyug go/
152a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can thams cad sems ma mchis par gyur pa de ni/ mi sems mi rtog ste/ 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang
152a2(mdo sde): dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal du gsungs te/ bcom
152a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang tshor ba thams cad kyi rgyun bkum nas tshor ba ma mchis shing len pa ma mchis kyang tshor ba 'gog pa la'ang reg par mi bgyid la snying
152a4(mdo sde): rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' glang chen spos kyi bal glang gis gsol pa/
152a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni/ phung po lnga la lta bas glags par gyur pas khur gyis non pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
152a6(mdo sde): p hung po lnga yongs su btsal ba dang ldan te khur myur du 'dor ba de byis pa so so'i skye bo phung po lnga la lta bas glags par gyur pas khur gyis non pa rnams kyi khur spang ba'i
152a7(mdo sde): phyir chos ston kyang chos thams cad ma skyes shing mngon par grub pa ma mchis pas chos gang la'ang yang dag pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa
152b1(mdo sde): lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i sgrub pa lags kyi yang ba'i sbyor ba ma legs te/ bcom ldan
152b2(mdo sde): 'das| byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par bgyi'o/ /de la yang dag pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid pas gang chos thams
152b3(mdo sde): cad mnyam pa nyid du 'tshal ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang thabs dang shes rab
152b4(mdo sde): kyi ye shes kyis ma skyes pa las kyang skye/ ma byung ba las kyang 'byung yang skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa la mi gnas pa 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang
152b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dpal brtsegs rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
152b6(mdo sde): yang mthong la snying rje chen po'i go cha de'ang mi 'dor zhing rtsol ba'ang don mchis par mthong ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer thogs pa
152b7(mdo sde): med pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu ba'i gnas ji tsam pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so/ /ji tsam du bdud kyi las lags pa de tsam du sgrub pa ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/
153a1(mdo sde): rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i gnas la gnas pa la ni/ bdud kyis glags mi rnyed de/ bdud kyi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sgrub pa
153a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag chos 'ga' zhig yongs su 'grub par 'tshal
153a3(mdo sde): ba de dag gi 'bad pa don ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad yongs su grub pa ma mchis par yang 'dir 'tshal la 'tshal ba gang lags pas
153a4(mdo sde): kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid pa 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngan spong gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag 'gyur ba dang / rnam
153a5(mdo sde): par rtog pa la spyod pa de dag la sgrub pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa ni/ sgrub pa ste/ gang 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang /
153a6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa ni/ sems can gyi sems kyi rang bzhin lags so/ /sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni/ sgrub pa yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes
153a7(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug par
153b1(mdo sde): bgyi ste| gang 'dir sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams kyang sems ma lags par sems 'tshal ba la 'jug pa 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems
153b2(mdo sde): dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nye bar zhi ba ni/ sgrub pa lags te/ ma zhi ba la ni/ sgrub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
153b3(mdo sde): gang sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba de rtog pa dang / spong bar mi bgyid de/ rtog pa dang spong ba dang bral ba mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa
153b4(mdo sde): 'di ni| de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni/
153b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa thob par bgyid pa lags te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas mi brtan pa ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis kyang brtan/
153b6(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kyang brtan te/ bsod nams mnyam pa nyid pas ye shes mnyam pa nyid/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid pas bsod nams mnyam pa nyid/ bsod nams dang
153b7(mdo sde): ye shes mnyam pa nyid pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid bas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang
154a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dus dpog rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa ni/ sgrub pa lags te/ bcom
154a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du bar 'tshal nas chos gang yang 'byed par yang mi bgyid/ sbyor bar yang mi bgyid
154a3(mdo sde): pa 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' don legs sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ don la rton pa lags kyi tshig 'bru la ma
154a4(mdo sde): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang don gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i blos chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong kun tu 'dzin pa dang / ston par bgyid kyang yang dag
154a5(mdo sde): pa'i don brjod du ma mchis pa de las kyang mi g.yo ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
154a6(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pa ni/ sgrub pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa de ni/ skad dang / tshig dang / brjod pa lhur len pa ma
154a7(mdo sde): lags kyi/ de ni/ yang dag pa'i sgrub pa tshol ba lags te/ ji ltar 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar tshol ba 'di ni/ de'i sgrub pa yang dag pa lags
154b1(mdo sde): so| |byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dri ma med pa sems pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gos dri ma can bkru bar bgyi'i/ dri ma ma mchis pa ni/ ma lags
154b2(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du sems yongs su ma dag pa ni/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
154b3(mdo sde): dpa' gang gi sems dang / yid la nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'jug pa de dag pa'o/ /dag pa gang lags pa de sgrub pa yang dag pa la gnas ba zhes
154b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa 'di ni/ tshegs chung ngus
154b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa yang dag par 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la gnas shing bdud kyi lcags kyu las mi 'da' ba de
154b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad ni/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa lags so/ /gang dag bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' ba de dag thams cad ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
154b7(mdo sde): su zin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lcags kyu las shin tu 'da' bar 'tshal bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi/
155a1(mdo sde): bsten par bgyi/ bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus sgrub pa yang
155a2(mdo sde): dag par 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud
155a3(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu rnams shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho
155a4(mdo sde): g ang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom ste myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
155a5(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar khyod bdud kyi lcags kyu bstan pa las brtsams te spobs par gyis shig / blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
155a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag gis bdud kyi lcags kyu bshad par bgyi'o/ /bdud kyi lcags kyu rnams gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi lcags kyu ni bcu gnyis po 'di
155a7(mdo sde): dag ste| bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na mi phangs pa'i dngos po yongs su gtang ba'i sems
155b1(mdo sde): 'jug gi/ phangs pa'i dngos po yongs su gtang ba'i sems mi 'jug pa dang / sems can gang dag de la dga' bar gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par bgyid sems can gang dag dga'
155b2(mdo sde): bar ma gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par mi bgyid cing des dngos po tha dad du bgyid sems can tha dad du bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa dang
155b3(mdo sde): rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste dang po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can du gyur te/ so sor thar pa'i sdom
155b4(mdo sde): pas bsdams/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs/ kha na ma tho ba phra rab la'ang 'jigs par lta/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag /bslab pa'i gnas yang dag par blangs pa rnams la
155b5(mdo sde): slob ste| de tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang bram ze la bsnyen cing bsten la bsnyen bkur bgyid de/ tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can rnams la khro ba dang / sdang ba dang / zhe 'gras
155b6(mdo sde): par bgyid cing tshul khrims de nyid kyis bdag la bstod de gzhan la smod na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste gnyis pa'o/ /
155b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa sgrub ste/ lus kyis kyang bzod/ ngag gis kyang bzod na sems kyi gnod pa bgyid de sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams
156a1(mdo sde): la ni| bzod/ sems can nyam chung ba rnams la ni/ mi bzod pa/ sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la ni/ bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston/
156a2(mdo sde): sems can nyam chung ba rnams la ni/ gnod sems kyi sems kyi stobs nye bar ston te/ de re zhig ni/ bzod/ re zhig ni/ mi bzod/ kha cig la ni/ bzod/ kha cig la ni/ mi
156a3(mdo sde): bzod la/ de gang gi tshe bzod pa de'i tshe bzod pas rgyags te rlom sems su bgyid/ gang gi tshe mi bzod pa de'i tshe ni/ myur du so sor mi 'chags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/
156a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ gsum pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams par
156a5(mdo sde): gyur la| de brtson 'grus brtsams par gnas par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid kyi/ theg pa chen po la sems can
156a6(mdo sde): yongs su smin par mi bgyid/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam rgyun du ston gyi/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab par bgyid/ 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba la zhal ta bgyid
156a7(mdo sde): par brtson gyi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yongs su mi tshol/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas dga' ba thob ste/ 'di lta ste/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang /
156b1(mdo sde): bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod par bgyid de/ de la gzhol/
156b2(mdo sde): de la 'bab/ de la bab par gyur kyang thos pa yongs su btsal ba dang / thos pa bstan pa dang / thos pa la so sor brtag pa dang / thos pa sgrub par brtson 'grus mi rtsom na/ bcom ldan
156b3(mdo sde): 'das| 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ bzhi pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan
156b4(mdo sde): bzhi skyed/ gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi skyed cing sgrub ste/ de dag la rgyun du mang du gnas par gyur la/ de zhi ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la gnas
156b5(mdo sde): shing sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la smod/ chos bstan pa la smod/ sems can dang 'dre ba la smod/ bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams la smod cing mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed
156b6(mdo sde): kyi ro myang bar bgyid cing / gcig pur dga' bas dga' ba thob ste/ 'bad ba chung ngus gnas par gyur nas bsam gtan las ldog par yongs su mi tshol gyi/ 'dod pa'i khams
156b7(mdo sde): dang / gzugs kyi khams la gsad par 'du shes shing gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams kyi ro myang bar bgyid la/ de lus dman pas gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams rnams su skye bar
157a1(mdo sde): bgyid cing lha tshe ring po rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de der skyes nas kyang gang sangs rgyas mang po/ sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po/ sangs rgyas
157a2(mdo sde): stong phrag mang po mnyes par mi bgyid pa de'i gnas ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang bral bar 'gyur/
157a3(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ de'i dbang po rnams blun
157a4(mdo sde): zhing rtul ba'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ de nas shi 'phos nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang rtul ba'i rgyud can du 'gyur zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid che bar 'gyur ba
157a5(mdo sde): 'di ni| bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ lnga pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
157a6(mdo sde): dpa' shes rab dang ldan par gyur te rkyen shin tu mthong ba'i slad du rgyu yongs su shes pa dang ldan par gyur/ rgyu ma mchis pa dang / rgyu dang bral ba dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba
157a7(mdo sde): ma mchis par gyur te/ bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams la smod/ thabs dang bral/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par mi bgyid/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
157b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson par mi bgyid la/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mchog /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
157b2(mdo sde): phyin pa ni/ khyad par du 'phags pa ste/ de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni/ dman pa'o snyam na/ de'i dbang po yongs su ma smin pa btang snyoms su ltung ba ste/ bsdu ba'i
157b3(mdo sde): dngos po bzhis sems can rnams mi sdud cing spros pa ma mchis pa/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa de nyid kyi ro myang bar bgyid pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
157b4(mdo sde): dpa'i shes rab dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ drug pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dgon par gyur te/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la
157b5(mdo sde): mngon par dga' zhing 'dod pa chung la chog shes te rab tu dben cing khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre ste/ de don nyung ba dang / bgyi ba nyung bas bde bar gnas te g.yo
157b6(mdo sde): ba ma mchis kyang mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa la brtson par mi gnas/ chos kyi 'bel ba'i bka'
157b7(mdo sde): mchid dang / don rnam par nges pa'i bka' mchid bgyi ba la rgyun dgum par sems te/ yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ma lags/ dge ba ci zhes tshol ba la mi brtson /de dgon
158a1(mdo sde): pa la gnas pa dang / gcig pur dga' bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi rgyu ba ste/ de kun nas ldang ba gnon pa tsam gyis dga' ba thob cing bag la
158a2(mdo sde): nyal yang dag par gzhom pa'i slad du lam sgom par mi bgyid/ de de na bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don gyi slad du brtson par mi 'gyur ba 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
158a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i dgon pa la gnas pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ bdun pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos par gyur
158a4(mdo sde): te| chos kyi gtam can ni/ tshig mnyan par 'os pa/ tshig gzung bar 'os pa/ snyan pa sna tshogs kyi gtam can dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang de zang zing gi
158a5(mdo sde): slad du chos ston te/ zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis ma lags/ gang las de'i gos dang / zas dang / ma la cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams mchi bar
158a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag la chos ston gyi/ sems can gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing dang ba mang ba/ legs par bshad pa'i don 'tshal nus shing stobs dang ldan pa zang zing gis de
158a7(mdo sde): rjes su 'dzin par mi bgyid pa de dag la chos mi ston pa dang / gang dag de la bged par bgyid pa/ dman pa/ dman par gyur pa/ gti mug gi rang bzhin can/ chos rgya chen
158b1(mdo sde): po'i snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston pa dang / de zang zing gis spags pa'i rgyud des gang dag chos bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ snod du ma gyur pa de dag la chos ston cing gang
158b2(mdo sde): dag bstan par bgyi ba de dag la mi ston pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos bstan pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ brgyad pa'o/ /bcom ldan
158b3(mdo sde): 'das| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rgyang phan pa yongs su tshol te/ de gzhan dag la zab mo'i bka' mchid rgyun bkum nas 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i bka' mchid sna
158b4(mdo sde): tshogs ston te/ de 'jig rten rgyad pan pa'i bka' mchid ston pas 'jig rten dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba'i tshig dang / lan gyi tshig la mkhas pas sems can rnams dga' bar
158b5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de la legs so legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba'ang stsol bar 'gyur la/ des kyang byang chub sems dpa' yid rangs par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong
158b6(mdo sde): ba| chos zab mo la mos pa/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dus par gyur pa de dag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid ma rangs nas gang 'jig rten gyi dga' bas mngon par dga' ba'i
158b7(mdo sde): sems can de dag la zab mo'i gtam gyi rgyun bcad de 'jig rten rgyad pan pa'i gtam sna tshogs ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ dam pa'i chos nub par byed pa yin gyi/ dam pa'i chos yongs
159a1(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don zab mo'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung gi /'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam sna tshogs kyi phyir ma yin
159a2(mdo sde): no| |zhes mchi zhing 'khor de nas mchi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i bka' mchid sna tshogs
159a3(mdo sde): bgyid kyi| zab mo'i bka' mchid 'chab pa de ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba nub par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bka'
159a4(mdo sde): mchid zab mo 'chab cing 'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ dgu pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen
159a5(mdo sde): ltar bcos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po gang dag de la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / dam
159a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang / don nyung zhing bgyid pa nyung ba la
159a7(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la rgyun du mang du ston pa dang / theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la mi ston pa dag la bsnyen cing
159b1(mdo sde): bsten te bsnyen bkru bgyid pa dang / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pas theg pa chen po las ldang ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas gdon mi za bar zhal ta byed
159b2(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor la/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal te bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor ba de'i tshe dben pa la sbyor zhing mtshan ma
159b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang / rgyu dang bcas pa'i bzod pa'i sa nye bar ston gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul gang lags pa de dag de la mi ston to/ /byang chub sems
159b4(mdo sde): dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul de dag gang lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul lags so/ /bcu po
159b5(mdo sde): de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i rtsa ba la rab tu gnas te dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba
159b6(mdo sde): bzhin du dge ba'i chos ci zhes yongs su tshol ba dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa gnas te yang dag pa'i brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / bag mchis par las bgyid pa chud mi gzon pa
159b7(mdo sde): dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags par rtag par rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mtshan dang dpe
160a1(mdo sde): byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa
160a2(mdo sde): rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sas mi gos par bgyi ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa
160a3(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las shin tu bzla ba'i slad du thabs la mkhas pa yongs su tshol ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
160a4(mdo sde): dpa'i las yang dag par yang dag phul lags te/ gang dag la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bgyi ba de dag de la mi ston pa dang / de la 'di skad du byang chub ni/ byang chub sems
160a5(mdo sde): dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i yin gyi/ le lo can gyi ma yin no/ /gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs
160a6(mdo sde): ma rgyas na/ phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /zhes mchi la/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la byang chub sems
160a7(mdo sde): dpa' gang sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid pa'i gnas mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi
160b1(mdo sde): lcags kyu ste/ bcu pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/ de nga rgyal des bla ma rnams dang / sbyin
160b2(mdo sde): gnas rnams dang / pha ma dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams dang / de las gzhan pa bla ma lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun tu 'dud pa dang / 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud par mi
160b3(mdo sde): bgyid cing de lam gus par gyur pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la mkhas pa/ khyad par thob pa/ gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/ byang chub sems
160b4(mdo sde): dpa'i bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin pa de dag gi gan du mi mchi/ mi bsnyen/ mi bsten/ bsnyen bkur mi bgyid/ yongs su mi 'dri/ yongs su 'drir mi stsol cing de ma thos pa'i chos
160b5(mdo sde): nyan par mi bgyid/ thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid| de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa/ chos
160b6(mdo sde): ngan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de dag kyang de bzhin du de'i rjes su 'jug par gyur pa dang / de dman pa la sten cing khyad par dang bral bas 'di lta ste/ zhan pa'i 'gro
160b7(mdo sde): ba| blun pa/ 'on pa/ lkug pa'i 'gro ba/ 'gro ba dman pa nyid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis gram pa'i sa phyogs su
161a1(mdo sde): shing tsam+pa ka bskrun la chab stsol bar mi bgyid kyi/ gang nas chab mchi bar mthong ba'i phyogs der yang gor ma dang / gyo mo dag gis bkum na/ bcom ldan
161a2(mdo sde): 'das| de ltar na/ zhugs shing tsam+pa ka chab dang bral ba de la yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga phre'u ma chags pa rnams kyang chags par mi 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang /
161a3(mdo sde): yal ga phre'u chags pa rnams kyang bskams te dgo sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems bskyed la nga rgyal gyis
161a4(mdo sde): khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur na/ de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos mnyan pa dang bral te/ ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mi nyan/ thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs
161a5(mdo sde): su dkar bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhol ba'i phyogs na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de gzhol
161a6(mdo sde): ba'i slad du chu klung thams cad dang / chab mig dang / 'bab chu thams cad tshegs chung dus der 'bab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa
161a7(mdo sde): bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la gus pa'ang tshegs chung ngus chos zab mo'i sgo rnams rna ba'i dbang po la grags par 'gyur ro/ /de dran pa la'ang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
161b1(mdo sde): 'das| de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs/ nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te bla ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams la kun tu mi 'dud cing 'dud par mi bgyid la rab
161b2(mdo sde): tu mi 'dud na/ bcom ldan 'das/ kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyus zhin par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i nga
161b3(mdo sde): rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ bcu gcig pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la phyug cing nor che ba dang /
161b4(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba nor mang la mdzod dang bang ba mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / rus dang / rigs dang / g.yog 'khor dang / bsod nams kyi
161b5(mdo sde): tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson zhing de gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug gi stobs kyis
161b6(mdo sde): rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rab tu byung bar gtogs pa/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol
161b7(mdo sde): ba la brtson pa/ gdugs dang bser mas sha dang khrag bskams pa/ rke ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus rtswas yog pa/ mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson
162a1(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa/ dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa dang ldan pa de dag la rke zhing nyam chung la mdog ngan cing mi sdug par rig nas brnyas par
162a2(mdo sde): bya'o snyam du sems shing / de dag las legs par bshad pa nyan par mi 'tshal gyi/ de de bas shas cher dman zhing ches rmugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
162a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i rgyags pa dang bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcu gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
162a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag las shin tu ma 'das na tha na rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa'ang mi 'thob na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
162a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni/ gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa
162a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag las shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o/ /'phags pa blo gros
162a7(mdo sde): rgya mtshos zhus pa/ bam po bcu pa ste mtha' ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ khyod kyis byang
162b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag legs par bshad pa legs so legs so/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang byang
162b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dag gang la gnas na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la bshad do/ /blo gros rgya
162b3(mdo sde): mtsho| bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no/ /bcu gang zhe
162b4(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ /chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pas stong pa nyid kyi rnam par zhugs kyang bdag nyid skyabs byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher
162b5(mdo sde): byams pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang po'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par
162b6(mdo sde): zhugs kyang yongs su thar par byed pas/ sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gnyis pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos thams
162b7(mdo sde): cad ni| smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas smon pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du skye ba 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags gyu
163a1(mdo sde): rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gsum pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos thams cad ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam
163a2(mdo sde): par zhugs kyang 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos thams
163a3(mdo sde): cad ni| zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab
163a4(mdo sde): tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo lnga pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ /chos thams cad ni/ gti mug dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas gti mug dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang gti mug la spyod
163a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos thams cad ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa
163a6(mdo sde): med pa'i rang bzhin pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang kun nas nyon mongs can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu
163a7(mdo sde): rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bdun pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos thams cad ni/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin pas skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rnam par
163b1(mdo sde): zhugs kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba spong ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo brgyad pa'o/ /blo gros
163b2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho| chos thams cad ni/ ngang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rang bzhin pas ngang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang theg pa chen po'i bsam pa yongs su mi 'dor bar
163b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa'i chos ston pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dgu pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
163b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'ang mi gnas la/ byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed/ rtsom pa thams cad dang yang bral la sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i
163b5(mdo sde): rtsom pa'ang mi 'dor/ spyod pa thams cad las kyang shin tu 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang mi ldog pa 'di ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi
163b6(mdo sde): lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bcu pa'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rab tu
163b7(mdo sde): sbyor na| bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog
164a1(mdo sde): mog por gyur te rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu phyung
164a2(mdo sde): bas bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis ltas chen po 'di mthong
164a3(mdo sde): n as rings shing myur ba la gor du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te bkod pa ci 'dra bas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'gro ba'i bkod
164a4(mdo sde): pa de 'dra ba'i dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus
164a5(mdo sde): der de bsgrims par gyur te 'ongs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'khor de las sems can gang dag 'dul bar
164a6(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams dang / gang dag srid par kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par gang gis kyang de ma mthong ngo / /de nas
164a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ khyod kyis bdud sdig can bkod pa ji lta bu dang ldan pas 'ong ba mthong ngam/
164b1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ bdud sdig can 'di ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i phyir
164b2(mdo sde): 'ongs na/ 'di ci zhig bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ deng 'di bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus byang
164b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ ga la yod/ de na chos ston pa'i de bzhin
164b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mtshan ni/ ci zhig bya/ blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi
164b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
164b6(mdo sde): rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba chos ston to/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bde ba thams cad kyis
164b7(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bde ba'i rgyu dang / yon tan gyi rgyu dang / bkod pa'i rgyu bskal par brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad
165a1(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms
165a2(mdo sde): p a des byang chub thob pa de'i tshe des byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par lus las bdud kun tu skul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung nas 'od zer des
165a3(mdo sde): b skul bas 'jig rten gyi khams de na bdud thams cad bye ba phrag brgyar 'khod pa'i bdud re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag bcu yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub
165a4(mdo sde): kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed ma nus te/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur
165a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so/ /nges kyang ji lta ji ltar de dag bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
165a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud de dag la chos bstan nas bcom ldan 'das de phyis byang chub thob ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya'o/ /
165a7(mdo sde): de byang chub thob pa'i mchog gi phrugs dang / bzang po'i phrugs kyang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/ /rim gro pa'ang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub
165b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de na theg
165b2(mdo sde): pa gzhan gyi ming yang med do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/ de 'dra ste/ der 'bangs na/ phyis bdud kyi las byed par
165b3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur gyi/ bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
165b4(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can dngangs skrag 'jigs te spu zing zhes byed nas 'khor de nas 'gro bar 'dod na/ 'gro ma nus te/ mi snang bar ma gyur na/ de de bas kyang cher dngangs shing skrag
165b5(mdo sde): ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phang bar mi 'gyur bar bcom
165b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can/ ma 'jigs shig /skyes
165b7(mdo sde): bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ni/ sems can la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin no/ /sdig can/ khyod byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la bzod pa gsol cig
166a1(mdo sde): dang / 'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag btsal nas 'di
166a2(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der mi 'phang bar gsol/ ji
166a3(mdo sde): ltar gang na skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu chos ston par gyur pa'i 'khor der bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du lan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /blo gros rgya mtshos
166a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ sdig can/ kho bo lta bu dag la bzod pa gsol mi dgos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams cad la shin tu bzod pa nyid do/ /sdig can/
166a5(mdo sde): khyod bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der song la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bkod pa de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu
166a6(mdo sde): 'joms pa de la ltos shig dang khyod la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyangs nas bdud
166a7(mdo sde): sdig can gyi spyi bor bzhag nas bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna dang / slob dpon chos kyi dpe mkhyud med pa'i bden pa
166b1(mdo sde): dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci 'dra bar bdud sdig can gyi'ang de dang 'dra bar gyur cig /ces de lta bu'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas so/ /byang chub sems
166b2(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
166b3(mdo sde): khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs kyis skad cig thang
166b4(mdo sde): gcig yud tsam de la bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
166b5(mdo sde): y ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas
166b6(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang
166b7(mdo sde): dag 'khod pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems
167a1(mdo sde): can dbang chung zhing mdog ngan la mi sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs logs su
167a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa
167a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /'tsho'o/ /gzhes so/ /de 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to//
167a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu 'chad do/ /der phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir
167a5(mdo sde): 'dus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa/ bcom ldan
167a6(mdo sde): 'das de la yongs su 'dri zhing yongs su 'drir 'jug pa'ang 'dus par gyur to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs de'i tha ma bshad pa'i tshe bdud sdig can mig gi mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir
167a7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa dang / skyes bu dam pa des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste bdud sdig can de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'phangs so/ /de nas bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems
167b1(mdo sde): dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kho bo cag kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyi/ sdig can/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
167b2(mdo sde): skyed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag kyang bdud du gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa las/ kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pas bla na
167b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de lta bas na/ sdig can/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /de nas bdud
167b4(mdo sde): s dig can gyis lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
167b5(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed de phyin chad bdud kyi las mi bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can rin po che bkod pa'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhag ste/ de
167b6(mdo sde): na 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gtam rgyud ci 'dra ba la rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol ba btab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya
167b7(mdo sde): mtshos gang bdud sdig can seng+ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i kha'i sgo dang / ba spu'i khung thams cad nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'dus pa chen po'i le'u rab tu bshad pa lta
168a1(mdo sde): bu'i gtam byung ste/ yi ge de dag dang / tshig dang / yi ge'i 'bru de dag dang mnyam zhing mi nyung mi mang ma lhag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs
168a2(mdo sde): b yas so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can de las 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i gtam thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces
168a3(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
168a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho de dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab
168a5(mdo sde): tu 'joms pas mdzod spu nas gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed de dag
168a6(mdo sde): las 'das te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /der byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
168a7(mdo sde): pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bskal pa brgyar yang bsngags pa'i mthar mi phyin pa'i seng+ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas
168b1(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'ang mthong
168b2(mdo sde): ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas pa 'di'ang mthong ngo / /de nas sgrib pa ci'ang med par mthong ngo / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
168b3(mdo sde): khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i pad+ma dag la 'khod cing chos nyan pa de dag kyang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yid
168b4(mdo sde): rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog gtor to/ /gtor ma thag tu
168b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi gdugs chen por gyur to/ /der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des me tog
168b6(mdo sde): gi gdugs de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang me tog gi gdugs 'di lta bur gyur pa'i me tog 'di dag
168b7(mdo sde): gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /me tog 'di dag ni/ bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te/ byang
169a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gis nga la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gtor to/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
169a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can 'jig rten gyi khams de na ci bgyid pa blta bar
169a3(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis bde ba
169a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can de 'khor 'di la ston cig /
169a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos sor mo bcu las 'od zer stong phrag bcu phyung nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas
169a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag las 'das nas bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /der thams
169a7(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud
169b1(mdo sde): sdig can chos kyi khri chen po la 'dug ste 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i gtam rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'ang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo
169b2(mdo sde): mtshar du gyur nas rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la phyag btsal nas de dag gis mu tig dang / me tog
169b3(mdo sde): gis gtor to/ /gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chen por gnas par kun tu
169b4(mdo sde): snang ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mi mjed kyi
169b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i dus la da bab par shes na/ khyod song
169b6(mdo sde): zhig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang
169b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gnas par gyur to/ /de
170a1(mdo sde): n as bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan
170a2(mdo sde): 'das la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po/ khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
170a3(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa de mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam du yongs su dag pa de mthong ste/ ji ltar dag cing dri
170a4(mdo sde): ma med pa'i sems can mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas de ngo mtshar to/ /bdag gis de mthong nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
170a5(mdo sde): bskyed do/ /smras pa/ grogs po/ khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ khyod da bdud kyi las lta byed dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
170a6(mdo sde): bu| lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gang gis kyang bdud kyi las byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la
170a7(mdo sde): y ang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ji ltar bdud kyi las byed pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ches stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus
170b1(mdo sde): rtsom mo| |btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las byed pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las su brjod kyi/
170b2(mdo sde): bdud kyi las ni/ ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las srog chags nyi khris bla na
170b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bdud kyi 'khor de las kyang bdud kyi bu khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas
170b4(mdo sde): mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa der skye bar gyur cig /ces tshig de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan
170b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
170b6(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni/ bar chad mang ba/ phyir rgol ba mang ba
170b7(mdo sde): lags na/ gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nub par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
171a1(mdo sde): ston pa de dag la'ang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di
171a2(mdo sde): lta bu 'di dag kyang kun tu bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de skad
171a3(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu
171a4(mdo sde): 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / ston par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
171a5(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs zin to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / tshig gang dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi dag bkug nas chos kyi
171a6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o/ /blo
171a7(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho/ /dgug pa'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa me sa ma san+d+hi/ sa ra ne/ sa ra ba ti/ d+ha ne/ d+ha na ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ d+hu d+hu ma ti/ a brte/ a ma le/ bi ma le/
171b1(mdo sde): bi dza re| ka ka re/ ka ru Ne/ hu hu bi ta/ hu hu san+d+hi/ nir+g+ha ta ni/ a baT+Te/ bi baT+Te/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma ra dzi te/ bi shud+d+he/ bi shud+d+ha ba ti/ mi su le/ ma no ha re/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di dag
171b2(mdo sde): ni| dgug pa'i tshig rnams yin te/ tshig de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de yang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nan tan byed
171b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas te phyogs bzhir byams pas khyab par byas la rgyal po chen po bzhi bsam na/ sngags kyi
171b4(mdo sde): tshig 'di dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de dag stan las langs te bcom ldan
171b5(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par
