171b7(mdo sde): nas gang gis kyang ma bsgribs pa'am gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig brjod
172a1(mdo sde): par bya ste/ tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di
172a2(mdo sde): lta ste| dza ye/ dza ya ma ti/ aT+Te maT+Te maM ku re/ sid+d+ha ma ti/ shu b+he shAn+ti kA re/ na da ne/ dAn+te/ dAn+te ma ti/ tang+ka re/ k+Sha ye/ k+Sha ya mu khe/ a baT+Ta ni/ bi baT+Ta ni/ pa ri baT+Ta ni/ pa
172a3(mdo sde): ri ts+tshe de/ smr-i ti smr-i ti san+d+hi/ A gats+tsha kau shi ka / nirdzi tA/ a su ra/ dza yan+ti de ba/ sa ma yaste/ a ra bad+ho/ d+harma ni rdza to/ /ra ma hi/ swasti ya nA ma b+hu tA nAM/ a rak+Sha d+harma tsA ri NAM/
172a4(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ 'di dag ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste/ de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /der chos smra ba des sngags kyi tshig 'di
172a5(mdo sde): dag legs par kha ton du byas la gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbra'i cho gas khrus legs par byas te gos bzang po bgos la/ shar phyogs su me tog gtor te sangs rgyas thams
172a6(mdo sde): cad bsam pa'i dran pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pas seng+ge'i khri la 'dug ste lha'i dbang po brgya byin bsam la/ kau shi ka /'khor legs par
172a7(mdo sde): yongs su gzhag pa'i phyir tshur shog / sngags grub pa mngon sum du gyis shig ces brjod na/ de'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing yongs su dag la tshul khrims yongs su dag
172b1(mdo sde): pas bsam ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'ongs nas 'khor yongs su 'jog par 'gyur/ sngags kyi grub pa'ang nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du
172b2(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i
172b3(mdo sde): slad du bdag chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi/ de'i 'khor kyang yongs su gzhag par bgyi/ sngags kyi grub pa'ang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi
172b4(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
172b5(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las bstan pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
172b6(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos la gus par bgyis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i
172b7(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ kau shi ka /khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng+ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/ /de lta bu ni/ khyod kyi bya
173a1(mdo sde): ba'o| |lha'i dbang po/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsam na/ lha rnams ni/ rgyal zhing / lha ma yin rnams ni/ pham par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /
173a2(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho/ gzhan yang bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcad pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams brjod par bya ste/ sngags kyi tshig de dag gis bdud dang / bdud kyi
173a3(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha me/ sha ma ba ti/ sha mi ta sha truM/ aM gu re/ maM gu re/ mA ra dzi te/ ka rA Te/ ke yU
173a4(mdo sde): re| te dzo pa ti/ o ho ka ma ti/ bi sha Tha/ nirma le/ ma lA ba na ye/ o kha re/ o kha rA/ gra se/ kha yA gra se/ gra sa te/ he mu khI/ pa rA mu khi/ a mu khI/ sha mi tA ni/ sarba gra
173a5(mdo sde): ha ban+d+ha nA ni/ ni gr-i hi tA/ sarba pa ra pra pA di na/ bi muk+tA mA ra pA shA/ s+thA pi tA bud+d+ha mu drA/ sa mud+g+ha ti tAH/ sarba mA rA/ su tsa ri ta pa da pa ri shud+d+h+ya d+hI gats+tshan+ti sarba mA ra karma Ni/ blo gros
173a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho| 'di dag ni/ bdud tshar gcod pa'i tshig /nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i tshig ste/ de dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas la chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/ byang chub
173a7(mdo sde): kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pas 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/ bdag la sman par 'du shes dang / chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang / chos nyan pa la
173b1(mdo sde): nad pa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te
173b2(mdo sde): chos kyi gtam byed na/ de'i khor yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag 'ong
173b3(mdo sde): ba de dag kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang bdag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
173b4(mdo sde): rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan par 'phangs pa skyes bu dam pa de dag gis byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul 'di bdag la mngon sum du
173b5(mdo sde): gyur to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag deng slan chad bdud kyi sug las thams cad 'dor ro/ /gang dag na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i
173b6(mdo sde): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der chos mnyan pa'i slad du bdag nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pas mchis par
173b7(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can/ legs so legs so/ /khyod chos la gus pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dis rim gyis bdud kyi las thams cad las shin tu
174a1(mdo sde): 'das te/ gang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis thos pa'i chos de dag rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ /gzhan yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs

174a4(mdo sde): ti| o dzo ga me/ d+harmA Na/ na da ni/ sa t+ya pra tISh+Tha ne/ u pa pa ti/ bu shud+d+he/ swa tsit+ta u pa sha me/ bya ba lo ka ya brah+ma Na/ byu tiSh+Thi na maste/ a bek+Sha sra d+ha ma tsa ra NAM/ ku ru sa d+harma

174a6(mdo sde): bi ka u pa ya/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i sngags pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas la tshangs pa'i lam la
174a7(mdo sde): shin tu gnas te zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dbang po shin tu spas pa dang / shin tu bsgrungs pa'i dran pa dang / shin tu dkar ba'i phyag rgya dang / shin tu yongs
174b1(mdo sde): su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang / shin tu dben pas zin pa'i ngag gi las dang / shin tu brtan pa'i blo dang / legs par byas pa'i bzod pa'i las dang / shin tu yongs su sbyangs ba'i tshul
174b2(mdo sde): khrims kyi phung po dang / legs par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shin tu bsten pa'i mang du thos pa dang / shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems las su rung ba dang / shin
174b3(mdo sde): tu rno ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / shin tu brtson pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi sems kyis legs par zin pa dang / shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa dang /

175a1(mdo sde): sbyar ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa dang / mi g.yeng bar yid la byed pa dang / rus shing ltar byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis

175a5(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |chos smra ba de la'ang chos brgyad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du de la dran pa bsgrub par bgyi/ /chos zab mo
175a6(mdo sde): rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du de la blo gros bsgrub par bgyi/ don gyi rnam pa rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du de la rtogs pa bsgrubs par bgyi/ the tshom thams cad gcad pa'i slad du
175a7(mdo sde): de la spobs pa bsgrub par bgyi/ skad dang nges pa'i tshig thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du de la lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par bgyi/ 'khor
175b1(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis mi non par bgyi ba'i slad du la 'dul ba srung ba bsgrub par bgyi/ mi dman par lung bstan pa'i slad du de la chos kyi snang ba bsgrub par bgyi/ de bgyid cing chos
175b2(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i slad du de la nges par 'byung ba'i sgo bsgrub par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos smra ba de la chos brgyad po 'di dag bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba de la bsrung zhing sba ba

175b5(mdo sde): to| |de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te tha ma'i dus kyi tshe ci nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi sug par mchi ba dang / mdzod du chud pa dang /
175b6(mdo sde): glegs bam du 'gyur zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
175b7(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtshos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen po khyab par gyur
176a1(mdo sde): nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / gzugs su snang ba de
176a2(mdo sde): dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su snang ngo / /rin po che bkod pa'i khyams na mchod pa'i las byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag
176a3(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nyid du gnas par kun tu snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu kye ma'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ bcom
176a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs so/ /gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs

176a6(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi bdud dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar brtun kyang de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar mi nus
176a7(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa ni/ 'gas kyang srid/ rgya mtsho thams cad ni/ skam yang srid/ ri thams cad ni/ rnam par 'thor yang srid/ rlung ni/ zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/

176b2(mdo sde): chen po bzhi ni/ gzhan du 'gyur yang srid/ sems can thams cad kyi sems ni/ gcig tu byar rung yang srid/ nam mkha' dang sa ni/ 'byar yang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
176b3(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs ni/ sus kyang skyod pa'am/ g.yo ba'am/ 'khrug par byed mi nus so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i spyi bor phyag
176b4(mdo sde): bzhag ste tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ /khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba nye bar bzung ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

176b6(mdo sde): rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs nas de la rgya mtsho dang / mtsho chen po ltar gting dpag dka' ba'i dran pa dang / blo rab tu
176b7(mdo sde): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin du/ dge slong kun dga' bo nyi tshe ba'i 'chal ba dang ldan pa la chos kyi le'u 'di lta bu 'di yongs su gtad/ bcom ldan 'das
177a1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ dge slong kun dga' bo rang gi blo'i stobs bskyed pas mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs
177a2(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzin to/ /blo gros rgya mtsho/ sems can gang dag dge slong kun dga' bo las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga'
177a3(mdo sde): pa thob par 'gyur ba yod de/ de dag 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di ltar nyan thos kyang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing ston pa ni/ de
177a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar to snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de las lha dang mi kha cig 'di snyam du sems te /
177a5(mdo sde): ci byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dran pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin gyi/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mchog tu bstan pa'i tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
177a6(mdo sde): ni| de lta ma yin no snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas 'khor gyi sems can rnams la rnam par
177a7(mdo sde): bltas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di rab tu dran pa dang ldan pa lags kyi/ gang bcom
177b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni/ ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / gang+gA'i klung gi
177b2(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sems can ji tsam du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams ni/ rab tu mang gi /sa'i khams ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /zhes gang de skad du
177b3(mdo sde): bya ba de la ji snyam du sems/ 'od srung / sems can gyi khams de mang ngam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde par gshegs pa/ tshad ma
177b4(mdo sde): mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung / yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/
177b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du ji ltar dge slong kun dga' bo ltar dran pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur kyang kun dga' bo lta bu'i sems can de dag gis dran pa dang / gzungs kyi
177b6(mdo sde): stobs de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs bskyed par brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang mi bzod do/ /'od
177b7(mdo sde): srung / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho ni/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos
178a1(mdo sde): bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi chos bstan pa la sgrib pa'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/ 'od srung / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya
178a2(mdo sde): mtsho chen por shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chu rgyun gcig gis chu'i rgyun gnyis pa la sgrib pa'am kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/ chu'i rgyun
178a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs nas de la 'grib pa'am/ gang ba'ang med do/ /'od srung / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan
178a4(mdo sde): 'das thams cad kyi chos bstan pa kun tu 'dzin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyi chos bstan pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldan ba'i bya ba mi byed de/
178a5(mdo sde): de'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa la bri ba'am/ gang ba'ang med do/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags brgya stong gis bla na med pa yang
178a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra bar gyur
178a7(mdo sde): cig ces smras so/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lha'i dbang / mi'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la gtor/ mngon par
178b1(mdo sde): gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di
178b2(mdo sde): thos nas mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / rtog pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur
178b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pa la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ stong chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni/ /gser gyis bkang ste bde
178b4(mdo sde): gshegs phul ba bas/ /gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di thos nas ni/ /mos pa'i bsod nams 'di ni khyad par 'phags/ /gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkad/ /de bzhin
178b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di la 'jug byas pa/ /bsod nams de la snga mas skyed du med/ /gang gis 'jig ren khams ni stong phrag bcu/ /rin chen
178b6(mdo sde): bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ /gang gis mdo 'di bton nas ston pa yi/ /bsod nams de yi cha ni snga ma min/ /zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig stong gi rnams/ /rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten
178b7(mdo sde): slob dpon skyob/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas/ /gang gis tshul 'dir rab tu sbyor ba dang / /phyogs bcu rnams su gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing / /rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul
179a1(mdo sde): ba bas| |ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'i/ /bsod nams de la mnyam pa yod ma yin/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dad chos 'dzin dang / /
179a2(mdo sde): chos sgrub pa dang srog chags snying rje ba/ /chos bzhi 'di dag bsod nams mtha' yas te/ /de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs mi gsung ngo / /nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin
179a3(mdo sde): sems can khams/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dang ni byang chub sems/ /chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de thos dogs mi bya/ /dkon mchog chos
179a4(mdo sde): 'di rab tu bshad pa na/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing ni bye ba g.yos par 'gyur/ /snang ba byung zhing me tog char yang bab/ /sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra yang byung / /byang chub sems
179a5(mdo sde): dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun/ /mgu nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams/ /'tsho ba don yod rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /gang dag
179a6(mdo sde): 'di 'dra 'di ni thos gyur pa/ /sems can de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed pa/ /gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjed de/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bzung / /phyogs bcu'i
179a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams/ /phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu brkyang mdzad de/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni/ /shAkya seng+ge'i bskul ba legs zhes gsung / /lha
179b1(mdo sde): dang klu dang lha min mi'am ci/ /dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye che/ /brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /nam mkhar gnas te ched du brjod pa rjod/ /shAkya seng+ge 'di dang
179b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang / /mdo sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo ring gnas gyur/ /legs gsungs chos ni gzhan yang nub mi 'gyur/ /gang dag chos kyi tshul ni
179b3(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa/ /de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi/ /bdag cag thams cad gus dang bcas par ni/ /kun tu srung zhing sba bar spro bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
179b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ chos kyi tshul/ chos kyi phyag rgya/ chos btus pa/ chos rab tu dbye ba 'di ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
179b5(mdo sde): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad pa/ 'chad pa/ 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho/ khyod kyis de la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhes
179b6(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang / sgrub pa snying por bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / thams cad dang ldan
179b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
180a1(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do/ /byin gyis rlabs kyi le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o/ /'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ 'phags pa blo
180a2(mdo sde): gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / bud+d+ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he
180a3(mdo sde): ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
180a4(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
180a5(mdo sde): lo| |'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
180a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ gzungs dang mdo
180a7(mdo sde): sde rtogs par khong du chud pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spobs pas mgu bar byed pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi
180b1(mdo sde): dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa lam pas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags la
180b2(mdo sde): snyan par brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad ji
180b3(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag
180b4(mdo sde): par sgrub pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang dag par sgrub pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa/
180b5(mdo sde): lus dang dag dang sems kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la spro ba'i go cha bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med par brtson 'grus chen
180b6(mdo sde): pos yid yongs su mi skyo ba/ seng+ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa/ sangs rgyas
180b7(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang / ri rab dang / lhun po chen po dang / lhun po'i rtse
181a1(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / lhun po'i rgyal po dang / lhun po'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal
181a2(mdo sde): po dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen tog dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / rin chen dpal dang / rin chen 'byung dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen
181a3(mdo sde): khar ba can dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rin chen dra ba dang / rin chen bkod pa dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen gling dang / rin chen sgron ma dang /
181a4(mdo sde): lag na rin chen dang / dga' byed dang / chos la dga' ba bkod pa dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang / tshig bkod pa'i 'od dang / tshig
181a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / lha brtsegs dang / rin chen brtsegs dang / 'od zer stong ldan dang / me lce dang / skar ma la dga' ba dang / zla 'od
181a6(mdo sde): dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gser bzang rnam dag 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mi
181a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems
181b1(mdo sde): dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs ba skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
181b2(mdo sde): byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan la sogs
181b3(mdo sde): pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
181b4(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / lha'i bu ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs thams cad dang / rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams
181b5(mdo sde): dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal la la sogs pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dge
181b6(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'bras bu che la sogs pa 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang
181b7(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dri med 'od la sogs pa 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po
182a1(mdo sde): drug khri dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bzhi khri nyis stong dang / dri za'i rgyal po phreng thogs la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal
182a2(mdo sde): po sum khri nyis stong dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bdun khri nyis stong dang / bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi stong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang /
182a3(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'og gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de
182a4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing / lha thams cad kyi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri
182a5(mdo sde): la ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas gyen du 'phags pa bzhin du bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas dge slong
182a6(mdo sde): gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge nge zhing bzhugs so/ /de nas de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor de'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng
182a7(mdo sde): gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan zhing rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i gdugs des thams
182b1(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten 'di kun tu khebs par gyur to/ /rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig kha dog du ma'i rgyan phreng 'bum phrag dum 'di lta ste/ mu
182b2(mdo sde): tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu tig dri ma med pa dang / gser lta bu'i mu tig dang / zla ba lta bu'i mu tig dang / pad+ma lta bu'i mu tig dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog
182b3(mdo sde): can gyi mu tig rnams 'phyang ngo / /mu tig gi rgyan phreng de dag las kyang 'od zer dag byung ngo / /'od zer de dag las kyang me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma/
182b4(mdo sde): dri zhim pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag gi char mngon par bab bo/ /me tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo nub pa tsam du gang bar gyur to/ /bar snang
182b5(mdo sde): la'ang 'brug sgra chen po bsgrags par gyur to/ /a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag dang / tsan+dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab bo/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi
182b6(mdo sde): m thus tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
182b7(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga
183a1(mdo sde): ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /maud+gal gyi
183a2(mdo sde): bu| 'di ni/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'ong ba de'i snga ltas yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma
183a3(mdo sde): lon par klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho klu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
183a4(mdo sde): dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs brgya
183a5(mdo sde): stong dag len cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
183a6(mdo sde): spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan la sogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams
183a7(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnyen 'dab kyi 'khor dang bcas pas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i
183b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'jig rten dag na 'jig rten phan par bzhed pa 'jig rten gyis mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa/ /'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten
183b2(mdo sde): dri ma rnams kyis ma gos pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ /'jig rten snang ba rnam par gzigs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa/ /'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la
183b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la de ring bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dul zhing dul bas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags/ /'dren pa
183b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba bsregs shing myu gu bsregs/ /snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems can rnams la byams pas 'phags/ /
183b5(mdo sde): bsod snyoms zhing ste 'jig rten rtsa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ni mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kund zla ba dung mdog
183b6(mdo sde): 'dra| |'di na tshangs pa'i gnas na 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur/ /zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung ba'i rmad byung 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar
183b7(mdo sde): mdzad| |de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du gyur/ /khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla ba bzhin du yid kyang tshim par
184a1(mdo sde): bgyid| |lha dang mi yi sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid
184a2(mdo sde): cing shes rab gsal bar bgyid/ /dga' dang mgu bgyid bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid cing thar pa yang dag ston pa lags/ /khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa
184a3(mdo sde): thogs pa ma mchis gar yang chags pa ma mchis te/ /khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod pa chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugs su chud/ /gang dag gis ni dbang po
184a4(mdo sde): bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad ji 'dra ba/ /thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su chud pa de slad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing
184a5(mdo sde): rgyal drung du glags blta'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed/ /khyod kyi thad du lhags par gyur kyang gnas las ma g.yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/ /
184a6(mdo sde): mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpal dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham par mdzad/ /de slad mi rnams su zhig deng 'dir khyod la mchod pa'i slad
184a7(mdo sde): du khyod la ngom par 'dzin/ /mnga' bdag khyod kyis chos rnams byed pa med dang ya ma brla dang zla ba 'dra ba dang / /dbu ba glog sprin chu yi chu bur 'dra zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur
184b1(mdo sde): thugs su chud/ /gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyis chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga bskyed mdzad pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags
184b2(mdo sde): par 'os/ /gang gi don du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bsten pa dang / /gang gi don du rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mdzad pa dang / /
184b3(mdo sde): gang gi don du sbyin dang yang dag sdom dang dul dang bzod pa rtag tu bsten pa yi/ /rnam 'dren khyod kyi smon lam chen po shin tu rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur/ /de nas klu'i rgyal
184b4(mdo sde): po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas
184b5(mdo sde): zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
184b6(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po/ khyod ci dang ci
184b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris ba de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstan pa'i
185a1(mdo sde): skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
185a2(mdo sde): ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang / lha dang / mi'i skye bar 'gro ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang
185a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa 'thob pa lags/
185a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang / dga' ba'i shas che ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad
185a5(mdo sde): spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'tshal ba
185a6(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang / thos pa tshol bas chog ma 'tshal ba dang / thos pa sgrub pas mngon par 'phags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
185a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa dang / nags dang / nags 'dabs na rgyu ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo
185b1(mdo sde): byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ches zab
185b2(mdo sde): mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang / chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen gyi chos rnams la zhugs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba lags/ bcom
185b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes mthong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
185b4(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / cho ga 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs
185b5(mdo sde): su smin par bgyi ba dang / gzung ba dang / bklag pa dang / brda sprod pa la mkhas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud kyis phyir rgol ba
185b6(mdo sde): bcom pa dang / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir
185b7(mdo sde): mi ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho
186a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po/ legs so legs so/ /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni/ klu'i bdag po/
186a2(mdo sde): legs so/ /klu'i bdag po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so zhes gsol te klu'i rgyal
186a3(mdo sde): po rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
186a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang /
186a5(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas thams cad srung ba dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing brnyas par mi byed pa dang / bdag gis 'khrul pa rtog par byed
186a6(mdo sde): kyi| gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtog pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par
186a7(mdo sde): chad par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog
186b1(mdo sde): gsum po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bsngags pa rgyun du brjod pa dang / chos 'dod pa rnams g.yeng par mi byed
186b2(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'gyod pa mi skyed pa dang / sems can 'gyod cing 'dug pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa sel ba ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
186b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha dang / mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang
186b4(mdo sde): zhe na| 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong zhing gzhan dag la'ang sgrog pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong zhing nyams par mi byed pa dang / smon lam la
186b5(mdo sde): bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje chen po skyed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
186b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams lha dang / mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
186b7(mdo sde): te| brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
187a1(mdo sde): bsngags pa rgyun du brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba la sems can rnams yang dag par
187a2(mdo sde): 'dzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa thos pa der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang / rgyud zhum pa med cing rgya chen po la mos pa dang / sangs
187a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/
187a4(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sgyu med pa dang g.yo
187a5(mdo sde): med par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos la gces pa dang gus pa dang ri mo byed pa dang / bka' blo bde zhing gso sla la des pa dang / nga rgyal med cing sri zhu byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag
187a6(mdo sde): po| chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
187a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams 'tshal ba'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi brlang zhing gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna bsal
187b1(mdo sde): ba dang / gzhan dag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang bde bar sbyar ba'i bar dga' ba ste/ klu'i bdag po/ gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal ba'i yul du
187b2(mdo sde): gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i stobs dang /
187b3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'i stobs dang / chos nyid la rton pa'i stobs te/ klu'i bdag po/
187b4(mdo sde): chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gnyis dang ldan na/ dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur te/ gnyis
187b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu'i stobs dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i stobs te/ klu'i bdag po/ chos de gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ba'i shas che bar
187b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med
187b7(mdo sde): pa la mos pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang / yang dag pa'i las la legs par brtson pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las
188a1(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge
188a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ phung po gsum gyi yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa dang / bag yod par gnas pa ste/ de gnyis so/ /gzhan yang
188a3(mdo sde): gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi re ba ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos de gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems mi dge ba'i
188a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba
188a5(mdo sde): yin te| lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / sgra don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / dri don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / ro don du gnyer ba ma yin
188a6(mdo sde): pa dang | reg bya don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/ lnga po ni/ de dag yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba
188a7(mdo sde): yin te| lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba yin gyi lus don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / yon tan don du gnyer ba yin gyi srog don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang /
188b1(mdo sde): shes rab don du gnyer ba yin gyi reg pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / dge ba don du gnyer ba yin gyi tshor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / sems can yongs su bskyab
188b2(mdo sde): pa don du gnyer ba yin gyi bdag gi dge ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin
188b3(mdo sde): no| |klu'i bdag po/ chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa yin te/ drug po dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba'i yon tan 'dod kyi gos tshon
188b4(mdo sde): can gyi rtags 'dzin pa tsam 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos nyan pa 'dod kyi 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig nyan 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos bstan pa 'dod kyi 'jig rten
188b5(mdo sde): gyi zang zing 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos la so sor rtog par 'dod kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos sgrub pa 'dod kyi yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang
188b6(mdo sde): brda yongs su tshol ba 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan 'dod kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa ma yin pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos drug po de dag
188b7(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas
189a1(mdo sde): dga' ba yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gtam la dga'i theg pa dman pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i
189a2(mdo sde): gtam la dga'i phyin ci log gi gtam la ma yin pa dang / chos kyi lugs kyi gtam la dga'i 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyi
189a3(mdo sde): gtam la dga'i 'khor ba gcad pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba'i gtam la dga'i bdag tu lta ba 'dzin pa'i
189a4(mdo sde): gtam la ma yin pa dang / chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin dang rkyen rnam par dag pa'i gtam la dga'i chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skyes
189a5(mdo sde): bu dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam yang dag pa ji lta ba la dga'i dmigs par lta
189a6(mdo sde): ba'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / rab tu byung ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa'i gtam la dga'i zhi ba la btang snyoms su byed pa'i gtam la ma yin pa
189a7(mdo sde): ste| klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/
189b1(mdo sde): don gyi dbang rnam pa lnga mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes te/ lnga gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar yang dag par
189b2(mdo sde): mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas 'gyod pa dang / the tshom med par 'gyur ba yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos
189b3(mdo sde): pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rtog par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir
189b4(mdo sde): thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur bar
189b5(mdo sde): yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pas mi 'jigs par 'gyur la mi 'jigs pa las sems can
189b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi the tshom chad par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes pa ste/ lnga po de dag go /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
189b7(mdo sde): ni| don gyi dbang rnam pa gnyis mthong ba'i phyir thos pa yongs su tshol ba na chog mi shes te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba dang / chags pa med
190a1(mdo sde): pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/ de gnyis so/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pa sgrub pas mngon par 'phags par
190a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti rnams la 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa dang / yongs su tshol ba rnams la lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / spyod lam rnams la dran
190a3(mdo sde): pa dang / shes bzhin dang / ji skad thos pa la shas cher yongs su rtog pa dang / 'du 'dzi med pas bya ba nyung ba dang / sbyor ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nam gyi cha stod dang / nam
190a4(mdo sde): gyi cha smad la mi nyal ba dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pas dag pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang / snying rje chen
190a5(mdo sde): pos sems can la lta ba dang / yon tan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i skye bo la rim gro byed pa dang / shes pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yongs su skyob
190a6(mdo sde): pa ste| klu'i bdag po/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams thos pa sgrub pas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ byang chub sems
190a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni/ phan yon rnam pa lnga po 'di dag yang dag par mthong nas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag gis las byas pa chud za bar mi 'gyur
190b1(mdo sde): ba dang / bdag gis byas pa'i bag chags kyis bsgo bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la bdag gi sems gtong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
190b2(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis bdag smad par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag grol zin nas kyang nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba rnams kyis bcings pa'i sems can rnams 'ching ba de las rab tu thar par
190b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam pa ste/ lnga po de dag go/ gzhan yang rnam pa lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ rab tu 'byung ba ni/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su
190b4(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims dang mthun pa yin no/ /rab tu 'byung ba ni/ thos pa nyung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thos pa dang mthun pa yin no/ /rab tu 'byung
190b5(mdo sde): ba ni| sems rnam par g.yeng pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa yin no/ /rab tu 'byung ba ni/ shes rab 'chal ba'i sems can yongs
190b6(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang mthun pa yin no/ /rab tu 'byung ba ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'i lam la sems can dgod par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye
190b7(mdo sde): shes dang mthun pa yin te/ lnga po de dag go/ gzhan yang rnam pa lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ rab tu 'byung ba ni/ phung po lnga yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal bcom pa'o/ /rab tu
191a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba ni/ kun 'byung ba spangs pa'i phyir srid pa'i bag la nyal ba spong ba'o/ /rab tu 'byung ba ni/ 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhi ba dang / rab
191a2(mdo sde): tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o/ /rab tu 'byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir lam la 'jug go /rab tu 'byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i bden
191a3(mdo sde): pa rnams la sems can dgod pa'i phyir bden pa la 'jug pa ste/ lnga po de dag go /klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nags dang / nags
191a4(mdo sde): 'dabs na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad la lta ba dang / mngon par
191a5(mdo sde): shes pa'i shes pa skyed par 'dod pa dang / spyod lam rab tu zhi bas lha dang mi rnams mgu bar byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
191a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams nags dang / nags 'dabs na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ don gyi dbang rnam
191a7(mdo sde): pa bzhi mthong nas nags dang / nags 'dabs na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa dang / rab tu dgon pa 'di dag ni/ sangs
191b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyis bsngags pa yin te/ dgon pa na gnas na snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa ni/ bdag gis bre mo gtam zer ba yin gyi/ phyogs
191b2(mdo sde): gcig tu gyur pa ni/ ma yin no snyam pa dang / bdag gis ni/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bsags kyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ma yin no snyam pa dang / bdag gis ni/ yongs su
191b3(mdo sde): sbyang ba byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag gi rjes su bslab dgos so snyam pa dang / bdag dgon pa na gnas te chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs nas grong dang / grong khyer
191b4(mdo sde): dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu song ste/ sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag
191b5(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ nags dang / nags 'dabs na rgyu zhing bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gsum po 'di dag ni/ 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs
191b6(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang phan yon phul dang rab mchog yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba
191b7(mdo sde): rnams la mi lta ba'i phyir 'du 'dzi'i bya ba med pa dang / sems rag las pa med cing gang du 'dod par 'gror yod pa'i phyir rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / tha mal par gnas pa dang /
192a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sems pa'i phyir de'i ting nge 'dzin myur du skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ gsum po de dag go/ gzhan yang gsum ste/ de la
192a2(mdo sde): tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag mi 'byung ba dang / de la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba'i sems mi skye ba dang / sgrub cing 'dug pa na khyim la rjes su lta bar mi 'gyur pa ste/ klu'i
192a3(mdo sde): bdag po/ chos gsum po de dag ni/ 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dang / phan yon
192a4(mdo sde): phul dang / rab mchog yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/
192a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / sems nges par sems pa la dga'
192a6(mdo sde): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa la kun tu rmongs par byed pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pas gnas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson
192a7(mdo sde): pa dang / brtsams pa thams cad sgrub pa snying por byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs
192b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ /chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams
192b2(mdo sde): cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / bdag dag pas chos thams cad dag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang / bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa la mos pa dang / bdag stong pas
192b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad stong par som nyi med pa dang / bdag dben pas chos thams cad dben pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag zhi bas chos thams cad zhi bar so sor rtog pa dang / bdag ji lta ba
192b4(mdo sde): bzhin pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa dang / bdag zab pas chos thams cad zab par nges par sems pa dang / bdag bem po yin pas chos thams cad bem
192b5(mdo sde): po yin par nges par rtog pa dang / bdag gzung du med pas chos thams cad gzung du med par rab tu shes pa ste/ bcu po de dag go /klu'i bdag po/ /gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan
192b6(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ rnam par bsgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur
192b7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / phyin ci log las byung bar mthong bas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes pa dang / phyin ci log tu 'du shes pas chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bur rab tu
193a1(mdo sde): shes pa dang / rgyu'i bya ba dang / rkyen la dmigs te skye ba'i chos thams cad mig yor lta bur rab tu shes pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid las phyir
193a2(mdo sde): mi ldog pas chos thams cad chu zla lta bur rab tu shes pa dang / yul la mi gnas shing phyogs na mi gnas te ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad brag ca lta bur rab tu shes pa
193a3(mdo sde): dang | skad cig kyang mi sdod pas chos thams cad sprin dang glog snang ba lta bur rab tu shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis chags par mi 'gyur bas
193a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad 'ja' tshon lta bur rab tu shes pa dang / glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu dag par
193a5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / gnas pa dang bral bas chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur rab tu shes te/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
193a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chad par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur te/
193a7(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhe na/ las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub pa shes pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos de gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub
193b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams chad par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ gnyis gang
193b2(mdo sde): zhe na| mi rtag pa'i chos la 'jug pa shes pa dang / skyes nas zhig cing zhu ste/ mi gnas par rab tu rnam par dbye ba shes pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub
193b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams rtag par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /glu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rten cing 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ ma rig pa
193b4(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba nas rga shi kun 'byung ba'i bar la 'jug pa dang / ma rig pa 'gag pa nas rga shi 'gag pa'i bar la 'jug pa dang / chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ba dang / rtag par lta bar
193b5(mdo sde): yang mi gnas pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/
193b6(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta bar gyur pa thams cad du lta bar mi 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid shes pas bdag dang sems can du lta bar mi
193b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma med pa shes pas srog dang gang zag tu lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang / smon pa med pa shes pas 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel
194a1(mdo sde): par 'byung ba shes pas chad pa dang rtag par lta bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta bar gyur pa thams
194a2(mdo sde): cad du lta bar mi 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i shes pas rnam par rtse bar 'gyur te/ drug gang zhe na/
194a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i lta bas de'i lha'i mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ngan du smras pa'i tshig dang du len pas lha'i rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ba
194a4(mdo sde): dang | sems kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas gzhan gyi sems shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad la gtong bas
194a5(mdo sde): sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mthun par byed pa dang / bka' blo bde ba dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pas rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa rnam
194a6(mdo sde): par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos rnams la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas zag pa zad pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste/ drug po de dag go /klu'i bdag po/ /gzhan
194a7(mdo sde): yang mar me byin pas ni/ lha'i mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro||sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu'i dbyangs thams cad byin pas ni/ lha'i rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur
194b1(mdo sde): ro| |kun nas nyon mongs pa med par byin pas ni/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i chos dran par byed cing bskul bas ni/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
194b2(mdo sde): pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang / 'gyod pa bsal bas ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos byin pas ni/ zag pa zad pa shes pa
194b3(mdo sde): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bas ni/ lha'i mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos mnyan pas ni/ lha'i rna ba
194b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /sems kyis nges par brtags pas ni/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun rjes su dran pas ni/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su
194b5(mdo sde): dran pa shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /'dun pa drag pos ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos bsgrubs pas ni/ zag pa zad pa shes pa rnam par
194b6(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro/ /de la mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ klu'i bdag po/ 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi
194b7(mdo sde): drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
195a1(mdo sde): dang | lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig de ches 'das pa dang / ches
195a2(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ches mchog tu gyur pa dang / ches rnam par dag pa ste/ de'i lha'i mig des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi yul ma gtogs
195a3(mdo sde): par sems can du snang ba'am/ gzugs su snang ba'am/ chos su snang ba gang yang mi rtogs pa dang / mi mthong ba dang / mi shes pa ci'ang med do/ /klu'i bdag po/ de la nyan thos dang /
195a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lha'i rna ba gang yin pa nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams kyi lha'i rna ba gang yin pa de bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i rna ba de ches 'das pa dang / ches
195a5(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang / ches mchog tu gyur ba dang / ches rnam par dag pa ste/ de lha'i rna ba'i dbang po des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan gyi yul ma
195a6(mdo sde): gtogs par sgrar grag pa gang yang thos par mi 'gyur ba ci'ang med de/ des ni/ sgra thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su gcod pa rab tu shes so/ /klu'i bdag
195a7(mdo sde): po| de la byang chub sems dpas ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba dang / sems kyi dmigs pa dang / sems kyi mtshan ma dang / sems kyi dpyod pa dang / sems kyi rgyu
195b1(mdo sde): dang | sems kyi bsam pa dang / sems kyi 'bras bu dang / sems kyi nges pa dang / sems kyi brtag pa dang / sems kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sems kyi rjes su chags pa dang /
195b2(mdo sde): sems kyi khong khro ba dang / sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang / sems bsdu ba dang / sems bral bar g.yo ba dang / sems lhag par g.yo ba dang / sems bskul ba dang / sems
195b3(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / sems kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / sems kyi phyi ma'i mtha' dang / sems kyi de ltar byung ba dang / sems kyi gnas dang / sems kyi gnas pa thams cad yang dag par
195b4(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang de bzhin du de sems can de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'jug par byed do/ /des sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas bdag dang
195b5(mdo sde): gzhan rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar gyi 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing dran te/ rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par yang dag pa ji lta
195b6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du de kho na nyid dang / gzhan ma yin par rjod par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnams la'ang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa thob ste bya ba thams cad ston to/ /klu'i bdag po/ 'di
195b7(mdo sde): dag ni| byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ de la rang gi sems la dbang byed pas don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni/ de'i rnam par rtse ba ste/ sangs
196a1(mdo sde): rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang kun tu ston la gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed pa lta bu'o/ /
196a2(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa'i zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du byed pa'i mngon par shes pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la ma chags te/
196a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rnam par grol ba la lhag par dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis zag pa zad pa shes kyi/ shes pa de mngon sum du byed pa ni/ ma yin la sems can thams
196a4(mdo sde): cad kyi zag pa zad par bya ba kho na'i phyir yang 'khor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa drug pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/
196a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong pa la 'jug pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i mngon par shes pa
196a6(mdo sde): lnga dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i gzugs med
196a7(mdo sde): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su bsgos pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te/ klu'i
196b1(mdo sde): bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ de la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba
196b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mthong la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yang dag par bcom pa gang yin pa dang / 'khor ba'ang mthong
196b3(mdo sde): la mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang yang dag par gzhol ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mthong la byang chub kyi snying po la'ang gzhol ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa'i
196b4(mdo sde): rjes su'ang 'jug la sems can gyi spyod pa dben par yang shes pa ste/ 'di ni/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba ni/
196b5(mdo sde): 'dus byas kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su'ang 'jug la/ 'dus ma byas pa'ang thob pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'ang mthong la 'dus byas kyang thob
196b6(mdo sde): pa'o| |klu'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dus byas la spyod pa na'ang 'dus ma byas shes pas sgrib pa med pa la 'dus ma byas pa thob pa la'ang 'dus ma byas kyi chos
196b7(mdo sde): kyis sgrib pa med de/ der sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/
197a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / cho ga shes pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i shes pa dang /
197a2(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa dang / shes pa dang / bsam pa las su rung ba'i bsam pa dang / sems la dbang byed pa'i thabs te/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po
197a3(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa dang / cho ga shes pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
197a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag gi bde ba la mi lta bas yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang / brtson pa brtan pas sems can la bde ba
197a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa dang / gong du'ang yon tan khyad par can la'ang 'god par byed pa ste/
197a6(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po/ chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par byed pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
197a7(mdo sde): dpa' 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brda sprod pa la mkhas pa yin te/ drug gang zhe na/ gzungs thob pa dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis sgrub pa dang / yang dag pa la tshul
197b1(mdo sde): bzhin du 'jug pa dang / sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / dgongs pa'i tshig ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/
197b2(mdo sde): chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brda sprod pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
197b3(mdo sde): bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid phung po lnga yongs su shes pa dang yang ldan la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral te song pa nyid
197b4(mdo sde): la spyod yul ba'ang yin pa dang / 'du byed thams cad kyi skye ba med par yang rab tu shes la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du skye bar yang byed pa dang / brtson
197b5(mdo sde): 'grus brtan pas byang chub kyi bsam pa'ang yongs su mi gtong la khams gsum pas kyang yid rtag tu skrag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang mi ltung la thams cad mkhyen
197b6(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su tshol ba dang / sems can rnams la'ang lta la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang gsog pa dang / mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid la'ang yid ches la ye shes kyi tshogs
197b7(mdo sde): kyang gsog pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa la'ang ma chags pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba
198a1(mdo sde): bcom pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te byang chub sems
198a2(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sbyin pas nye bar brtan pa yin te mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang / tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te ngan song thams cad yang
198a3(mdo sde): dag par bcad pa dang / bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa yin te dbang po ma nyams pa dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa yin te dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams kyis cho ga mi shes pa dang /
198a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan la gnas pa yin te cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa yin te nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa yin te kun tu yongs su
198a5(mdo sde): bsngo ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin te don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa la mkhas pa dang / gzungs thob pa yin te
198a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bcu po
198a7(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad dang ldan na/
198b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba yin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bdag gi 'khrul ba la so sor rtog par byed
198b2(mdo sde): kyi gzhan gyi 'khrul ba la mi rtog pa dang / srog gi phyir yang gzhan dag la brnyas par mi byed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti thob pas kyang mtho bar mi 'dzin la ma thob pas kyang dma'
198b3(mdo sde): bar mi 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad la yon gnas kyi sems bskyed de sbyin pa byin pa dang / bgo bsha'i ngang tshul can yin te/ chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi byed pa dang /
198b4(mdo sde): gzhan gyi bde bas dga' ba yin te phrag dog dang ser sna dang bral ba dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la 'gyod pa med pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos brgyad po de
198b5(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang
198b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin te thebs la mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba
198b7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yin te chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa yin te sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rig pa'i cho ga shes pa dang / legs
199a1(mdo sde): par khong du chud pa shes pa yin te chags pa med par spyod pa dang / zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pas kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar spyod par byed la zag
199a2(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang zad par mi byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
199a3(mdo sde): pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa
199a4(mdo sde): dang | chos yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir dben pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa ste/ gsum po de dag go /gzhan yang gsum ste/ sngon gyi mtha'
199a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang / phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
199a6(mdo sde): legs par gnas pa'i chos nyid de/ gsum po de dag go /klu'i bdag po/ gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa yin te/ gsum gang
199a7(mdo sde): zhe na| lus yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyis nye bar brtan pa dang / ngag yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ye shes mtha' yas pa dang / sems yongs su dag par
199b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi dang ldan na//
199b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas sgrub pa dang / dkar po rnam par mthong
199b3(mdo sde): bas spyod pa la spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can kyi bsam pa rnams la ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa dang / shin tu med pa'i rang bzhin gyis ma skyes ma byung ba'i chos
199b4(mdo sde): rnams rab tu shes pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do/ /bstan pa 'di
199b5(mdo sde): bshad pa na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa khrag khrig phrag bcu
199b6(mdo sde): gnyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong gi ni mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo/ /dge slong
199b7(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /dge slong ma brgyad stong ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//
200a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu lnga stong gis ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba thob bo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de'i tshe rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /
200a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /me tog gi char chen po'ang bab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang bar snang las sil snyan brgya stong dag dkrol te ched du brjod pa 'di
200a3(mdo sde): skad kyang ched du brjod de/ a la la de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba 'di chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bskor to/ /yul wA ra NA si drang srong smra ba
200a4(mdo sde): ri dwags kyi nags su chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bskor ba gang yin pa 'di ni/ mtshungs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi
200a5(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di las sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa'i don mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan yang sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
200a6(mdo sde): ngan don ma yin pa dang ldan pa yin na/ sems can gang dag thos nas kyang 'chang bar byed pa lta ci smos te/ de dag gis ni/ mir skye ba rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de dag gis
200a7(mdo sde): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ngo / /de dag gis ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par thos so/ /chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag
200b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag gi ngan song thams cad ni/ bkag par gyur to/ /de dag lha dang mir skye ba'i sgo rnams ni/ phye bar gyur to/ /de dag
200b2(mdo sde): ni| yongs su mya ngan las 'das zin par rig par bya'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag /legs
200b3(mdo sde): so legs so/ /khyed kyis chig 'di legs par smras so/ /mdo sde'i tshig bstan pa 'di lta bu dag la dga' ba thob pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyis byin
200b4(mdo sde): gyis brlabs pa dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul ba yin no/ /sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin
200b5(mdo sde): no| |chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba thob pa gang yin pa'i sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'ba' zhig la yang dag par gzhol ba ma gtogs pa de
200b6(mdo sde): dag 'gro bar mi 'gyur na/ gang dag bsngags pa thos nas 'jin par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa rnams lta ci smos/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/ gleng gzhi'i
200b7(mdo sde): le'u ste dang po'o/ / //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bshad pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
201a1(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes nas rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag par byed pa'i rin po che'i bkod pa kun tu 'od zer 'byung ba'i 'od can zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen
201a2(mdo sde): po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab par phul lo/ /nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis kyang nyi ma dang / zla ba gnyis
201a3(mdo sde): kyi 'od mog mog por byas so/ /'khor thams cad kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad du a la la sangs rgyas byung ba ni/ ngo mtshar che
201a4(mdo sde): ste| de byung bas ni/ 'di ltar ya mtshan du rung zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos dag kyang snang ngo / /zhes smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dgab pa
201a5(mdo sde): byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'od dri ma ma mchis pa thob par gyur cig /'od des kyang phyogs
201a6(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur cig / sems can gang la 'od des phog pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis gnod par ma gyur cig /de bzhin
201a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu ci 'dra ba de lta bu yang bdag gis thob par gyur cig / byang chub kyi lam shes pa sgrib pa ma mchis pa'ang thob par gyur cig /lam
201b1(mdo sde): shes pa des kyang sems can lam log par zhugs pa rnams yang dag pa'i lam la 'god par gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
201b2(mdo sde): mun pa mun nag dang bral te lam shes pa thob par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i
201b3(mdo sde): rgyal po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi dbang gis byung ba/ shes rab kyi sgron ma lag na thogs pa/ shes rab kyi shes pa can/ shes rab kyi sngon du 'gro ba/ shes
201b4(mdo sde): rab kyi mtshon cha can/ shes rab kyi bya ba byed pa de ni/ shes rab kyi gnas la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus
201b5(mdo sde): rtsom par byed/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ chos rnams lhag par mthong bar byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /klu'i bdag po/ de la
201b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed ce na/ klu'i bdag po/ 'di la sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag mnyam pa nyid do/ /bdag
201b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can mnyam pa nyid do/ /sems can mnyam pa nyid kyis chos mnyam pa nyid do/ /chos mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do/ /mnyam pa nyid 'di
202a1(mdo sde): dag kyang mi spong la sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed de/ sbyin pa de'ang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis sbyin par mi byed do/ /des de ji lta ji ltar yongs su 'jal ba de kho na
202a2(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar byed de/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / rtsod pa thams cad
202a3(mdo sde): 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/ gtong ba'i mchog yin te/ klu'i bdag po/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o/ /de la
202a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i tshul khrims gang zhe na/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems dben par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims yongs su
202a5(mdo sde): srung ba ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems la'ang mi rten/ 'jig rten 'di la'ang mi rten/ 'jig rten pha rol la'ang mi rten/ nang la'ang mi rten/ phyi rol la'ang mi rten/ phung po
202a6(mdo sde): la'ang mi rten/ khams la'ang mi rten/ skye mched la'ang mi rten/ byang chub la'ang mi rten/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi rten/ chos thams cad la'ang mi rten par tshul khrims
202a7(mdo sde): srung bar byed la/ tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing shin tu rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i tshul khrims
202b1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ bzod pa gang sgom pa rnam dag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag tu mi
202b2(mdo sde): dmigs shing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la'ang mi gnas pa de ni/ nang dag pa dang / sems can dag pa dang / chos thams cad dag pas bzod pa sgom pa yin te/ de ni
202b3(mdo sde): bzod pa'ang sgom la/ chos gang yang sgom par mi byed/ mi sgom par yang mi byed la/ chos gang yang bskyed pa'i phyir ram/ dgag par bya ba'i phyir yang sgom par mi byed/ chos
202b4(mdo sde): gang yang zad par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang sgom par mi byed/ sems can bdag med pa dang / sems can dben pas kyang mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang
202b5(mdo sde): bar mi 'byung la bzod pa de'ang lus la dmigs pa dang / ngag la dmigs pa dang / sems la dmigs pas bzod par mi byed pa dang / de lus bshig pa'am/ yan lag
202b6(mdo sde): dang / nying lag rnams gcod pa na rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang 'dra bar so sor rtog cing bzod pa dang / de gzhan gyis ngan du smras pa thos na ngag ya ma bral dang / ngag gso ba
202b7(mdo sde): dang / ngag gsag dang / ngag gzung du med pa dang / ngag zhi ba dang / ngag mi gnas pa shes nas bzod pa dang / de sems rnyog pa med pa dang / sems gsar ma yin pa dang / sems
