263a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams
263a3(mdo sde): cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po/ chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
263a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgra gcan/ theg pa chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nga rgyal med pa yin te/ sems can
263a5(mdo sde): thams cad la 'dud cing mngon par 'dud pa dang / bka' blo bde ba yin te/ mthun par 'dzin pa dang / ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa dang / bla ma rnams la gus pa skyes pa dge ba spyod
263a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad la sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa yin te/ sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / srog gi phyir yang
263a7(mdo sde): gzhan 'khrug par mi byed pa dang / gong du'ang sems can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing skyabs su 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang / bsod
263b1(mdo sde): nams dang / ye shes thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang / chog mi shes pa ste/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags
263b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos du dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus
263b3(mdo sde): che ba nyid dang / gzugs che ba nyid dang / 'khor che ba nyid dang / sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/
263b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas lus che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan dag gi spyod lam la mi 'phya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam pa thams
263b5(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs par byad du 'jug pa dang / sems can bye ba dang / 'thab pa rnams bsdums shing mthun par bkod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
263b6(mdo sde): la 'dzud pa dang / sems can thams cad la dbang po zhe 'gras pa med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi
263b7(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas gzugs che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang / 'phags pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs
264a1(mdo sde): su gtong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byams pa'i mig gis lta ba dang / byad bzhin bzang po dag la phrag dog dang / ser sna mi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de
264a2(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzugs che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe
264a3(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ phra ma'i tshig spong zhing gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / gzhan gyi 'khor la dga' ba dang / byang chub kyi sems shin tu brtan pa dang / gzhan dag byang chub
264a4(mdo sde): la 'dzud pa ste/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpas 'khor che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
264a5(mdo sde): dpas sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dag ste g.yo med pa dang / sgyu can ma yin pa dang / 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / bar ma
264a6(mdo sde): dor skyo ba med pa dang / rgya chen po la mos shing theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la 'jug pas chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa ste/
264a7(mdo sde): sgra gcan/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang
264b1(mdo sde): bcas pa tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas rin po che'i me tog rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa khal bcu tshad brgyas bcom ldan 'das la
264b2(mdo sde): gtor te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ phyogs bcu dag na sems can
264b3(mdo sde): khams rnams mtha' yas gang su dag / skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig la rgyal ba mchod byed dang / /phyogs bcu dag na sems can gang dag bskal pa 'bum du yang / mchod
264b4(mdo sde): la brtson pa'i sems can dag ni phan par byed pa dang / /byams dang bsod nams 'phags pa'i rang bzhin las byung mchod pa rnams/ /ci 'dra ba dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa ma lags
264b5(mdo sde): khyod la 'os/ /mtshungs med sems kyis yang lag gnas nas bskyed pa gang lags pa/ /de ni stobs bcu ldan pa rnams la rjed dang mchod pa lags/ /bdag ni byang chub reg 'gyur snyam
264b6(mdo sde): ste de la sgrib gnas nas/ /bdag ni g.yo med byang chub mtshungs ma mchis la zhugs pa lags/ /mi dbang las bzhin srid gsum su yang bdag gi dbang ma mchis/ /bdag gi bsam
264b7(mdo sde): pa ci 'dra'i dpang ni stobs bcu ldan pa lags/ /bdag ni kun la shin tu sdug cing nga rgyal gsal ba dang / /sbyin dang dul dang ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan la bzod ldan dang / /brtson
265a1(mdo sde): 'grus dran pa ting 'dzin shes rab rnam dag gnas pa dang / /byams dang snying rjer ldan zhing bden pa'i chos la spyod gyur cig /phan bzhed rgyal ba gal te
265a2(mdo sde): bdag la lung ston mi mdzad kyang / /mi yi dbang po bdag ni rang gis rang la lung yang bstan/ /bdag ni rang byung mi 'gyur snyam du yid gnyis dogs ma mchis/ /de ltar bdag
265a3(mdo sde): ni bsam pa thag pas byang chub nyid sems des/ /mi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad nas zla ba'i tog gis zhus pa ni/ /rang byung 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di ni ci lags lung bstan gsol/ /
265a4(mdo sde): gang gi phyir na das ni dag pa'i 'od rnams ston mdzad pa/ /zla ba'i tog khyod mnyan par gyis zhes ston pas de la gsungs/ /lha min sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po byang chub mchog
265a5(mdo sde): la zhugs/ /g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stod gang lags rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgyar ni byang chub spyod pa spyad nas kyang / /thams cad rjes su mthun par
265a6(mdo sde): byang chub gtso bo thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba gang+gA'i bye ma snyed rnams la ni mchod bgyis te/ /de nas sems can shin tu mang po byang chub bkod nas kyang / /de yi 'og tu
265a7(mdo sde): bskal pa dge ba bkod pa mdzes pa la/ /byang chub rdul bral zhi ba mya ngan med par 'tshang yang rgya/ /sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po 'di ni chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus
265b1(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan te dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang bgyi/ /'jig rten khams kyang dga' bskyed ba'i bkod pa zhes bgyi ste/ /dga' ldan gnas dang 'dra bar 'byor cing rgyas la la
265b2(mdo sde): yang legs/ /stobs bcu ldan gyi tshe ni lo grangs bye ba bdun cu ste/ /dge slong 'phags pa'i dge 'dun khrag khrig drug cu tham par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun khrag
265b3(mdo sde): khrig phrag bcu brgyad cu ste/ /thos pa dang ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzungs la shin tu gnas/ /bskal pa dge ba bkod pa zhes bgyi mdzes pa de dag tu/ /sems can brgya stong dag
265b4(mdo sde): ni byang chub bkod pa bgyis nas kyang / /'di dag thams cad rim gyis byang chub mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya/ /byang chub sems mchog gi ni yon tan khyad par dag la ltos/ /der ni sgra gcan bzang
265b5(mdo sde): po lung bstan thos par gyur nas kyang / /srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi dag byang chub mchog la zhugs par gyur/ /legs par yon tan 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis//
265b6(mdo sde): stong gsum rab g.yos lhas kyang me tog char pa rab tu phab/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams
265b7(mdo sde): cad ni| bdag ma mchis pa/ byed pa po ma mchis pa lags na/ lung bstan pa ni/ gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang lags/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
266a1(mdo sde): rgya ba ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po/ de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa/ byed pa po med
266a2(mdo sde): pa yin te/ de ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skyi bo phyin ci log dang ldan pa/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams sems
266a3(mdo sde): can med pa dag la sems can du 'du shes skyed par byed de/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis snying rje chen po bskyed nas phyin ci log gi 'du shes spod du gzhug pa
266a4(mdo sde): dang | ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu go cha gyon par zad kyi/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gis sems can med pa dang / gang
266a5(mdo sde): zag med pa mi shes pa ni/ ma yin te/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu lta ba'i sems can de dag yongs su grol bar byed do/ /klu'i
266a6(mdo sde): ba dag po/ khyod 'di skad du 'di la lung bstan nas gshegs zhes zer ba gang yin pa de la mngon sum du chos khong du chud pa ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /sems can med pa dang / srog
266a7(mdo sde): med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa des sems nges par sems pa'i sems dang ldan par lung bstan pa'o/ /ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas
266b1(mdo sde): med pa la gnas pa ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /sems can thams cad mtshungs par bdag med pa la mos pa ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad mtshungs par chos dben par mthod ba ni/ lung
266b2(mdo sde): bstan pa'o/ /zhing thams cad zhing du mtshungs par nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings
266b3(mdo sde): dang dbyer med pa'i ye shes mthong ba ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /bdud thams cad mtshungs par bdud kyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur te/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su
266b4(mdo sde): dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog la mi len mi 'dor ba ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ de ltar na
266b5(mdo sde): sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa lung bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/ dmigs su med do/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ji lta ba
266b6(mdo sde): bzhin du khong du chud pa ni/ byang chub yin te/ de la don dam par na gang gi lung bstan pa'am/ gang gi byang chub ba ma/ gang lung bstan par bya ba'am/ gang gis lung bstan pa'am/ cis
266b7(mdo sde): lung bstan pa ci'ang mi dmigs so/ /klu'i bdag po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ dngos po med pa ste/ rtsa ba rnams yongs su chad pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag po med
267a1(mdo sde): pa ste| rgyu dang rkyen rnams las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ gzung du med pa ste/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos
267a2(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ bral ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ ma 'ongs pa ste/ sngon gyi mtha' nas ma 'phros pa'i phyir ro/ /chos
267a3(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ med par gyur pa ste/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ mi gnas pa ste/ gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ mi
267a4(mdo sde): dmigs pa ste/ byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ byed pa med pa ste/ lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ lus med pa ste/ gnas med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos
267a5(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ gnas med pa ste/ rten med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ rten med pa ste/ mi g.yo ba'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ mi g.yo ba ste/ mi gnas pa'i phyir
267a6(mdo sde): ro| |chos thams cad ni/ mi gnas pa ste/ bem po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ bem po yin te/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid med pa
267a7(mdo sde): ste| rnam par rig par mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ rnam par rig par mi byed pa ste/ sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ sgro btags pa med
267b1(mdo sde): pa ste| yid la byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ yid la byed pa med pa ste/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ dmigs su med pa ste/ 'gyur ba med
267b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rtog cing dpyod pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ rtog cing dpyod pa med pa ste/ zhi ba'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ zhi zhing
267b3(mdo sde): rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba ste/ rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad
267b4(mdo sde): ni| rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba ste/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /
267b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni/ gnyis dang bral ba ste/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ bgrod pa gcig pa ste/ so so tha dad pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /chos thams
267b6(mdo sde): cad ni| so so tha dad pa dang bral ba ste/ bye brag med pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad ni/ bye brag med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa'i phyir ro/ /klu'i bdag po/ de ltar na/ chos
267b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de la ni/ lung bstan par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ci'ang med do/ /klu'i bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
268a1(mdo sde): kyi snying rje chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i stobs la ltos/ gang chos 'di lta bu dag ming dang brdas rnam par phye nas sems
268a2(mdo sde): can dag la go par byed la sems can la ma gtogs pa'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong / chos la ma gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang ma mthong ngo / /sems can rnams
268a3(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /byang chub kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /lung bstan pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /chos thams cad kyi dbyings
268a4(mdo sde): kyang de dang 'dra ste/ des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i don gyis na/ de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin
268a5(mdo sde): nyid ma bsgribs pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa'i don des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar de bzhi na gshegs
268a6(mdo sde): pa dang / de bzhin nyid mtshungs par rab tu phye ba de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid dang mtshungs par rab tu phye ba yin te/ klu'i bdag po/ 'di ni/ de bzhin
268a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams de la gnas na/ mi skrag mi da dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa
268b1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid 'di'ang sems can rnams la go bar byed do/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum stong nyid brgyas mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /
268b2(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'ang tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas dzam+bu'i gling ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
268b3(mdo sde): la gsol to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyi tsha mo rin chen sna tshogs can zhes bya ba des klu'i bu mo khri dang lhan cig tu lag pa g.yas
268b4(mdo sde): pas mu tig gi phreng ba brangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par blta ste phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can dang / klu'i bu mo khri bo de dag
268b5(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mu tig gi phreng ba de dag gsol nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams lhan cig tu mthun zhing yang dag par
268b6(mdo sde): dga' bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
268b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig / da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'di 'dra bar chos kyang ston par gyur cig /dge 'dun yang srung bar gyur cig /de nas
269a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos klu'i bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ bud med kyi lus kyis
269a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ 'grub par dka'o/ /de nas bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa
269a3(mdo sde): 'od srung chen po/ bud med kyi lus kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur la lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs
269a4(mdo sde): pa la'ang byang chub 'grub dka' ba ma mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni/ sems bskyed pa la rag las te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas
269a5(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pas gang 'di skad du bud med kyi lus kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
269a6(mdo sde): rgya bar mi nus so/ /zhes gsungs pa de ni/ skyes pa'i lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas
269a7(mdo sde): 'di skad du mig ni/ skyes pa'ang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni/ bud med kyang ma yin/ skyes pa'ang
269b1(mdo sde): ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni/ stong pa ste/ stong pa gang lags pa de la ni/ bud med kyang ma mchis/ skyes
269b2(mdo sde): pa'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni/ stong pa ste/ stong pa gang lags pa de la ni/ bud med
269b3(mdo sde): kyang ma mchis/ skyes pa'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa/ de la mig khong du chud pa gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub lags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
269b4(mdo sde): dang / yid khong du chud pa gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub lags so/ /byang chub gang lags pa de la ni/ bud med kyi chos rnams sam/ skyes pa'i chos rnams ma mchis so/ /
269b5(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de ni/ bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyang de lags so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ ci khyod byang chub yin nam/
269b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ gnas brtan dang / bdag cag gnyis ka'ang byang chub lags so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bo ni/ byang chub ma yin gyi/ kho bo ni/ nyan thos yin no/ /smras pa/
269b7(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ khyod sus btul/ smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bo ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas btul to/ /smras pa/ gnas brtan/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas
270a1(mdo sde): btul na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas su zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnas brtan gdul bar spyod
270a2(mdo sde): dam| bu mo/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ de lta bas na/ khyod nyid kyang byang chub lags te/ byang chub ma lags pa'i chos ci'ang ma mchis
270a3(mdo sde): so| |smras pa/ bu mo/ ci mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa/ de de bzhin te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub lags so/ /
270a4(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni/ mtshams med pa'i rang bzhin can lags te/ mtshams med pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub
270a5(mdo sde): lags la/ stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub lags pa'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa/ de ltar na/ mtshams med pa khong du chud pa lags byang
270a6(mdo sde): chub 'byung ngo / /btsun pa/ byang chub ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni/ ma mchis te/ gal te chos 'ga' zhig dang mi ldan na ni/ ma lags kyi/ chos thams cad mnyam
270a7(mdo sde): pa nyid dang ldan pa de ni/ byang chub lags so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyi spobs pa 'di sus byin/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis stsal to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gnas brtan
270b1(mdo sde): gyis ma smras na/ bdag gi spobs pa 'di skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa/ dper na/ gal te ma smras na brag ca'i sgra 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du btsun pa 'od srung
270b2(mdo sde): chen po| byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ ma dris kyi par du spobs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed la bsnyen bkur byas/ smras
270b3(mdo sde): pa| gnas brtan gyis nyon mongs pa ji snyed spangs pa snyed la'o/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ kho bo'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ spangs pa med do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas
270b4(mdo sde): pa lags sam/ smras pa/ kho bo ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ang ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'ang ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci btsun pa/ khyod kyis nyon mongs pa rnams
270b5(mdo sde): bzhag gam/ smras pa/ bskyed pa'ang med/ 'gag par byas pa'ang med/ bzhag pa'ang med de/ de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du shes so/ /smras pa/ ci de bzhin nyid shes par bgyi
270b6(mdo sde): ba zhig lags sam/ smras pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na ci'i slad du de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa shes so/ /zhes gsungs/ gal te mkhyen na ni/ de bzhin
270b7(mdo sde): nyid lags so/ /ci ste mi mkhyen na ni/ de lta na rdzun pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang mi shes pa can du mtshungs so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyi tshig thams cad ni/ gzhan gyi
271a1(mdo sde): tshig gcod par byed pa'o/ /smras pa/ bdag ni/ tshig gcod par yang mi bgyid/ sgrub par yang mi bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni/
271a2(mdo sde): gcad du ma mchis pa lags la/ tshig thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du'o/ /smras pa/ gang khyod kyis bdag byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad
271a3(mdo sde): dang mnyam ste bzhag pa de khyod 'gyod par mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ gal te bdag gis gnas brtan yang tha dad la byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad
271a4(mdo sde): kyang tha dad par bzhag pa ni/ de ltar bdag 'gyod par 'gyur ba zhig na gang gi slad du bdag gis gnas brtan byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang tha mi dad par bzhag pa
271a5(mdo sde): des na| bdag 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ mtshungs zhes bgyi ba de ni/ chos thams cad tha dad pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi tshig bla
271a6(mdo sde): dwags lags so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ /ci khyod so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs sam/ 'on te 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs/ smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ so so'i
271a7(mdo sde): skye bo rnams dang mtshungs pa'ang ma lags/ 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs pa'ang ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te bdag so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs na
271b1(mdo sde): ni| bdag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs na ni/ nyan thos rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de ltar na ni/ bdag
271b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ gal te khyod so so'i skye bo rnams dang gang mi mtshungs/ 'phags pa rnams dang yang mi mtshungs na/
271b3(mdo sde): ci khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs sam/ smras pa/ 'od srung chen po/ bdag ni/ da gzod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs pa ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
271b4(mdo sde): bdag ni/ thog ma nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ gal te khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs na/ ci sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag khyod
271b5(mdo sde): la yod dam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan/ ci sangs rgyas kyi chos su gdags pa 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas
271b6(mdo sde): pa'am| sngon po'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po'am/ dkar po'am/ btsod ka'am/ shel gyi kha dog gam/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu lags sam/ smras pa/ bu mo/ sangs
271b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams gdags pa ni/ kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi sgo nas bstan par mi nus so/ /smras pa/ btsun pa/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gdags su ma mchis pa dang /
272a1(mdo sde): gdags su mi rung ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bdag la tshor bar mdzad/ smras pa/ bu mo/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos gang las btsal bar bya/ smras pa/
272a2(mdo sde): lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las btsal bar bgyi'o/ /smras pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyang gang las btsal bar bya/ smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
272a3(mdo sde): grol ba las btsal bar bgyi'o/ /smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang las btsal bar bya/ smras pa/ mtshams med pa lnga las btsal bar bgyi'o/ /
272a4(mdo sde): smras pa| mtshams med pa lnga'ang gang las btsal bar bya/ smras pa/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las btsal bar bgyi'o/ /smras
272a5(mdo sde): pa| bu mo/ khyod kyi gtam 'di 'dra ba de ji lta bu zhig /smras pa/ btsun pa/ gtam 'di ni/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i gtam lags so/ /blang du ma mchis shing dor du ma
272a6(mdo sde): mchis te/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i gtam lags so/ /chos thams cad tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i gtam lags so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
272a7(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi byang chub dang mthun pa ma yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ /de ni/ med de/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub dang mthun pa ma lags
272b1(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ bsnyad du ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ /
272b2(mdo sde): bshad pa'i dngos po gang lags ba de dag thams cad ni/ sgras rnam par dbye ba lags so/ /byang chub gang lags pa de ni/ don dam par sgras brda sprad par mi nus pa lags
272b3(mdo sde): so| |btsun pa/ byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ nye bar zhi ba'i gzhi lags so/ /'di ni/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzhi lags so/ /'di ni/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi gzhi lags so/ /
272b4(mdo sde): 'di ni| gzhi ma mchis pa'i gzhi lags so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ gal te byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu yin na/ de ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras
272b5(mdo sde): pa| btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ lus dang sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni/ lus dang sems kyi ngo bo nyid kho na
272b6(mdo sde): lags te/ ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ ci khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/ smras
272b7(mdo sde): pa| bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ byang chub kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /smras pa/ bu mo/ gal te khyod nyid byang chub yin na/
273a1(mdo sde): ci khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ram/ smras pa/ bdag ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags so/ /smras pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
273a2(mdo sde): ba ji lta bu zhig / smras pa/ 'khor lo de ni/ rten thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du mi g.yo ba lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas
273a3(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ bral ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas mi gnas
273a4(mdo sde): pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ gnas thams cad las byung ba ma lags pas gnas ma mchis pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
273a5(mdo sde): kyi rjes su song bas gnyis su ma mchis pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ gcig dad tha dad pa mi dmigs pas tha dad pa ma lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ sgra dang / skad
273a6(mdo sde): dang / tshig gi lam thams cad ro gcig pas brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma lags pas rnam par dag pa
273a7(mdo sde): lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ chad pa dang / rtag pa mi dmigs pas yod pa yongs su chad pa ma lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ rgyu dang / rkyen shin tu brtags pas 'gal
273b1(mdo sde): ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ bden pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ mi skye mi 'gag pa lags so/ /'khor lo de ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
273b2(mdo sde): pa med pa lags so/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ 'khor lo de 'dra ba gang lags pa de'i bskor ba ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis bstan pa 'di 'dra ba lags
273b3(mdo sde): na| khyod ni/ ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ gang gi tshe gnas brtan byang chub
273b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/ /smras pa/ kho bo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
273b5(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur ba de ni/ gnas med skabs med de/ smras pa/ de de lta lags te/ byang chub ni/ gnas ma mchis pa la gnas pa ste/ de ni/ sus kyang mngon par
273b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus pa lags so/ /bu mo des bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /bcom ldan
273b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang bu mo de la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ bu mo/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di legs par smras so/ /bam po drug pa/ de nas
274a1(mdo sde): 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bu mo 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag
274a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas dge slong dag la bka'
274a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can 'di ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya na bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba
274a4(mdo sde): can du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can
274a5(mdo sde): de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od kyis rtag tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhabs 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /de'i
274a6(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad ni/ bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu'i bu mo khri bo de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang
274a7(mdo sde): gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs des byang chub brnyes pa de'i tshe bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar gyur cig/ ces gsol nas de dag
274b1(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar lung bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
274b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'di dag ni/ lha ma yin gyis 'jigs pas rtag tu skrag bzhin du gnas la/ lha dang / lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na 'pham na
274b3(mdo sde): tshun rtsod cing 'gyed par bgyid de/ de bas na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci nas sems can thams cad sems mthun par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos
274b4(mdo sde): bstan na/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'khor 'dir lha dang / lha ma yin 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad kyang ci nas gcig la gcig mthun par bgyid pa dang / byams par
274b5(mdo sde): sems pa dang / phan par sems pa dang / gnod par sems par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur sems dang par bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan
274b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog dang / thag bzang ris dang / lag bzang dang / sim byed rnams la bka' stsal pa/
274b7(mdo sde): grogs po dag /byams pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags so/ /byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis ni/ tshe 'di dang / tshe phyi ma'i don thob par
275a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag /tshe 'di ni/ yun thung ngo / /tshe phyi mar ni/ 'gro dgos so/ /'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni/ rgud pa'o/ /rgyal po'i longs spyod
275a2(mdo sde): dang | dbang phyug rnams ni/ mi rtag gi /khyed lhan cig mthun pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pas
275a3(mdo sde): gnas par gyis shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar ci nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha ma yin de dag mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skyo
275a4(mdo sde): ba'i gtam mdzad do/ /de nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag deng slan chad mnyen pa'i tshul du bgyid cing gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems
275a5(mdo sde): dang | gnod sems ma mchis pas gnas par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag/ legs so/ /legs so/ /byams pa'i sems gang
275a6(mdo sde): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod pa'i mchog yin no/ /rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams kyis mchod pas ni/ 'di lta ste/
275a7(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin de mchog yin te/ ngas de las dgongs nas de skad bstan to/ /grogs po dag /gzhan yang bzhi po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs
275b1(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa khyad du 'phags pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / byams pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
275b2(mdo sde): mi chad par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa'i chos kyi nan tan te/ bzhi po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa khyad
275b3(mdo sde): par du 'phags pa'o/ /bstan pa 'di thos nas lha'i 'khor dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khor de dag gi nang nas bzhi khrims byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
275b4(mdo sde): la klu'i rgyal po dbugs can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbugs can chen po dang / 'jog pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgya mtsho
275b5(mdo sde): chen po 'di'i nang na klu rigs tshad ma mchis pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa sna tshogs las skyes pa gang dag mchis te/ de la kha cig ni/ dbang cher grags pa lags /kha cig
275b6(mdo sde): ni| lus nyam chung zhing chung bar grags la lus chung ba dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi der babs nas klu gzhon nu dang / klu'i bu
275b7(mdo sde): mo lus nyam chung ba rnams bton te 'tshal bar bgyid la/ rgya mtsho'i nang gi klu'i rigs thams cad kyang skrag par bgyid lags na/ ci nas rgya mtsho chen po'i klu de dag thams
276a1(mdo sde): cad kyang 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang / skrag pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi sa srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba
276a2(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ras phrag zar phrag las phab nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ kye klu'i bdag po/ ras phrag
276a3(mdo sde): zar 'di longs la/ klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad du dum bu dum bur gsheg ste byin cig dang / ji srid du ras phrag zar 'di las tha na nyag ma gcig tsam
276a4(mdo sde): gnas pa de srid du'ang rgya mtsho chen por nam mkha' lding thams cad rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ klu'i bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i
276a5(mdo sde): mchog gi thugs kyis smon pa ni/ 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad ras phrag zar 'di ltar chung ba 'di rgya mtsho chen po'i klu thams cad kyis ji ltar
276a6(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur snyam ste zhum par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la
276a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis ras phrag zar 'di las dum
276b1(mdo sde): bu dum bur khyer du zin kyang ras phrag zar 'di yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ de dag gis gos ji tsam gyi tshad du 'gyur bar 'dod na'ang de las de dag gi gos de tsam du 'gyur te/ klu'i
276b2(mdo sde): bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni/ de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i ras phrag zar de blangs te dum bu 'bum phrag du mar byas
276b3(mdo sde): nas klu thams cad dang / klu gzhon nu thams cad la so sor phyin no/ /der su ji tsam du 'dod pa de la de tsam gyi gos su mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ yangs shing rgya che bar
276b4(mdo sde): 'gyur la/ ras phrag zar de'ang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag /ras phrag zer de la
276b5(mdo sde): ston pa'i 'du shes dang / mchod rten gyi 'du shes skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ras phrag zar 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas longs spyod pa yin te/ sems can thams
276b6(mdo sde): cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin no/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa dang / ras phrag zer 'di la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bye brag tu bya
276b7(mdo sde): ba'am| tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ klu'i bdag po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis ji
277a1(mdo sde): skad smras pa bzhin te/ ras phrag zar de la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /klu'i
277a2(mdo sde): bdag po/ klu dang / klu gzhon nu dang / klu'i bu mo ji snyed kyis ras phrag zar de las dum bu dum bur khyer ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so//
277a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag thams cad ni/ bskal pa bzang po 'di kho na la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas lung bstan te/ theg pa chen po la
277a4(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams ni/ ma gtogs so/ /klu'i bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ de ltar 'jig rten na yon gnas yin te/ de la sems bskyed pa tsam yang chud za bar
277a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu dang / klu gzhon nu dang / klu'i bu mo ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te /rab tu dga' zhing
277a6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gnyis su mi gsung
277a7(mdo sde): ba'o| |de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ bden pa gsung pa'o/ /yang dag par gsung ba'o/ /phyin ci ma log par gsung ba ste/ des bdag cag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
277b1(mdo sde): bar lung bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la shin tu skyabs su mchi'o/ /bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang gzung
277b2(mdo sde): bar 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang bka' drin du gzo bar 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na'ang blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang bsnyen bkur
277b3(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du rgyun mi chad par thad du mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'ang sku gdung 'chang ba rnams la mchod pa
277b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |bkur sti dang / rim gro thams cad kyang bgyi'o/ /klu yongs su bskyab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //de nas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhis
277b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di thos nas mi dga' zhing / rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
277b6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi 'tshal ma bkur sti ci bgyi lags/
277b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /zas bzhi po 'di dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro
278a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ grogs po dag /zas gang srog chags gzhan bsad pa dang / srog chags gzhan la rnam par 'tshe
278a2(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho ba 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i zas dang po'o/ /
278a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag /gzhan yang zas gang ma byin par len cing 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod 'jig par byed pa dang / dbyug pa dang / ral gri dang / mtshon cha
278a4(mdo sde): dang / lag chas 'tshog pa 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i zas gnyis pa'o/ /grogs
278a5(mdo sde): po dag / gzhan yang zas gang tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / pha rol la gnod pa byed pa dang / spyod lam yang dag par ston pa dang / cho ga nyams pa dang / tshul
278a6(mdo sde): khrims nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa dang / log pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yon tan gyis 'tsho ba 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
278a7(mdo sde): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i zas gsum pa'o/ /grogs po dag/ gzhan yang zas gang ston pa ma yin pa la ston par khas 'che ba dang / yang dag par song
278b1(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa la yang dag par song bar khas 'che ba dang / dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas
278b2(mdo sde): 'tsho ba 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i zas bzhi pa ste/ grogs po dag /nga ni/ zas bzhi po
278b3(mdo sde): 'di dag yang dag par gcad pa'i phyir chos ston te/ grogs po dag /lus gso ba'i phyir gzhan gyi srog gcad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad la
278b4(mdo sde): ni |srog gces shing phangs pa'i phyir te/ grogs po dag /de lta bas na/ bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten pha rol bsrung ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad
278b5(mdo sde): la bde ba sbyin pa'i phyir mkhas pas srog gi phyir yang gzhan gyi srog mi gcod cing / bya ba ma yin pa thams cad mi bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bya'i rgyal po nam
278b6(mdo sde): mkha' lding bzhi g.yog sa ya sa ya dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos dang / dge
278b7(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sngon sdig pa'i las bgyis pa'ang so sor bshags so/ /slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lo/ klu'i rigs thams cad la'ang mi 'jigs
279a1(mdo sde): pa stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yun ji srid gnas pa de srid du'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las
279a2(mdo sde): la brtson par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag / khyed ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser
279a3(mdo sde): thub kyi gsung rab la dge slong bzhir gyur te/ dga' byed dang / dga' byed chen po dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i bshes gnyen zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong bzhi po de
279a4(mdo sde): dag rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyags pas myos shing mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang / slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rgyags pas myos la/ bdag nyid
279a5(mdo sde): ni| tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / lta ba nyams/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams la ni/ 'khrug pa dang / gnod pa byas te lus dang / ngag dang / yid ma
279a6(mdo sde): bsdams shing sdig pa mang po byas par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de la'ang de dag gis mchod pa mang po byas so/ /des na khyed sems can dmyal bar ma
279a7(mdo sde): song ste| dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'dir skyes nas 'di ltar sdom pas ma bsdams pa'i phyir khyod kyis srog gcod pa mang du byas shing sdig pa'i las mang du byas la/ mang po dag
279b1(mdo sde): kyang 'jigs par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi po de dag gis ci nas tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser
279b2(mdo sde): t hub de dang der dge sbyong du gyur nas las mngon par 'du byed pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad
279b3(mdo sde): do| |de dag gis mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems ni/ dmu rgod gdul dka' zhing srung dka' ba lags te/ der bdag cag
279b4(mdo sde): gis sems brkam chags can du gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de ma mnyes par bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis
279b5(mdo sde): slan chad rang gi srog kyang yongs su gtang bar 'tshal gyi/ sdig pa'i las ni/ mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba bskyed nas 'di skad
279b6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su gtogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen por
279b7(mdo sde): sems can gyi don ji snyed bya dgos pa de dag thams cad mdzad nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po tshur shog /da rang gi mal cha dang / stan rnams sdus shig /
280a1(mdo sde): nga ni| rang gi gnas su 'gro'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par gdan de las bzhengs nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyir
280a2(mdo sde): yang rin po che'i them skas rnams las bkod pa chen po dang / mchod pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid chen pos gshegs nas mgur bsal te rgya mtsho'i 'gram du
280a3(mdo sde): gzhes so/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' lha dang mis
280a4(mdo sde): mchod pa/ /lha min dbang pos bsnyen bkur mi mchog deng phyag 'tshal/ /pad+ma lta bu'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla ba 'dra/ /dge ba'i chos kyis 'phags pa bde sbyin deng phyag 'tshal/ /
280a5(mdo sde): gzugs mchog ston pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan/ /yon tan ye shes 'phags pa rnam 'dren deng phyag 'tshal/ /sbyin dang dul bas 'phags pa tshul khrims bzang
280a6(mdo sde): po brtsegs/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa mi mchog deng phyag 'tshal/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis byung ba bsam gtan blo gros sbyangs/ /shes rab mkha' mtshungs
280a7(mdo sde): khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal/ /byams pas snyoms pa'i thugs ldan thugs rjes 'gro la gzigs/ /'dren pa thugs dgyes rtag tu btang snyoms pha rol gshegs/ /ka
280b1(mdo sde): la ping+ka lta bur gsung snyan tshangs skad ston/ /gsung snyan ston pa khyod la de ring mgos phyag 'tshal/ /bdud dpung 'joms pa bdud stobs nges par 'joms mdzad pa/ /byang chub brtul
280b2(mdo sde): zhugs sgrub pa srid gsum srid pas mchod/ /dri gsum dri ma sbyong ba rnam thar gsum ston par/ /'jig rten gsum grags khyod la de ring ma gos phyag 'tshal/ /bden pa'i brtul
280b3(mdo sde): zhugs bzang rtogs rtag tu chos kyis 'phags/ /rtag tu dgon pa spyod yul rtag tu ye shes spyod/ /nyon mongs dgra 'joms gzi brjid lhag par gzi bskyed pa/ /pad+ma lta bu'i
280b4(mdo sde): spyan mnga' deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/ /lhun po'i rtse 'dra dgongs pa rdo rje lta bur brtan/ /dgongs pas 'dra yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro la stong pa ston pa zhi
280b5(mdo sde): gnas pha rol phyin/ /rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /bdud rtsi dam pa ston pa 'gro min 'gro ba gcod/ /lha dang mis mchod khyod la de ring mgos phyag
280b6(mdo sde): 'tshal| |sa steng lha yul grags pa snyan dang grags pa 'phags/ /yon tan rgya chen mi bzad yon tan 'byung gnas 'dud/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin mdzad cing ji skad mdzad
280b7(mdo sde): bzhin gsung / /ji skad spyod bzhin skul ba deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal/ /rga shi grol mdzad sman pa 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur ba/ /thar pa'i lam ston khyod la de ring mgos phyag
281a1(mdo sde): 'tshal/ /rgyu yi byed pa rab ston lta ba'i mun pa sel/ /lam mchog ston pa rgyal ba khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /rin chen sbyin pa gcig pu chos kyi dga'
281a2(mdo sde): ba gsung / /sa 'dra'i thugs ldan khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dren pa yon tan rgya mtsho yon tan las bstod pa'i/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang lags des ni
281a3(mdo sde): khyod 'drar shog / de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das la de skad bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
281a4(mdo sde): slar byung ste gshegs pas rgya mtsho chen po mi mdzes pa lags na/ ci nas bdag rgya mtsho mdzes par bgyid pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan na legs
281a5(mdo sde): so| |de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od ldan ma/ chos bcu po 'di dag ni/ rgyan du
281a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems
281a7(mdo sde): can thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa dang / bsam pa'i sbyor ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
281b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed pa dga' bar gnas pa dang / sbyin pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi smon lam la brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
281b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang / shes bzhin du gnas pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba chud mi za ba'i phyir dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya
281b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir chos dang ldan zhing chos 'dod pa dang / phan pa'i dngos pos sems can thams cad la yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / gnyis su med pas gong du khyab par
281b4(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi thugs su chud pa la yang dag par gzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa ste/ 'od ldan ma / chos bcu po de dag ni/ rgyan du 'dul ba yin
281b5(mdo sde): no| |de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ma lha mo khri dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom
281b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyan lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi sems ni/ stong gsum gyi stong
281b7(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan lags na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ byang chub kyi sems de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan pa'i slad du
282a1(mdo sde): bdag cag gis bskyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/
282a2(mdo sde): bdag ni/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson pa kho nar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ grong khyer du gshegs
282a3(mdo sde): pa na'ang bkod pa thams cad nye bar bstan par 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi dben pa'i gtam mdzad pa na'ang 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa sgrub par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
282a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od ldan ma/ 'di ltar khyod kyis ni/ sangs rgyas khri la mchod pa byas so/ /'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa'ang bstan to/ /dam pa'i chos kyang
282a5(mdo sde): yongs su bsrungs so/ /'od ldan ma/ khyod ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su
282a6(mdo sde): srung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod ni/ bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par
282a7(mdo sde): dga' bar skye bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyi dngos po brjes nas skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyod ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa
282b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas bcom ldan 'das las bdag nyid kyi lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing
282b2(mdo sde): mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che dang rin thang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol
282b3(mdo sde): nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bdag ni thub pa ye shes yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de yis lung bstan
282b4(mdo sde): te/ /bdag ni 'dren par 'gyur ba dag la yid gnyis the tshom ci yang yod ma mchis/ /stong gsum sa gzhi thams cad 'gas shing zla ba sa la lhung yang gda'/ /lha las lhag pa'i
282b5(mdo sde): lhas mchod sangs rgyas phyin ci log gi tshig gsum yong mi gda'/ /bsam pa byams pa brtson 'grus yul la thugs ni 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi mnga' ltos/ /bdag ni stong pa'i
282b6(mdo sde): ye shes yul gyi chos rnams dag la gus par bgyid la ltos/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i yang dag spyod pa rnams dang ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' ltos/ /de yis 'dren ni bdag
282b7(mdo sde): gi sems kyi yul bden mkhyen nam de bzhin lud yang bstan/ /smon pa rab mchog bde sbyin sdug bsngal kun las grol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dang skyabs dang dpung
283a1(mdo sde): gnyen skyob pa 'jigs pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin mdzad pa/ /rgyal ba lam mchog dam pa ston mdzad lam ngan yongs su spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
283a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnam par gzigs la mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dir ni lha dang mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs rnams thos pa dang / /byang
283a3(mdo sde): chub spyod cing byang chub bsam pa sems pa de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /de dag la ni ngan song ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med de mi khom brgyad las yongs su grol/ /de dang de dag lha
283a4(mdo sde): dang mi yi bde la nges shing zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dgas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha dang / klu dang /
283a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa mang po dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
283a6(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyis lags na/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang ba mdzad na/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las cung zad tsam 'tshal te/
283a7(mdo sde): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas par rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i bkod pa chen po'i khang bzang gi nang du bzhugs par gsol la/ bya rgod kyi phung
283b1(mdo sde): po'i ril skyel bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di'i dus la bab par shes na/ skyo ba cig /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mthong dgas sangs rgyas
283b2(mdo sde): kyi mthu dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i khang bzang byin gyis brlabs nas/ der bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring dang bcas par bzhugs par gsol nas
283b3(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang las gshegs te klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang sil snyan byed/ pheg rdob/ glu dbyangs len cing me tog gi char chen po 'bebs la/ lha'i spos dang / phye ma sna tshogs
283b4(mdo sde): kyi char 'bebs bzhin du mthar gyis bcom ldan 'das bya rgod phung po'i ri la bskyal to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bu dang bcas/ chung ma dang g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan
283b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs nas bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis ma 'byor bar gyur pa gang lags pa rnams bdag cag la bzod pa
283b6(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du de dang 'tsham pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags la/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sems can thams cad
283b7(mdo sde): kyi bla na ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rin po che lags te/ mchod pa'i 'os lags na/ de ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems
284a1(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis kyang 'byor pa'am/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de tsam tshad ma mchis pa'i mchod pa'i
284a2(mdo sde): 'os lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
284a3(mdo sde): stsal pa| klu'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' nan tan byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mchod pa nyon cig /bsam pa rnam par dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
284a4(mdo sde): mchod pa yin te/ bcos ma ma yin pa dang / g.yo med pa'i phyir ro/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
284a5(mdo sde): cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul
284a6(mdo sde): 'chos pa dang / kha gsag thams cad rnam par spangs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ni/ de
284a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad la mi slu ba'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par
284b1(mdo sde): blangs pa mi 'dor ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir ro/ /dben pa la dga' zhing be mo'i gtam yongs su spong ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
284b2(mdo sde): la mchod pa yin te/ sems yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir ro/ /ji skad thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
284b3(mdo sde): bzhin yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med par nye bar rtogs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
284b4(mdo sde): yin te| gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir ro/ /stong pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la nges par rtog pa dang / smon pa dang bral ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa
284b5(mdo sde): yin te| rnam par thar pa'i sgo mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rkyen 'di la nyid la 'jug cing mthar lta ba sel ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ rtag pa dang / chad
284b6(mdo sde): par lta ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir ro/ /ma byung ba dang / ma skyes par bzod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir ro/ klu'i bdag po/
284b7(mdo sde): de ltar na/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rtsom pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa ma yin gyi/ gang lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rtsom
285a1(mdo sde): pa med pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / 'khor
285a2(mdo sde): gsum yongs su bde ba dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang / dri ma gsum gyi dri ma sal ba dang / khams gsum la mi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'jug pa dang /
285a3(mdo sde): rig pa gsum gyi rig pa shes pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces
285a4(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / na bza' dang /
285a5(mdo sde): bshos dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa gang
285a6(mdo sde): lags pa de dag kyang ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po/ de ni/ bla na med pa'i mchod pa de nyid
285a7(mdo sde): yongs su sbyong ba yin gyi/ mchod pa de ni/ shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar thug pa ma yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ dge
285b1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slob pa de dag ni/ 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba la sems gnas kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /klu'i bdag po/ gzhan yang
285b2(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i bsod nams
285b3(mdo sde): kyi tshogs gsog pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyi ye shes kyi tshogs gsog pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po shin tu brtsams pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas
285b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang / chos zab mo rgya chen po la sems bskyed pas bzod pa skyes pa thob pa ste/ klu'i bdag po/ chos 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
285b5(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin no/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / grong rdal pa
285b6(mdo sde): dang / yul gyi mi rnams dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / blon po dang / nang 'khor dang / sgo dpon dang / 'khor dang / tshong dpon rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal
285b7(mdo sde): po rgya mtsho'i gnas su ba shos gsol nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs so/ /zhes thos nas der srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra g.yog
286a1(mdo sde): ' khor sum khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan
286a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces
286a3(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na chab kyi tshogs de na mchis pa de gang du mchi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
286a4(mdo sde): stsal pa| rgyal po chen po/ gang gi tshe dge slong me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su
286a5(mdo sde): gang bar mthong na/ de'i chu'i phung po de dag gang du song / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i sems de lta bur las su rung bar gyur pa lags
286a6(mdo sde): so| |bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis de nyan thos ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob pa'i sems las su rung ba las gyur par 'dod na/ de bzhin
286a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mkhas pa/ sems la dbang yod pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug /
286b1(mdo sde): chos la dbang yod pa ni/ de ltar mi 'dod dam/ rgyal po chen po/ gang gi tshe nga rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe chu de'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bdag nyid chu'i nang na
286b2(mdo sde): gnas so snyam du 'dzin to/ /skam sa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni/ rgya mtsho chen po skam par mthong ngo / /ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod
286b3(mdo sde): pa rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de bzhin du klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis khyab par gyur to/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i nang gi
286b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba med par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas
286b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / byang chub sems
286b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags te/ 'di ltar klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs te/ de ltar sems can
286b7(mdo sde): gyi don tshad ma mchis pa bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos yun ji srid ci gnas ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed lags/
287a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la ni/ mchod pa bgyis/ yun ji srid cig na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
287a2(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan ni/ ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ ci 'dra bar 'gyur lags/
287a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pas ces grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ yun ring
287a4(mdo sde): b a| tshad med pa'i snga rol de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa yid du 'ong zhing zhi ba zhes bya ba la shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan
287a5(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul
287a6(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od rnam par dag ba'i 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rgyal po
287a7(mdo sde): chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba yongs su dag pa de'i bkod pa byung ba de dag ni/ de'i tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas su zin kyang rgyas par bstan par sla ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen
287b1(mdo sde): po| de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po de la lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi
287b2(mdo sde): bar du mchod pa byas te dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pa de gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos so/ /skyes bu khyu mchog la ni mchod chen mang / /dpag med rgya chen
287b3(mdo sde): bsam yas byas zin gyi/ /'gro ba dag la snying brtse bskyed nas kyang / /rab mchog byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag sgrub byed gang / /de ni mchod mchog
287b4(mdo sde): dam pa khyad par 'phags/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs rnams bkur sti yin/ /de ni phyi ma'i bsod nams gzi byin yin/ /bam po bdun pa ste tha ma/ rgyal po chen po/ de nas 'khor los
287b5(mdo sde): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' des tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos te/ de'i mtshan mo 'das nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par
287b6(mdo sde): d ag pa'i 'od zer rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig
287b7(mdo sde): tu bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'khod do/ /thal mo sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
288a1(mdo sde): dag smras so/ /gzugs la brkam dang sgra la brten pa dang / /dri dang ro dang reg la gnas pa dang / /'dod la brkam dang bde ba dga' ba yis/ /byang chub phyogs 'di
288a2(mdo sde): rtogs par mi nus so/ /le lo can dang dma' la brtson pa dang / /ser sna can dang tshul khrims ma bsngams dang / /sdang ba'i sems dang blo ni 'khrul pa yis/ /byang chub mchog 'di rtogs
288a3(mdo sde): par mi nus so/ /rang gi bde ba thams cad spangs pa dang / /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag tu chos 'dod gang / /de ni 'jig rten de
288a4(mdo sde): 'dra'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub la ni bdag zhugs pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang lha rnams dbang btsugs te/ /ci nas bdag gi tshig log par mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar sman
288a5(mdo sde): slad spyod pa spyad par bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bdag gis rmi lam thos/ /thos nas bdag ni byang chub mchog la zhugs/ /de yi slad du sangs rgyas mi yi mchog /ye shes ldan pa de
288a6(mdo sde): 'dra bdag gis bgyi/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/ yid gnyis
288a7(mdo sde): sam| the tshom za na/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di nyid de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar
288b1(mdo sde): gyur to| |de'ang de'i dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod 'di skad du/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
288b2(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes zer ba de nyon cig / rgyal po chen po/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di ni/ bskal pa grangs med pa nyis brgyan bskal pa dpal gyi me tog ces bya
288b3(mdo sde): ba la 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grags pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
288b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dri ma med cing yongs
288b5(mdo sde): su dag la yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grags pa de ni/ rin po che sa yas spras par
288b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las grub pa/ rin po che sna tshogs du mas bris shing mig mang ris su rnam par phye la lag mthil bzhin du mnyam ste/ ka tsa lin+di ka'i gos bzhin du 'jam zhing
288b7(mdo sde): reg na bde la yangs shing tha gru che ste/ gling bye ba phrag 'bum dang ldan la/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / yid du 'ong ba ste/ lha dang mi mang po dag gis gang la/ gzhan 'phrul
289a1(mdo sde): dbang byed pa'i lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi de dag gi'ang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra
289a2(mdo sde): grags pa zhes bya ba de na rin po che thams cad las grub pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shing ta la de dag gi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad las
289a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sgra khrag khrig phrag 'bum mang po dag 'byung ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de na sgra ji snyed 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ lha'i sgra'am/ mi'i sgra'am/ mi ma yin pa'i sgra'am/ sprul pa'i
289a4(mdo sde): sgra'am| bya'i sgra'am/ rlung gi sgra'ang rlung ste/ sgra de dag thams cad chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / nye bar zhi ba
289a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang dben pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang ldan pa dang / thabs la
289a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
289a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sgra dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi gang dag skye ba de dag
289b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang chos kyi dga' ba'i zas kho na dang ldan par 'gyur zhing mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom med pa
289b2(mdo sde): sha stag go / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po de'ang gang gi tshe chos ston par
289b3(mdo sde): ba zhod pa de'i tshe de nyid kyi sku las 'od 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las kyang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
289b4(mdo sde): stong gsung pa'i chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de na lha dang mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de'ang mthong la chos bstan pa de'ang thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu
289b5(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag la yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po ga la ba
289b6(mdo sde): der dong ste lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa byas te/ rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis nam mkha'i dkyil na rin po che'i bkod pa
289b7(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa'i pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil nyid na seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs te lha dang / mi de dag la
290a1(mdo sde): chos ston to/ /de chos ston pa na phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grang med pa brgya stong dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi
290a2(mdo sde): khams de na sems can su'ang chos la zhe 'gras pa med do/ /de na bdud sdig can dag dang / gzhan mu stegs can dag gi sgrar gdags pa'ang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i
290a3(mdo sde): tshad ni| bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro/ /de'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bgrang ba las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bkod pa ni/ bsam
290a4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab po/ /chos bstan pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhabs 'bring 'khor byang chub sems dpa' yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho lung bstan pa'i le'u ste
290a5(mdo sde): brgyad pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ rgyu'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / rnam
290a6(mdo sde): par bsgrubs na 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid lags te/ de dag ni/ ji lta ji lta 'dod pa de lta de ltar rnam par 'grub pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi spyod pa ni/ mtha' yas
290a7(mdo sde): pa lags so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ji srid du rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma bzung ba de srid du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad
290b1(mdo sde): par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ni/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
290b2(mdo sde): stsal pa| rgyal po chen po/ khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni/ yid la byed pa las 'byung ste/ chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir de dag ni/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par
290b3(mdo sde): 'grub bo/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so/ /klu'i bdag po/ gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan
290b4(mdo sde): bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rgyal
290b5(mdo sde): po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po chen po/ chos gang yang lung bstan du med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /rgyal pos smras
290b6(mdo sde): pa| klu'i bdag po/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyang lung bstan du med dam/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ sems can du gdags pa ni/ phung po dang / khams
290b7(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams su zad la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni/ lung bstan du med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ ming dang gzugs la sems can du gdags par zad la/ ming
291a1(mdo sde): dang gzugs la lung bstan du med do/ /rgyu dang / lta ba dang / 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa las sems can du gdags par zad na/ rgyu dang / lta ba dang / 'du
291a2(mdo sde): shes dang / yid la byed pa de la'ang lung bstan du med do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
291a3(mdo sde): ba de dag kyang lung bstan du med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ /chos thams cad ni/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid ni/ lung bstan du med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ chos thams
291a4(mdo sde): cad ni| mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed
291a5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ lung bstan du med pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'di ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ming med pa dang /
291a6(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i chos thams cad ming dang / mtshan mas ston par mdzad la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ming dang / mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par
291a7(mdo sde): shes pa can yang ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ lung bstan pa 'di ni/ 'jig rten brda sprad par zad de/ 'di la gang lung bstan par bya ba'i chos gang yang nang ngam/ phyi rol na mi
291b1(mdo sde): dmigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ klu'i bdag po/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung bstan pa med dam/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ bzod pa de'ang skad cig pa/
291b2(mdo sde): zad pa'i mtshan nyid/ mi zad pa'i mtha' can/ yang dag pa'i mthar nges pa/ mnyam pa'i mtha' can/ gnyis su med pa'i mthar nges pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ni/ yang dag
291b3(mdo sde): pa'i mtha'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni/ gtan du mi 'byung ba'i mtha'o/ /mtha' can gang yin pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams so/ /de'i mtha' can ni/
291b4(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i mtha'o/ /gang mtha' de'i sgor zhugs pa ni/ gang du'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /gang mngon par zhen pa de ni/ tha snyad kyis brda la chags pa med do/ /ma chags
291b5(mdo sde): na| grol bar 'gyur ro/ /grol na/ phyin chad mi rgyu/ rab tu mi rgyu'o/ /mi rgyu/ rab tu mi rgyu na/ gang du'ang nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /blo ma nyams na/ thams cad las nges par 'byung
291b6(mdo sde): bar mthong ste/ ji ltar rnam par mi mthong ba de ni/ de ltar yang mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe rnam par mi mthong ba de'i tshe gnyis su mi 'byed do/ /gnyis su med pa la gnas na/ mnyam pa nyid
291b7(mdo sde): la 'jug go / mnyam pa nyid la zhugs na/ mtho bar yang mi 'gyur/ dma' bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /mtho ba'ang med/ dma' ba'ang med na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyis rab tu phye ba'i
292a1(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de la bzod pa gang yin pa dang / lung bstan pa gang yin pa dang / gang lung bstan par bya ba dang / lus lung bstan pa dang / ci'i phyir
292a2(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'i chos de dag thams cad chos mnyam pa dang / chos med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su nges pa dang / brda med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang
292a3(mdo sde): bral ba dang / gnyis su med pa'i mtha' can de dag gi don yongs su gzhal nas chos gang yang bgrang bar mi byed do/ /dper na/ nam mkha' ni/ bgrang du med cing pa grang ba
292a4(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' nyis
292a5(mdo sde): brgya ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /dge slong nyis brgya ni/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
292a6(mdo sde): po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos spobs pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
292a7(mdo sde): po chen po/ 'di'i spobs pa ni/ ngo mtshar yang mi che la dka' ba'ang ma yin gyi/ las dang po pa gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag/ mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur
292b1(mdo sde): ba 'di ni/ de dag gi ches ngo mtshar che ba dang / cher dka' ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni/ de ltar mos par dka' ba ste/ de
292b2(mdo sde): la ni| lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'jug par mi 'gyur/ 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ mos par mi 'gyur/ yid ches par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir te/ rgyal po chen po/ rnam grangs 'dis
292b3(mdo sde): kyang gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mi skrag/ mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin par de ltar rig
292b4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ gzhan yang 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu gang gis nam mkha' gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa 'di gzugs can du ston par byed na/ ci
292b5(mdo sde): de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mchog tu dka' ba lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mchog tu dka' ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos
292b6(mdo sde): 'di lta bur zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa/ bdag med pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gso ba med pa/ gang zag med pa/ rgyu ba med pa 'di la mos
292b7(mdo sde): la mos nas kyang de kho na bzhin du sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin te/ de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mthun pa'i dge ba dang / grogs dang /
293a1(mdo sde): mdza' bshes yin no/ /de dag gis ni/ sems can rnams kyi phyin ci log spang pa'i phyir chos bstan nus so/ /de dag gis ni/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam
293a2(mdo sde): pa la 'dug nas bdug kyi dpung bye ba phrag brgya byams pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus kyis gzhom par nus so/ /de dag gis ni/ chos thams cad la dbang
293a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / sems dpa' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
293a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so/ /de dag gis ni/ sems can thams cad brda sprad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /
293a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar nus so/ /de dag gis ni/ phas kyi rgol ba
293a6(mdo sde): rnams tshar gcad pa dang / mu stegs can thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / dgra thams cad tshar gcad I phyir chos kyi dung 'bud nus so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho
293a7(mdo sde): bsam pa grub cing brang pa dang / yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te rang gis lung bstan pa thos nas bar snang ba mngon par 'phags te bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di
