293b1(mdo sde): dag gsol to/ /bdud rnams sde bcas dpung bcas nges bcom zhing / /lta ba ngan pa'i tshogs kun bshig nas ni/ /thub pa chen pos chos kyi char phab ste/ /'jig rten thams cad bdud rtsis
293b2(mdo sde): tshim par mdzad/ /khyod ni chos rgyal mi 'jigs stsal pa lags/ /'dam las rgal te 'jigs med 'gram na bzhugs/ /'jig rten mig ste lam mchog ston pa po/ /skye bo skyabs ma
293b3(mdo sde): mchis pa'i mgon po lags/ /sman pa'i rgyal khyod zug rdu 'byin pa yi/ /sman pa rga shi med pa'i sman stsol ba/ /ci nas phyin chad nang rnams mi 'byung bar/ /nad dang rga bas gzir rnams
293b4(mdo sde): gso mdzad pa/ /khyod ni ston skyabs bla ma gcig pu lags/ /gtan du bde ba sbyin pa khyod nyag gcig /khyod ni ru skya 'dzin pa don dam mkhyen pa lags/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni zlog
293b5(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ /lha yi lha ste 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso/ /'jig rten kun gyi sgron mar gyur pa lags/ /khyod dang mjal na 'jig rten chu chen rgal/ /mi rnams kyi ni mi mchog khyod nyag gcig /ye shes
293b6(mdo sde): gzugs dang pha rol gnon pa yis/ /thub dbang khyod 'dra su yang ma mchis te/ /khyod ni lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /ston pa po ste thar pa'i lam mtshon lags/ /khyod ni thams cad
293b7(mdo sde): zil mnan kun mkhyen mchog / 'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni khyod ma gos/ /kun mkhyen sred bral rnam grol dpa' ba dang / /ye shes mchog brnyes khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ji ltar bar
294a1(mdo sde): snang nam mkha' rnam par dag / gzugs med gzung du ma mchis 'dus ma bgyis/ /de bzhin chos rnams dri med rnam par dag /'jig rten rnam par 'dren
294a2(mdo sde): pas rab tu bstan/ /yod dang med par lta ba spangs nas kyang / /rnam dag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /rkyen dang bcas shing rgyu dang bcas pa ste/ /sems can ma
294a3(mdo sde): mchis gang zag srog ma mchis/ /gzod nas rnam dag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba ste/ /shin tu dag pa nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /gnas pa ma mchis glog dang 'dra
294a4(mdo sde): ba'i tshul/ /sngon gyi mtha' stong phyi ma'i mtha' yang stong / /skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa'i ngo bo stong / /'dir ni 'di dag dngos med dngos med min/ /'di dag thams cad rang bzhin ma
294a5(mdo sde): mchis stong / /chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo gang lags te/ /sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo lags/ /sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang / /sangs rgyas chos kyi rang
294a6(mdo sde): bzhin ngo bo de/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang / /de ni chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/ /chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo gang lags pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi ngo bo rang bzhin te/ /sangs
294a7(mdo sde): rgyas zhing gi rang bzhin ngo bo gang / /sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo de/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo gang / /de ni chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/ /chos rnams kun la rnam
294b1(mdo sde): par dag pa 'di/ /gang tshe byang chub sems dpas de ltar mthong / /de nas rgyal rnams ye shes dam pa yis/ /byang chub mchog tu de ni lung ston mdzad/ /chos rnams brda dang ming dang tha snyad
294b2(mdo sde): tsam| |mnyam pa lags te mi bden ming du btags/ /de dag sngon chad sus kyang ma thob ste/ /de dag gis ni ming rnams kun tu brjod/ /ming ma mchis par ming ni rnam par btags/ /
294b3(mdo sde): chos rnams stong ste rang bzhin rnam par dag /'jig rten 'du shes mkhas par rig nas ni/ /tha snyad tsam la kun tu spyad par bgyi/ /chos kun sgyu ma bzhin du rig nas kyang / /mi bden
294b4(mdo sde): snying po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra/ /rnam smin rgyu dang nying mtshams sbyor ba tsam/ /de la bden pa'i 'du shes yong mi bgyi/ /chos kun slu bar mi bgyid 'jigs pa lags/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ste
294b5(mdo sde): mi bden pa/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo gzugs brnyan 'dra ba lags/ /rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rmongs par bgyid/ /byis pas bdag dang bdag gir 'dir brtags nas/ /blun po sred pas gzir
294b6(mdo sde): ba 'dir rmongs te/ /'khor ba'i 'khor los yongs su 'khor ba na/ /sdug bsngal gyis non zhi ba thob mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i 'jug pa 'di ni yang dag min/ /gang gi 'jug pa de ni ma mchis
294b7(mdo sde): te| |'tsho ba'i 'jig rten lta ba gti mug ldongs/ /rgyun du yang dang yang du sdug bsngal rnyed/ /lha rnams sdug bsngal 'chi 'pho'i chos gcig pa/ /mi rnams kyi ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags//
295a1(mdo sde): dmyal ba dag gi sdug bsngal gnod pa rnams/ /gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi lags/ /yi dwags sdug bsngal 'di na bkres dang skom/ /
295a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad sdug bsngal rnams su nus/ /skyabs med gyur dang rten med gyur pa yi/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal thams cad gzigs nas ni/ /drang srong chen po thugs
295a3(mdo sde): brtse thugs rje can/ /sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol phyir 'byung bar mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' bskal mang bye bar yang / /brtul zhugs brtan zhing pha rol phyin la
295a4(mdo sde): brtson| |srid ma mchis pa de 'dra mkhyen nas ni/ /'dam las rgal te sems can rnams kyang 'dul/ /gang tshe chos rnams gsog dang gsob tu gzigs/ /nam mkha'
295a5(mdo sde): chang stong 'dra zhing snying po med/ /de dag bdag gi ngo bo ma mchis pas/ /bdag med dngos med dngos po med pa lags/ /mtha' rnams kun tu lta ba kun spangs na/ /byang chub
295a6(mdo sde): rdul med rnam dag thob par 'gyur/ /skye dang rga dang gnod par bgyi ba gang / /'chi dang gnas pa gang lags su yang med/ /gang 'dir skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi/ /shed las skyes
295a7(mdo sde): dang shed du de ma mchis/ /'di na bdag dang bdag gi ma mchis te/ /gang zag shed skyes shed bu yod ma mchis/ /'di brdzun bdag po ma mchis dbang ma mchis/ /'tsho ba'i
295b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten sgyu ma lta bur 'jug / byed pa ma mchis tshor ba po ma mchis/ /'on kyang las ma chis 'bras bu don ma mchis/ /'gro ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis rang bzhin 'byung / /phan tshun
295b2(mdo sde): du ni rgyu la brten par 'dus/ /dge dang mi dge'i las gang bgyid pa dang / /gang zhig bsgoms dang gang zhig mang du bgyis/ /yul na ma mchis phyogs na ma mchis te/ /ngo bo nyid
295b3(mdo sde): stong 'on kyang rnam par smin/ /nang dang slad rol bar na mi gnas te/ /chos rnams gang du'ang 'phungs par yong ma mchis/ /de dag gang la'ang rten pa ma mchis la/ /rnam par
295b4(mdo sde): smin pa slu bar yong mi bgyid/ /skyes pa mi mnga' 'gags pa mnga' ma lags/ /mkhas pa rnams ni go bar bgyi slad du/ /nyan pa la ni smra bas tshig kyang bstan/ /lta ba rnam
295b5(mdo sde): par spyad pa'i slad du bstan/ /gang gi 'du shes 'du shes can ma mchis/ /mya ngan 'das mchis su yang zhi ma mchis/ /skye ba ma mchis mtha' gang mtha' de lags/ /bdag
295b6(mdo sde): gi bdag med mtha' ni nam mkha'i mtha'/ /kun gyi mtha' ni mtha' mnyam thob pa des/ /sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab dam pa thob/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang
295b7(mdo sde): ni| |skye ba'i mtha' dang skye ba ma mchis mtha'/ /mtha' kun de ltar mnyam par mthong ba dang / /chags med mtha' yi sgo shes ldan pa dang / /dus gsum mtha' rnams la ni ma
296a1(mdo sde): chags des/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi rigs mchog thob par 'gyur/ /'gro ba bcings las rnam par grol mdzad nas/ /zhi mchog mya ngan 'das pa brnyes
296a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ /'gro kun rmi lam lta bur des gzigs nas/ /'dir ni ming dang gzugs la sems ma chags/ /chos kun las ni rnam par dag pa'i mig /zhi ba dang ni mi
296a3(mdo sde): g.yo mi 'gul thob/ /chos rnams thams cad sgra med skad med pa/ /gzung du med cing dngos med rnam par dag/ de bzhin rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyi gdung / /zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid de
296a4(mdo sde): smon pa spangs/ /skyon med rims nad med cing mya ngan bral/ /spros kun nye bar zhi zhing bsam mi khyab/ /rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi ni chos 'di dag /gzung bral rang bzhin sgra dang
296a5(mdo sde): skad ma mchis/ /'gro la sman slad skyes bu dam pa yis/ /de yang yi ge rnams kyis gleng zhing bstan/ /gang gis 'jig rten bla mar rang 'byung mthong / /mthong nas kyang ni
296a6(mdo sde): yid la dad bgyid dang / /khyad par 'gro ba'i chos kyang nyan pa yi/ /lha dang mi rnams rnyed pa legs par rnyed/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su chos 'di ni/ /'jig rten
296a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'dren pas rab tu bstan/ /gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'gyur ba rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni mnyam pa'i chos su 'gyur/ /sgra rnams thams cad brag ca tsam du bas/ /
296b1(mdo sde): de ni brjod na rna bar grag par 'gyur/ /de ni tshul bzhin lam gyi rgyud 'gyur te/ /chos so 'tshal gyi slad du btags pa tsam/ /chos kun sgyu ma 'dra zhing gsog lags te/ /de dag sems can
296b2(mdo sde): slad du rnam par phye/ /de dag rang bzhin ngo bo gang yin pa/ /de ni nam yang rnam par dbyer mi rung / /'jig rten na ni sangs rgyas chos rgyal mchog /chos kyi dbang phyug kun rig kun mkhyen
296b3(mdo sde): pa| |ston pa de la slob na de bzhin du/ /'phags pa kun gyis de nyid don kyang rtogs/ /byung ba gang lags pa dang da ltar dang / /ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba gang lags pa/ /thams cad la
296b4(mdo sde): yang thub pa skyes mchog gi / ye shes 'jug ste thogs pa yong mi mnga'/ /skyes bu dam pa de yis de ring bdag /dogs ma mchis par byang chub mchog lung bstan/ /bdag ni
296b5(mdo sde): 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bdag la som nyi ma mchis dogs ma mchis/ /chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //
296b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub ci nas yun ring du gnas par
296b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di zungs shig / khyod kyi nang nas su dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung bar spro/ /de nas der byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang / lha'i bu khri stan las langs te/ /
297a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
297a2(mdo sde): gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyas par yang bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed kyis chos sgrub pa ji lta bus de
297a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par byed/ de nas der byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
297a4(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos gzung bar 'tshal na/ ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
297a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar sgrub na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par lta bas gsol pa/

297a7(mdo sde): sam| bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar sgrub na/ nga'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' lta ba med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
297b1(mdo sde): bdag gis so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma mthong / slob pa'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

297b3(mdo sde): cad la khas 'che ba med par shin tu gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rang bzhin ci'ang ma 'tshal cing mi 'dzin na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa
297b4(mdo sde): lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mig gis mi lta/ sems kyis

298a1(mdo sde): dang mtshan ma'ang mi nyan lags na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems
298a2(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas gang la 'dzin pa'i chos rnams dang / chos ma lags pa

298a4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag chos thams cad la mi dmigs mi g.yo mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
298a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul la bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mchis la/

298a7(mdo sde): rdo rje'i stabs kyis 'gro bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos kyi dbyings kyang 'byed par mi bgyid/ sems can gyi khams la ma gtogs par yang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par
298b1(mdo sde): mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang
298b2(mdo sde): chos ci'ang mi dmigs la/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang chos kyi sgra 'byung na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /

298b4(mdo sde): chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang chos thams cad
298b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyas yang dag par 'du ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid ro gcig par 'tshal na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/

298b7(mdo sde): sems dan/ ga yid du 'dogs par yang mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /lha'i bu dri ma med pas gsol pa/ bcom
299a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ gang chos thams cad dri ma ma mchis pa dang / snyigs ma ma mchis pa dang / 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bar rig nas rgyu las rnam par grol bar
299a2(mdo sde): mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /lha'i bu sems can sgrol gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems
299a3(mdo sde): can rnams kyang sgrol bar bgyid pa/ bdag ma mchis pa'ang 'tshal/ bsgral nas kyang 'dzud par bgyid la/ tshu rol dang pha rol gyi 'gram na'ang mi gnas na/ ci de dam pa'i chos

299a5(mdo sde): gang yang skye bar yang mi bgyid/ 'gag par yang mi bgyid na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /lha'i bu rgyal po bzang
299a6(mdo sde): pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems can thams cad sems can mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad chos mnyam pa dang / zhing thams cad zhing mnyam pa dang / sangs
299a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas mnyam par rjes su song na/ ci de dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /lha'i bu legs par sems
299b1(mdo sde): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag chos ci'ang mi sems shing spros par mi bgyid de/ mtshan mar mi bgyid na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
299b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu| de ni/ de bzhin no/ /sring mo ut+pa las gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lags par 'tshal la/ 'on kyang bdag mngon par
299b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ sring mo/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /bu mo/ mu tig phrang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
299b4(mdo sde): gis bud med kyi chos rnams kyang mi dmigs/ skyes pa'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs to/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mtshan nyid gang lags pa de/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'i chos rnams
299b5(mdo sde): kyi mtshan nyid lags la/ chos de dag kyang chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'di ltar bdag ni/ skyed par yang mi bgyid/ khas len par yang mi bgyid
299b6(mdo sde): na| ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ bu mo/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /bu mo rin chen gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis byang chub dang / byang chub
299b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang ma mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi go cha'ang bdag gis bgos/ de dag kyang gtan du bdag gis ma mthong na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags
300a1(mdo sde): sam/ bka' stsal pa/ bu mo/ de ni/ de bzhin no/ /bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag chos thams cad la'ang chos kyi
300a2(mdo sde): 'du shes mi skyed la/ sems can thams cad la'ang sems can gyi 'du shes mi skyed/ chos thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rnam par mi rtog ste/ sangs rgyas
300a3(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams kyi khongs su'ang chos thams cad 'jus par yang dag par mthong la/ de dag gi khongs su'ang ma zhen par yang dag par mthong na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de
300a4(mdo sde): ltar brtson na/ ci dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo/ khyod de ltar sgrub na/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no/ /de nas
300a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa dang ldan
300a6(mdo sde): pa'i bu mo rnams kyis 'dir rnam pa dang / sgra dang / brda sna tshogs kyi chos nyid de kho na gleng ste/ chos gang dang yang 'gal bar mi bgyid la/ chos thams cad kyang byang chub dang
300a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du ston pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /gzhan yang chos de ni/ de bzhin te/ bu mo 'di dag ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
300b1(mdo sde): chos rnam par nges pa ston pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen pa kur byas pa/ bzod pa thob pa sha stag go /kau shi ka /gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / gzhan dag
300b2(mdo sde): la'ang rgyas par bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung ba de dag la bstan pa'i phyir khyod la
300b3(mdo sde): gtad do/ /de ltar byas na/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i chog byas par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis
300b4(mdo sde): bzung lags so/ /'di ni/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kho nas rgyas par bgyi'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po de dag la'ang bstab par 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i
300b5(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bka' drin bsam pa'i rdo mi thogs te/ 'di ltar bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyis phan
300b6(mdo sde): gdags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang ci nas bdud dang / phyir rgol pa nges par bcom nas 'di dzam+bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin
300b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad
301a1(mdo sde): rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i byin rlabs ngas bstan par bya ste/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi
301a2(mdo sde): de dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyang shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par
301a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ a b+ha ye/ b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya bi sho d+ha ne/ a b+ha ya nga de/ ni ru b+ha dra be/ A na ku le/ a ku la saM sho d+ha ne/ a gra he/ a bi bA de/ a galbe/ a galbe/
301a4(mdo sde): a ts+yu t+te/ shu b+ha te dze/ te dzo ba ti/ ma hA te dze/ u bA sha me/ me t+r+yang+ga te/ sho Sha ya ma ne/ sa t+ya daR+sha ne/ i ba ru d+he sa hi ta ar+the/ ar+tha sid+d+he/ a mr-i ta ba te/ sA ga re/ sA ga ra ba
301a5(mdo sde): ti| a b+hi te/ badzra sin+d+ha/ ak+Sha ye/ ak+Sha ta pra b+he/ dza ti bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he/ shud+d+he/ a ba b+hA sa ba ti/ sa ma pra yo ge /sa ma tsi te/ a nut+ta re/ bud+d+hA a d+hiSh+Tha ne/ shI la bi sho d+ha ne/
301a6(mdo sde): an+ti kra ma Ne/ a si ha R+ye/ ni gr-i hI taM ma ra ba la ma/ ba ra dza yo d+hiSh+Ti ga tA naM/ dzo lA naM d+ha molkA nAM/ saM gr-i hi tA na/ d+harma tA nAM/ ud+g+ha TI nI/ d+harma ni d+ha nAM/ kau shi ka /rig sngags dang /
301a7(mdo sde): gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni/ 'di dag yin te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs so/ /rig sngags
301b1(mdo sde): dang / gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis ni/ rtsod pa'i bdag po bdud thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya bas 'di skad ces
301b2(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ rgyas pa bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ byas pa gzo ba dang /
301b3(mdo sde): byas pa tshor ba rjes su srung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar bgyi/ yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu bsod nams 'phags kyis gsol
301b4(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bzung na/ bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i
301b5(mdo sde): bu de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis phyogs bcu yi/ /zhing rnams ji snyed ngas mthong ba/ /de kun rin chen gang byas nas/ /mi gang sbyin pa sbyin byed la/ /gang
301b6(mdo sde): zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i chos/ /snying nas yongs su 'dzin byed na/ /de bas mi de'i bsod nams ni/ /shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa'i bar du bzhugs nas ni/ /dpe rnams
301b7(mdo sde): bstan pas bshad na yang / /dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa yi/ /bsod nams zad par yong mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na lha khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug gis bla na med pa yang
302a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' drug khri ni/ mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa skyes so/ /stong gsum gyi stong
302a2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang / mtshan ma chen po bco brgyad du rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub
302a3(mdo sde): phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur

302b1(mdo sde): kyi phyag rgyas legs par btab bo/ /zhes byung ngo / /klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mu tig gi char chen po phab po/ /de
302b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung la gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig /

303a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
