374a3(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa ste/ thabs kyis kyang zhugs pas lta bar ltung ba'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed do/ /mtshan ma med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la
374a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa ste/ thabs kyis kyang zhugs pas rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed do/ /smon pa med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
374a5(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa ste/ thabs kyis kyang zhugs pas smon lam la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed do/ /klu'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa'i chos
374a6(mdo sde): la'ang 'jug la sems can thams cad kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa la'ang 'jug la byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed pa dang / 'dus ma byas
374a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos la'ang 'jug la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang gsog pa dang / shin tu zhi zhing nye bar yang zhi la ma rig pa shin tu ma zhi zhing nye
374b1(mdo sde): par zhi ba'ang ma zhi ba dang / bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms la sngon gyi dam bcas pa'ang mi 'dor ba dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral la thams cad
374b2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i sems la'ang mnyam par bzhag pa dang / nga rgyal thams cad kyang yang dag par 'joms la sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rtogs pa la'ang mkhas pa dang /
374b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i yon tan yang brjod la 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos la gnas par yang brtson pa dang / spros pa'ang med la spros pa la'ang 'jug pa dang / nye bar yang zhi la nye bar
374b4(mdo sde): ma zhi ba'ang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / mi g.yo zhing rnam par mi g.yo ba'ang rgyun mi gcod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par sgrub par nye bar gnas pa ni/ klu'i bdag po/
374b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ 'jig rten las ldog pa'ang ma yin pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ de ltar gang shes rab dang / thabs dang ldan pa
374b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyan thos kyi skyon med pa la 'jug pa ni/ log
374b7(mdo sde): par mi ltung ba'i chos te/ rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa ni/ log par mi ltung ba'i chos te/ phyir mi
375a1(mdo sde): ldog pa zhes bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ nyan thos kyi skyon med pa la 'jug pa ni/ mi 'da' ste/ gdon mi za bar 'bras bu thob par byed pa'o/ /byang chub
375a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa ni/ 'da' ba ste/ nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob par mi byed kyi/ byang chub kyi snying po'i 'bras bu dang nye bar byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir nyan thos
375a3(mdo sde): kyi skyon med pa ni/ tshad du bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ni/ tshad du bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyis shig g.yang sa chen por
375a4(mdo sde): ltung ba las de la skyes bu gcig ni/ 'dri 'dra ba'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba dang / thabs dang / sngon gyi sbyor ba dang / rigs pa dang ldan par gyur pa
375a5(mdo sde): pa zhig pas ltung yang brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs kyis g.yang sa chen po de nas drangs nas slar g.yang sa chen po de'i khar phyin te gnas so/ /gcig shos ni/ stobs
375a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa chung la thabs la mi mkhas pas ltung ba de bzhin du/ klu'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa'ang shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
375a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa/ smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par rnam par lta zhing nye bar rtog la sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen pos yang
375b1(mdo sde): dag par btang ba'i thabs la mkhas pas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la gnas so/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa can ni/ chos la so sor brtags nas 'bras bu mngon du byed
375b2(mdo sde): do/ klu'i bdag po/ g.yang sa chen po zhes bya ba de ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu zhes bya ba de ni/ byang chub
375b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /g.yang du lhung nas slar ldog ma nus pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /klu'i bdag po/ gang dag skyon med pa
375b4(mdo sde): 'di thos pa de ni/ nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
375b5(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring du gnas par bgyi
375b6(mdo sde): ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
375b7(mdo sde): kyis sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon par yang dag par khong du chud par bgyis te rab tu bshad
376a1(mdo sde): par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag rnam par dag pa'i las kyi chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di mi nyan pa de dag ni/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags
376a2(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'byung ba'i lam thams cad du nges par 'byung lags pa'i
376a3(mdo sde): slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis gang sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang
376a4(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bya ba de la sems kyi rang bzhin de gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i rang bzhin de sems kyi rang
376a5(mdo sde): bzhin no/ /smras pa/ rab 'byor gyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ smras pa/ gang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin no/ /smras pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
376a6(mdo sde): gti mug gi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ rtog pa med par 'dod
376a7(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye bar 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ de ni/ ma yin no/ /smras pa/ gang mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de mi skye ba'o/ /gang mi skye ba de rang bzhin
376b1(mdo sde): 'di ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rang bzhin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba de gang yin zhes smras pa la 'od gsal
376b2(mdo sde): de ni| sems kyi rang bzhin no/ /gang sems kyi 'od gsal ba de la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug med do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nyon mongs pa gang dag skye ba de
376b3(mdo sde): dag skye ba na gang las skye/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ phyin ci log las nyon mongs pa rnams skye mod kyi/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ nam yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin no/ /
376b4(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor/ gal te sems kyi rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa can yin du zin na ni/ gang yang shin tu rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir sems kyi rang
376b5(mdo sde): bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa de'i phyir nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pas rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ nyon mongs
376b6(mdo sde): pa rnams yongs su shes pa yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ rkyen yod par gyur na skye'i/ rkyen med na mi skye bar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su
376b7(mdo sde): shes pa'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu brtson pa yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
377a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba thams cad dang mi ldan par gnas pa de'i tshe tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
377a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la rnam par grol ba'i chos ston kyang rnam par gro lba der mi ltung ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la sbyor
377a3(mdo sde): ba'o| |btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi nyon mongs pa dben pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dben
377a4(mdo sde): par khong du chud pa de'ang de'i tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba la sbyor ba ma yin pa dang / sbyor ba ma yin pa la sbyor bar mthong ba
377a5(mdo sde): de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang
377a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba la sbyor ba ma yin pa dang / sbyor ba ma yin pa la sbyor bar mthong ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings gnyis su med pa'i
377a7(mdo sde): tshul gyis gang mig dang / gzugs nas yid dang / chos kyi bar de dag ni/ sbyor ba ma yin par blta'o/ /sbyor ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni/ khams gsum du nyid mtshams
377b1(mdo sde): mi sbyor ba ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyi nyid mtshams sbyor ba de ni/ sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ltar rab tu brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/
377b2(mdo sde): tshul bzhin la rab tu brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu de la legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis ji ltar sangs
377b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la sbyor ba 'di de ltar bstan pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag theg pa chen po 'di la tshul bzhin
377b4(mdo sde): de lta bu la rab tu brtson pa de dag ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges pa yin par blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul bas 'di skad ces
377b5(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing ma mchis pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs
377b6(mdo sde): su mchis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang /
377b7(mdo sde): gang zag med par shes nas gzugs sum min/ mtshan du ma yin/ chos su ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de lta bu ni/ zang zing med pa'i
378a1(mdo sde): sems kyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings so/ /chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de ni/ chos
378a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba de lta bu ni/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos la skyabs
378a3(mdo sde): su song ba yin no/ /gang chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas par rab tu sgom pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dus ma byas pa ston pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas
378a4(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa 'di lta bu ni/ zang zhing med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe klu'i rgyal po'i bu rnam par 'phrul bas rjes
378a5(mdo sde): su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te dngos po thams cad kyis
378a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas rang gi gnas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
378a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag smon lam 'debs pa ni/ 'di lags te/ gang bdag gi gnas 'di nas klung chen po bzhi rgya mtsho chen po bzhir 'bab pa'i rgya mtsho chen po de dag
378b1(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das/ klung chen po 'di dag la 'tshal ba'i sems can rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi po dang / rkang mang dang / ri dgas dang / bya gang lags pa de dag rgyu nges
378b2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyur cig / gang dag byang chub tu smon pa de dag kyang rgyu des rnam par grol bar gyur cig /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
378b3(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma'i 'od zer
378b4(mdo sde): byung nas mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od kyis khyab par byas te slar log nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
378b5(mdo sde): bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs mnga' mthong na dga'/ /skyes mchog bcom ldan skyes bu khyu mchog pa/ /'jig rten
378b6(mdo sde): 'das la 'jig rten sgron ma yi/ /'od gzi bzhad pa'i don 'di bdag la gsungs/ /bsod nams brgya mnga' bsod nams lhag pa po| |ye shes kyis 'phags ye shes snang mdzad
378b7(mdo sde): pa| |chos dbang mi mtshungs chos kyi dka' mchid can/ /bcom ldan ci yi don du bzhad pa ston/ /dben pa gzigs shing rtag tu bden la dgyes/ /dbang po zhi ba zhi gnas pha
379a1(mdo sde): rol phyin/ /zhi la rab zhi zhi gnas dgyes pa po/ /gzhan don yon tan mthar phyin bdag la gsungs/ /'jam pa'i gsung can tshangs pa'i dbyangs
379a2(mdo sde): 'byin pa/ /bya mchog mang po sgra dang sil snyan sgra/ /sgra dbyangs yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbyangs/ /thub pa bzhad par sbyor ba bdag la gsungs/ /thub pa shes rab
379a3(mdo sde): 'byung gnas shes rab grol/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag 'khrul pa'i thugs mi mnga'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa sems can spyod la mkhas/ /mtshungs med bzhed pa'i don ni
379a4(mdo sde): legs par gsung / /ye shes mi phyed dbang gi mthar phyin pa/ /rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas pa yi stobs ston cing / /stobs bcu mnga' ba dbang gi pha rol gshegs/ /bde bar
379a5(mdo sde): gshegs khyod ci slad 'dir 'dzum ston/ /sku 'od dpal gyis snang ba mdzad pa po/ /khyod kyi 'od kyis gzhan 'od gsal mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar rgyal ba'i 'od ni mnga' ba ltar/ /
379a6(mdo sde): nyi zla zhugs dang nor bu'i ma lags so/ /bsod nams chen po the tshom mi mnga' ba/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gsal mdzad/ /bcom ldan ci slad bzhad pa
379a7(mdo sde): ston pa de/ /mi mtshungs ye shes mnga' bas bdag lung ston/ /da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
379b1(mdo sde): to| |kun dga' bo/ /klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di 'dra ba'i bkod pa 'di ngag gis mchod pa byed pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags
379b2(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'dis byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gan du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /gang gi
379b3(mdo sde): t she de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur
379b4(mdo sde): ro| |zhes lung bstan pa de'i tshe de'i dus na klu'i rgyal po 'di tshong dpon gyi bu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ des nga lung bstan pa thos nas smon lam btab pa/ bdag
379b5(mdo sde): kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar khye'u blo gros bzang po 'di lung bstan pa bzhin du lung ston par gyur cig / ces smras so/ /kun dga' bo/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di ji ltar de ltar
379b6(mdo sde): nga la 'bul ba de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang rang gi gnas brgyan nas 'bul bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis
379b7(mdo sde): kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel
380a1(mdo sde): dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung yang bzhugs nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /klu'i bdag po ma dros pa 'di
380a2(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyang nyan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa
380a3(mdo sde): mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ tshangs par spyad pa'ang spyod par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa bdun stong lnga brgya na de bzhin
380a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma dros pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa byang chub thob pa'i
380a5(mdo sde): tshe sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba'am/ zhe sdang gi gdung ba'am/ gti mug gi gdung ba'am/ pha rol gyi gdung bas gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can
380a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang nges par tshe'i tshad du 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag brgyad cur 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ /
380a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ bai DUR+ya las grub par 'gyur te/ sa chen po de ni/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad+mas khebs par 'gyur/ lha dang
380b1(mdo sde): mi de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba'ang bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor bar 'gyur/ mi de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lngas
380b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ci 'dra bar mi de dag gi'ang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag gnyis
380b3(mdo sde): kyis gnyis sbyor ba ma yin gyi/ de dag thams cad chos kyi dga' ba la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
380b4(mdo sde): de'ang yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar da ltar nga rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thams cad kyis chos ston pa ltar de sha thang bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems
380b5(mdo sde): can de dag kyang chos brjod pa tsam gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ lha dang mi rnams la chos kyi gtam gcig ston par
380b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan zhes so sor bgrang du med par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa de'i rang
380b7(mdo sde): gi lus las 'od bkye bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gsal bas khyab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa chos
381a1(mdo sde): kyi bka' mchid mdzad par 'gyur ro snyam du sems par 'gyur zhing de dag 'od des bskul ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' las 'dod par
381a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de dang 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa de shing ta la bdun srid du steng gi bar snang la 'phags te/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i seng+ge'i khri la 'dug
381a3(mdo sde): nas sems can de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de der 'dug pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du snang bar 'gyur te/ dper na/ zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin
381a4(mdo sde): n o| |de na dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i sems can de dag 'di snyam du ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de'i seng+ge'i khri gnas med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang gnas
381a5(mdo sde): med de| nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid do snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ de dag nyid kyis mngon par rtogs par 'gyur/ bzod pa'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
381a6(mdo sde): pa de ni| rdo rje'i sgo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdo rje ni/ gang dang gang du bab pa de dang de dag 'joms so/ /de bzhin du de
381a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos bstan pa'ang bag la nyal dang / kun nas sdang ba thams cad 'joms so/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma dros pa de gang gi tshe
381b1(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya ba 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'di 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro/
381b2(mdo sde): /zhes byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal
381b3(mdo sde): po ma dros pa'i bu rtag tu dad pa thob ces bya ba des nor bu rin po che'i gdugs rin po ches sbras pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
381b4(mdo sde): 'das| de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ba de gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dad
381b5(mdo sde): pa thob kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes
381b6(mdo sde): bya bar 'gyur ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ klu'i rgyal po'i bu rtag tu dad pa thob pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na
381b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par 'phags zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ma dros pa de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
382a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan cing rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs
382a2(mdo sde): 'di mthar phyin pa'i dus shes nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
382a3(mdo sde): dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing
382a4(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas mngon par dga' ste stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul bzhin du mchod de/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
382a5(mdo sde): dang / rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa bu dang chung ma dang bcas/ gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te klu'i rgyal po lha srung du mngon par sprul nas bcom
382a6(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'ang mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das der bzhugs su gsol nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge
382a7(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bkod de rang gi gnas nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du song ste/ des bcom ldan 'das byang chub
382b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang bcas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bya rgod phung po'i ri la bskyal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rang gi gnas su song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
382b2(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /gsol pa/ bdag gis bzung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
382b3(mdo sde): stsal pa| kun dga' bo/ de'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i lam gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'khor bzhi po dag la rgyun mi chad par ston cig /de ltar na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba
382b4(mdo sde): byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la gshegs so/ /zhes rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis
382b5(mdo sde): thos nas de dag thams cad dad pa thob ste lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /de dag de ltar phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i lam
382b6(mdo sde): gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid las brtsams te/ de lta de ltar chos bstan nas 'khor de las srog chags khris byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /srog chags lnga stong ni/ chos la chos
382b7(mdo sde): kyi mig skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
383a1(mdo sde): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa zhes
383a2(mdo sde): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / ban+d+he ye shes sde dang / yi ge pa dgon gling rma la sogs pas zhu chen
383a3(mdo sde): bgyis te gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dru ma kin na ra rA dza pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa
383a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
383a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ri bya rgod kyi phung po la dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal
383a6(mdo sde): cher phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs rab tu thob pa/ spobs pa
383a7(mdo sde): chags pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ bsam
383b1(mdo sde): pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi phyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'phags pa la zhugs pa/ bdag nyid byang
383b2(mdo sde): chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba/ sems can gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / des pa dang / bzod pa dang / sdug
383b3(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa/ lus dang / dag dang / sems dang / tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa /
383b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / bzod pa dang / des pa'i stobs kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag grangs med par brtson
383b5(mdo sde): 'grus shin tu brtsams pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa/
383b6(mdo sde): tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes la mkhas pa/ ri rab kyi ri ltar sems g.yo ba med pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung
383b7(mdo sde): dang / ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po la gnas te 'od zer thogs pa med pa/ snying rje chen po la gnas te sems can thams cad
384a1(mdo sde): kyi bya ba gcig la brtson pa/ dga' ba chen po la gnas te chos la dga' zhing mgu ba dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms chen po la gnas par brtson pa/
384a2(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang /
384a3(mdo sde): bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las rab tu 'das pa/ pha rol rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad kun tu rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/
384a4(mdo sde): u du ma wA ra'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ rab tu yongs su
384a5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas
384a6(mdo sde): btab pa/ mi 'khrugs par phyad par lung ston pa/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba mog mog por byed pa/
384a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sems pa/ chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi
384b1(mdo sde): gcod par yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'da' ba la mkhas pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa/ gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ mthong ba dang
384b2(mdo sde): thos pa don yod pas rnam par gnon pa/ rtag par rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i mchog thob pa/ sems
384b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la lta ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ sems can
384b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'jug pa dang brtag pa la bde blag tu mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar
384b5(mdo sde): byed pa| sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi
384b6(mdo sde): tshogs bsags pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa la smon pa med pa/ sems can dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma
384b7(mdo sde): dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/ sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig gis ston pa'i ye
385a1(mdo sde): shes la mkhas pa/ chos dang / don dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes
385a2(mdo sde): rab kyi dbang po mngon sum du gyur pa/ shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi
385a3(mdo sde): mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob pa/ lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs shin tu bsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems
385a4(mdo sde): dpa'i sde snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting
385a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa/ chos dkon mchog gi sgron ma 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad
385a6(mdo sde): kyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par lta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta bar mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bya
385a7(mdo sde): bas so sor nye bar gnas pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su brjod
385b1(mdo sde): kyang mthar mi phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / dga' 'byung dang / lag na rin po che dang / rin chen me tog dang /
385b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i tog dang / mthong dga' dang / mig gis mthong dga' dang / mdzes pa'i blo gros dang / dga' zhing mchog tu dga' byed dang / sa 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs
385b3(mdo sde): dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal chen dang / bdud thul dang / me tog man+dA ra ba'i dri dang / rlung lha dang / bden dga' dang / mnyam lha dang / ri rab rtse 'dzin dang / ri
385b4(mdo sde): rab brtsegs dang / ri rab mchog dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshim byed dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / lha'i rgyal pos mchod dang / mchog gi blo
385b5(mdo sde): gros dang / thogs med sems dang / skya rengs blo gros dang / mi skyob pa dang / dpag med rin chen mdzod dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / byang
385b6(mdo sde): chub blo gros dang / 'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs me tog dang / lha'i rgyal po dang / lha'i tshul gyis lta ba dang / dpung bzang dang / legs par bsam pa sems pa dang /
385b7(mdo sde): 'khor lo rab gnas rkang ba dang / mi g.yo rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rkang pas 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / dga' spobs
386a1(mdo sde): dang / spobs myur dang / spobs pa mi 'chad pa dang / spobs pa byin gyis brlabs dang / 'jam sgra dang / sems can thams cad tshim byed dang /
386a2(mdo sde): tshangs dbyangs dang / bzang skyong dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / nged dpon bzang po dang / mes byin dang / chu lha dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dbyangs dang / byang chub
386a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /gang stong gsum gyi
386a4(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
386a5(mdo sde): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
386a6(mdo sde): ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du
386a7(mdo sde): ' dus pa des byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
386b1(mdo sde): b os phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
386b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad/ /khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan/ /
386b3(mdo sde): snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba/ /'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin pa dgyes shing stobs bcu mchog mnga' ba/ /dul ba 'dul ba gdul ba'i pha
386b4(mdo sde): rol phyin/ /bcom ldan lha dang mi dang lus mchod pa/ /gdul ba'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa/ /'dom gang 'od ni gser
386b5(mdo sde): gyi kha dog lta/ /dge ba'i mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba/ /srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol phyin pas gzhan gyi tshogs 'joms shing / /pha rol
386b6(mdo sde): rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba/ /sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas/ /thugs rje mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul
386b7(mdo sde): bsal ba/ /'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas/ /lha yi lha mchog dri med dri ma bral/ /pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs rin
387a1(mdo sde): chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa/ /dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dgyes/ /rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba/ nam mkha' mnyam thugs
387a2(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung / /mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rgyu ba/ /'khor
387a3(mdo sde): lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang mis mchod pa yi mthu bo che/ /mgon po lha yi dbang po bdud 'joms pa/ /mi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mchod pa yi/ /mi mchog
387a4(mdo sde): dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag tu bde sdug dam pa'i chos la dgyes/ /mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs/ /chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur/ /
387a5(mdo sde): yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung / /thams cad dbyangs kyi yan
387a6(mdo sde): lag gsung tshul rdzogs/ /bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral/ /zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'/ /thar la
387a7(mdo sde): 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan/ /thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu la brten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /mthar gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mnga' ba/ /
387b1(mdo sde): las kyi rnam smin 'bras bu kho na gsung / /lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags/ /rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung
387b2(mdo sde): ba| |smig sgyu rgyu bzhin nga yi mi mnga' ba/ /dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye ba mi skye gang du'ang skye ma lags/ /skye dang 'jig dang gang du'ang mi bas pa/ /chos kyi
387b3(mdo sde): gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas/ /gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung / /rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs/ /ri rab
387b4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku/ /mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa/ /grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum grags pa/ /
387b5(mdo sde): skyes bu mchog la zhu ba zhus pa rnams/ /'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs dbyer gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis tshul dang mthun
387b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis zhus pa lung bstan pa'i
387b7(mdo sde): slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de
388a1(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
388a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan
388a3(mdo sde): pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs
388a4(mdo sde): so| |zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
388a5(mdo sde): spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams
388a6(mdo sde): lags| ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
388a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam
388b1(mdo sde): pa mnyam zhing spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang / dbye ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa
388b2(mdo sde): shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul
388b3(mdo sde): khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson
388b4(mdo sde): 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes
388b5(mdo sde): rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes
388b6(mdo sde): pa las mi nyams pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgal nas pha rol
388b7(mdo sde): thang la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la
389a1(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod par yang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la'ang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa
389a2(mdo sde): la'ang mi gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs la'ang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/
389a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu gda' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyi
389a4(mdo sde): nor ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' a zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam pa ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
389a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par
389a6(mdo sde): phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang mthun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos
389a7(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de
389b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
389b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos rnams blang ba ma mchis par slob dpon rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags/ ji
389b3(mdo sde): ltar na| byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
389b4(mdo sde): cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la legs so/ /
389b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten pa snying brtse ba dang /
389b6(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ khyod da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su
389b7(mdo sde): gzung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni/ legs so/ /
390a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol nas
390a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
390a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs
390a4(mdo sde): pa med pa rnams rin po che dang sdug pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang zhing yid 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog cing rjes
390a5(mdo sde): su yi rang ste dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas legs so/ /zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang / chos mnyan pa'am/ chos bgro ba'am/ de bzhin
390a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/ mtshan mo 'dug par bskul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / zang zing med
390a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyi chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi
390b1(mdo sde): bu| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par
390b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa dang / bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang / 'du byed thams cad gang yang mi 'gro /gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
390b3(mdo sde): par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam
390b4(mdo sde): par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog
390b5(mdo sde): dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang / mngon
390b6(mdo sde): par shes pas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang / sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ sems
390b7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so ci
391a1(mdo sde): rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems can gzud pa shes pa dang /
391a2(mdo sde): chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang / bdag gi sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
391a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
391a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyis 'dzud pa dang / ye shes
391a5(mdo sde): chags pa med pa dang / thabs kyis zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang / blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi
391a6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam zhing / spyod pa shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
391a7(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug par shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par
391b1(mdo sde): smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang / chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos
391b2(mdo sde): la chos su smra'i/ 'di la bdag dang / bdag gir mi smra ba ste/ de ltar bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu ma rung bar mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang
391b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi
391b4(mdo sde): bu| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa rnams yin/ dpe byad
391b5(mdo sde): bzang pos rnam par spras pa rnams yin/ gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ lag na rin po che thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
391b6(mdo sde): dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan
391b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi
392a1(mdo sde): sems kyis brgyan pa dang / mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par
392a2(mdo sde): bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul
392a3(mdo sde): khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang
392a4(mdo sde): zhe na| tshangs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ ka la ping+ka'i sgra dang / rnga sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ skye bo mang pos mthong na sdug cing yid du 'ong ba
392a5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
392a6(mdo sde): rnams su rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dam bcas pa
392a7(mdo sde): nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba'i cho ga shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin/ pha rol gyis mnan pa med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams
392b1(mdo sde): yin| bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa rnams yin/ thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi
392b2(mdo sde): ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par
392b3(mdo sde): bya'o| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rgod pa rnams yin/ ma khengs pa
392b4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ mu cor smra ba med pa rnams yin/ cang shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam
392b5(mdo sde): gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
392b6(mdo sde): lta ste| bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu smra ba med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad
392b7(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the tshom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di
393a1(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la
393a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa'i byams pa dang / sems can thams cad
393a3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sgrub pa'i snying rje chen po dang / chos thams cad la dga' bas mngon par sgrub pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
393a4(mdo sde): shes kyi phyir mngon par sgrub pa'i btang snyoms te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs
393a5(mdo sde): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi sdud pa'i
393a6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba'i chos shes pa dang / sangs rgyas la blta
393a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams
393b1(mdo sde): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang /
393b2(mdo sde): phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi
393b3(mdo sde): bu| byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rgal
393b4(mdo sde): nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mngon sum du mi byed pa dang /
393b5(mdo sde): srid pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la bsam bzhin du'ang skye ba dang / lta ba'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la lta ba'i bcing pas bcings pa'ang mi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo'ang
393b6(mdo sde): rab tu shes la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su mthun par yang byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ rgal nas pha rol thang la
393b7(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod
394a1(mdo sde): lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su
394a2(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba
394a3(mdo sde): shes pa dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang / rang
394a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la mtshungs par spyod par yang rnam par mi rtog pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
394a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor ba la'ang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
394a6(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi yi dam mi 'dor ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
394a7(mdo sde): ldan na| 'khor ba la'ang lta la mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs
394b1(mdo sde): la'ang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rang bzhin med pas chos rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang / chos rang bzhin
394b2(mdo sde): med pas sems can rang bzhin med par rtog pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin med par mos pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la
394b3(mdo sde): som nyi med cing the tshom dang bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs la'ang rnam par lta la chos kyi dbyings las
394b4(mdo sde): kyang mi g.yo'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu snang ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa
394b5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par song ba rnams yin/ sbyor ba 'khor bar song ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba la bsam pa song ba rnams yin/
394b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la'ang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod
394b7(mdo sde): par yang kun tu snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyi nor med pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
395a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir bsod nams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i bsod nams
395a2(mdo sde): kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i phyir dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar snyom pa dang / slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing nor med par yang
395a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyi longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi
395a4(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyi nor dang ldan pa yin la/ thabs kyi nor med pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i
395a5(mdo sde): sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shes pa sbyong ba dang / 'du byed thams cad gzod ma nas
395a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang / /chos thams cad bdag med do/ /zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ gzod ma nas zhi
395a7(mdo sde): ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no/ /rigs
395b1(mdo sde): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi mig shin tu
395b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa rnams yin/ chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang
395b3(mdo sde): bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ /rigs
395b4(mdo sde): kyi bu| byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
395b5(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang / bden pa rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / rton pa la gnas su shes pa dang / gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/
395b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
395b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang mthun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
396a1(mdo sde): ste| 'jig rten gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang / 'jig rten las sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba
396a2(mdo sde): dang / gzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas kyang rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa med pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/
396a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang mthun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan
396a4(mdo sde): dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang / shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / ye shes kyi dbang
396a5(mdo sde): phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no/ /
396a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can
396a7(mdo sde): rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi
396b1(mdo sde): sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/
396b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams
396b3(mdo sde): yin no| |bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / bden pa la nye bar
396b4(mdo sde): brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs
396b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos can te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
396b6(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnams blang ba med par slob dpon rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
396b7(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtan zing bsam pa sgyu med pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba la mi chags pa rnams yin/ gang ye shes yongs su tsho la ba de'ang sems can
397a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ched du yin gyi bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rnams blang
397a2(mdo sde): pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
397a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don gtong zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar
397a4(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho yi zang zing gis 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan
397a5(mdo sde): na| sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo
397a6(mdo sde): rjes su bskor ba rnams yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs ba rgyun mi chad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa shes pa la 'jug pa
397a7(mdo sde): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi phyed pa'i chos ston pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad
397b1(mdo sde): kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams
397b2(mdo sde): yin no| |bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu
397b3(mdo sde): thob pa rnams yin/ bsam bzhin du tshe dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba'ang ston la phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyal yang dag
397b4(mdo sde): par gzhol zhing sa bcur nges par byung na sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
397b5(mdo sde): cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
397b6(mdo sde): 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to/ /steng gi par snang las lha bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong gis lha'i glu dbyangs blangs te lha'i
397b7(mdo sde): m e tog man+dA ra ba'i char rab tu phab nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi
398a1(mdo sde): pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bstan pa 'di ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa nas bsgrubs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang
398a2(mdo sde): bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mnyan nas mos pa dang / mos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan
398a3(mdo sde): dag la'ang ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/ de dag ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
398a4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng+ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro/ /
398a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /zhes ched du brjod pa chen du brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
398a6(mdo sde): bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /byang
398a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan
398b1(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher rab
398b2(mdo sde): tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos du dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
398b3(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad
398b4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe sdang ba'i sems
398b5(mdo sde): med de| shin tu byams pa bsgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gnas te snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
398b6(mdo sde): chos 'dod de chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang / thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te/ mtsho chen rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs
398b7(mdo sde): su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te smon lam gyis
399a1(mdo sde): yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gang de
399a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ chos brgyad
399a3(mdo sde): po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /stong
399a4(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag sa phyogs mtho dma' can dang / ri nag po dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho chen po
399a5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur to/ /sa chen po 'di thams cad kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to/ /chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la'ang
399a6(mdo sde): gnod pa med par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing skam gang dag lo brgya lon pa de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang /
399a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud/ mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /de ma yin pa shing gzhan
399b1(mdo sde): thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su btud/ mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ /sa chen po
399b2(mdo sde): las pad+ma tshad shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba skyes so/ /snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen
399b3(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gsal bar gyur to/ /mi snang zhing ma dkrol bar steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ste grags par gyur to/ /ri'i
399b4(mdo sde): rgyal po gangs can dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi dri langs par gyur te/ dri des stong gsum gyi
399b5(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhim po bsnam par gyur to/ /ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang de las me tog gi char chen po babs te de
399b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang na ba der mngon par babs nas sa chen po 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis bus mo man chad nub par gyur to/ /me tog gi
399b7(mdo sde): 'di dag las me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag kyang byung ngo / /steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi
400a1(mdo sde): gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshad tsam kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi do shal dang / rin po
400a2(mdo sde): che'i dril ba g.yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ chags par byed pa des stong
400a3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
400a4(mdo sde): 'das| dga' bar bgyid pa/ mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan
400a5(mdo sde): par gyur pa dga' ba 'di su'i snga las lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po ri spos kyi ngad ldang nas 'khor
400a6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor dri za stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang bcas te 'ong ba de'i snga ltas so/ /de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de
400a7(mdo sde): la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas steng gi bar snang la me tog gi chun po'i char 'bebs
400b1(mdo sde): shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
400b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi wang gi khog pa bai DUR+ya las byas pa/ dzam+bu'i gling gi gser
400b3(mdo sde): gyi sab le'u can/ sa le sbram dang / nor bu dang / rin po che du mas spras pa/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs te sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po
400b4(mdo sde): de dag dang lhan cig tu grag par byed do/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas pi wang gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs
400b5(mdo sde): kyis go bar gyur to/ /pi wang gi sgra des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dang / lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis mnan te mi gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas pi wang gi
400b6(mdo sde): sgra bskul bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol mo bor te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas
400b7(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i shing dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gangs can dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po
401a1(mdo sde): dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po rnams dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ldeg /rab tu
401a2(mdo sde): ldeg / kun tu rab tu ldeg go /g.yo/ /rab tu g.yo/ /kun tu rab tu g.yo'o/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ chang gis ra ro ba'i mi
401a3(mdo sde): 'khyor| rab tu 'khyor/ kun tu rab tu 'khyor ba de bzhin du shing de dag thams cad dang / ri thams cad kyang 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud do/ /bam po gnyis
401a4(mdo sde): p a| mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang khog pa bai DUR+ya las byas pa blangs ma thag tu de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i nang nas phyir mi
401a5(mdo sde): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
401a6(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi
401a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis pi wang gi sgra de thos pa dang / pi wang gi sgra de ma
401b1(mdo sde): bzod nas rang rang gi stan las langs te 'dar/ rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar ro/ /'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud do/ /gar byed/ rab tu gar byed/ kun tu rab tu gar
401b2(mdo sde): byed do| |nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste 'gul/ rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur
401b3(mdo sde): ston to| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/
401b4(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'jog par mi nus shing / tshe dang ldan pa dag byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byad
401b5(mdo sde): pa lta bur ston/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang 'di blangs pa dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sbyar bas pi wang gi sgra
401b6(mdo sde): des bdag cag la dbang med par bdag cag gi lus rang rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga'/ 'dar/ rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar te sems rnam par bzhag par yang ma
401b7(mdo sde): dus so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'od srung chen po rgas gtugs 'khogs pa/ 'dod pa nyung
402a1(mdo sde): ba| chog shes pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir
402a2(mdo sde): rang gi lus 'dzin par mi nus shing / gnas brtan du gyur kyang byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ dper
402a3(mdo sde): na| dmu rlung phyad pa'i rlung langs pa na shing dang / nags dang / ri thams cad gang gis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i stobs med mthu med de/ de dag thams cad mi 'dod bzhin du
402a4(mdo sde): g.yo| |rab tu g.yo/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul lo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du gang 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang blangs pa de'i sgra thos pas bdag cag dmu rlung phyad
402a5(mdo sde): pas ri chen po bdas pa bzhin du bdag 'dzin ma nus par gyur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di'i smon lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ni/ 'di
402a6(mdo sde): 'dra ste| des nyan thos kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / gzi brjid thams cad zil gyis non to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
402a7(mdo sde): chen po| phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs la gang gi phyir pi wang gi sgra des bskul ba'am/ bskyod par mi nus pas
402b1(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyi che'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs dang /
402b2(mdo sde): gzi brjid de ni/ pi wang gi sgra 'dis zil gyis non to/ /gang theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de la ni/ zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa la ltos/ de nas
402b3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang gi sgra de sgrog pa na sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pi wang de dang / sil snyan
402b4(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /tham 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi/ /chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben/ /zhi ba stong
402b5(mdo sde): pa mi 'gyur 'khrugs pa med/ /gzod nas dag ste dri med nam mkha' bzhin/ /gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa yi/ /sems can kun mnyam sems can sems can med/ /sems can
402b6(mdo sde): skad du sgra rnams 'byung ba yang / /chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs te de yang med/ /zhing rnams thams cad zhing mnyam zhing min te/ /bar snang dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam par snang / /'phel ba
402b7(mdo sde): ma yin mi zad ma skyes te/ /gsob gsog nam mkha' lta bur rnam par dag /sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yin/ /chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa med pa ste/ /tshul
403a1(mdo sde): khrims shes rab ye shes rnam grol mnyam/ /mtshan nyid gcig ste mtshan mnyam mtshan nyid med/ /nyon mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol/ /
403a2(mdo sde): rtog dang rtog pa kun rtog rnam par rtog /nang na rgyu bam yin phyi rol min/ /'du shes mdud pa phyin ci log las gyur/ /rnam par rtog pas chos dbyings ming btags pa/ /ming
403a3(mdo sde): de nyid kyang gzhan min de bzhin min/ /ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rjes rtogs pa/ /de dag rtag tu mi chags 'jig rten spyod/ /gang rnams 'das pa'i bde gshegs
403a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa/ /de dag gis ni gang gsungs chos mang po/ /gzod nas zad cing dengs dang 'jigs las dben/ /de dag yul dang phyogs su 'gro ma yin/ /chos 'di dag ni
403a5(mdo sde): yi ge las byung ste/ /yi ge gang dag zad can zad pa'i chos/ /yi ge zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na/ /chos rnams kun la rnam par rtog mi byed/ /sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud
403a6(mdo sde): mnyam rgyud ma yin/ /rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan te chags pa med/ /sems dang sems byung chos mtha' med shes pas/ /'phags pa rnams ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug/
403a7(mdo sde): mtha' dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad/ /thog ma tha ma par ma mnyam gyur pa/ /dus gsum dag ni dben pas shes pa mnyam/ /shes pa de yang mtha' yod ma yin no/ /
403b1(mdo sde): skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags/ mtha' dang mtha' med lta bas gos pa rnams/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na/ /bdag dang sems can rnam par rtog ma yin/
403b2(mdo sde): bdag las ldang ba rtag tu ldang ma yin/ /chos de kun nas bslang ba med pa ste/ /gang dag ldang dang ldang pa med rtogs pa/ /de dag bzod pa mnyam nyid rjes mthun pa/ /chos kun rtag
403b3(mdo sde): tu bdag med rang bzhin te/ /sprin dang glog dang nam mkha' lta bu gsog /bdag dang sems can rtag tu rang bzhin stong / /'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyar 'jug pa'o/ /chos rnams
403b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig ste mtshan nyid med/ /gang gis thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam rtogs nas/ /thug pa med pa'i chos rnams ston byed kyang / /chos la yongs su rtog pa mi byed do/ /tha ma
403b5(mdo sde): 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi/ /chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste/ /yi ge rnams la rnam par rtog mi byed/ /de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yin/ /don dang tshig 'bru gnyis
403b6(mdo sde): la mi 'jug ste/ /gnyis med rtag tu don ni sgra dang bral/ /gang gis mtha' 'di dben par shes pa ni/ /de yi sngon gyi mtha' ni nye bar chad/ /gang dag sngon mtha' nye bar chad pa rnams/ /
403b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i don du 'dus byas rnams la spyod/ /yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mtha' med shes/ /de yi byams dang snying rje shin tu dag /gang gi byams dang snying rje rnam dag pa/ /sdug bsngal
404a1(mdo sde): dang ni bde ba mtshungs mnyam sbyor/ /rgod dang khengs pa ma yin brtan pa yi/ /skyes bu mchog de don gyi cho ga shes/ /chos kyi tshul 'di zhi zhing dben pa
404a2(mdo sde): ste| |'chad pa na ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /nam yang 'phel ba med cing 'bri ba med/ /chos nyid 'di ni ngar 'dzin med cing zhi/ /bar snang lam gyi sgra ni gzungs med de/ /
404a3(mdo sde): gang gis bshad pa med kyang grags par gyur/ /gang gis bshad dang gang la bshad pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad dbang can rdzun pa yin/ /tshigs su bcad pa mngon
404a4(mdo sde): par sgrub pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i
404a5(mdo sde): cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag ga las byung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
404a6(mdo sde): bu| khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po la dris shig dang / des de'i lan glon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po
404a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di dag ga las byung / smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra las byung ngo //
404b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra ga las byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra ni/ nam mkha' las 'byung ngo / /smras pa
404b2(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra khong pa'i nang nas mi 'byung ngam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra lus kyi
404b3(mdo sde): nang gi khong nas byung ngam/ 'on te sems las byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ lus las kyang ma yin/ sems las kyang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni/ bems
404b4(mdo sde): po g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtswa dang / bod ba dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / mig yor lta bu'o/ /sems ni/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ rnam
404b5(mdo sde): par rig pa med pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ lus dang sems ma gtogs par gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ sems can
404b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi sgra ni/ yid la byed pa las 'byung bar btags so/ /smras pa/ gal te nam mkha' med na/ sgra ga las 'byung / smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ nam mkha' ma gtogs par
404b7(mdo sde): gzhan gang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis sgra ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ nam mkha' las 'byung bar rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i
