434b6(mdo sde): ba ji lta bu/ /ji ltar byin nas 'gyod med cing / /rnam smin don du mi gnyer bar/ /byang chub tu ni bsngo bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dngos po kun
434b7(mdo sde): la mi lta ba/ /des ni byin nas 'gyod pa med/ /byang chub lam du 'jog byed pa/ /de phyir rnam smin re ba med/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar tshul khrims ldan gyur kyang / /
435a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med/ /theg chen bla na med pa la/ /ngang tshul ngan can smin par byin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras
435a2(mdo sde): pa| byang chub sems kyi tshul khrims ldan/ /stong pa nyid kyi rlom sems med/ /byams pa chen po skyed pa ni/ /ngang tshul ngan can yongs smin byed/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras
435a3(mdo sde): pa| ji ltar na ni sems can gyi/ /spyod shing bsdigs pa bzod byed cing / /sems kyi gnod pa mi byed la/ /mchog tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
435a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs gso ba'i sman pa snyam/ /de dag ngan par smras pa yi/ /tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur ro/ /sil snyan rnams
435a5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ de dag brtson 'grus ji lta bu/ /pha rol gnon pa'ang ci 'dra zhig /ji ltar zhum pa med sems kyi/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i
435a6(mdo sde): gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ chos dang sems can srung ba ni/ /pha rol gnon dang brtson 'grus so/ /dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni/ /des na sems ni zhum mi 'gyur/ /sil snyan
435a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan/ /blo gros rtogs par khong du chud/ /ji ltar bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /de la chags pa med par 'gyur/ /byang chub
435b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yeng ba med pa dran dang ldan/ /tshul 'chos med pa blo gros ldan/ /thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ /des na de la chags
435b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar shes rab ldan pa dang / /yang dag lta ba drang po dang / /chos rnams rnam par dbye ba la/ /mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par
435b3(mdo sde): 'gyur| |byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ thos pas shes rab kun tu 'phel/ /rten pas lta ba drang por 'gyur/ /chos kyi sbyin pas nges 'gyur te/ /tshul bzhin
435b4(mdo sde): gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar thos pa btsal bas na/ /de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur/ /gang gis che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar/ /thos pa'i chos rnams
435b5(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ /gus par byas te thos tshul zhing / /sgrub pa'i thos pa mang du 'gyur/ /zang zing med par chos sbyin pa/ /des ni che ba'i bdag nyid
435b6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag byams pa ji lta bu/ /de dag snying rje ci 'dra zhig /de dag dga' ba ji lta bu/ /btang snyoms kyang ni ci 'dra zhig /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
435b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ sems dang bsam snyoms byams pa zhig /sems can 'grol ba snying rje'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dga' dga' ba ste/ /gnyis spangs pa ni btang snyoms so/ /
436a1(mdo sde): sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /sems kyang ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur/ /chos thos nas ni ji lta bur/ /de dag the tshom skye
436a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms pa/ /des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /the tshom med cing bsam dag pas/ /chos
436a3(mdo sde): thos nas ni som nyi med/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ bsod nams tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig /de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong la/ /brtson pa yang ni ji lta
436a4(mdo sde): bu| |byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs/ /'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshogs/ /zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas te/ /chos shes
436a5(mdo sde): pa ni lhag mthong ngo / /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gi ni spyod yul gang / /de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu/ /de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig /de dag sbyor ba'ang ji lta bu/ /byang
436a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag spyod yul stong pa nyid/ /gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam/ /gnas pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams te/ /sems can rab grol
436a7(mdo sde): sbyor pa'o/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bdud kyi las gang yin/ /sangs rgyas 'phrin las ji lta bu/ /ci 'dra ba yi las byas na/ /byang chub la ni gzhol bar 'gyur/ /
436b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ theg pa chung ngu bdud kyi las/ /sangs rgyas 'phrin las theg pa che/ /sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni/ /byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o/ /
436b2(mdo sde): sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag grogs bsten ji lta bu/ /sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra zhig /log par lta ba mi gnas shing / /de ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems
436b3(mdo sde): dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa/ /rtag tu bde sbyin grogs po'o/ /byang chub sems las gang zlog pa/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs por shes/ /sil
436b4(mdo sde): snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ lam du 'jug par 'gyur ba yi/ /lta ba drang po ji lta bu/ /sbyor ba rnams par shes nas su/ /ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis
436b5(mdo sde): smras pa| las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni/ /de dag drang por lta ba yin/ /log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas/ /lta ba de dag 'jig mi byed/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar dam pa'i
436b6(mdo sde): chos srung zhing / /sems can yongs su smin par byed/ /ji lta bu yi thabs kyis ni/ /de dag byang chub sgrub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus
436b7(mdo sde): kyis ni chos srung ste/ /bsdu bas yongs su smin par byed/ /mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pas ni/ /byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag shes pa'i las
437a1(mdo sde): ci 'dra| |nga rgyal las ni ji lta bu/ /ji ltar bka' blo bde ba dang / /thams cad dus su mthun par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa
437a2(mdo sde): rtsod pa med pa'i shes pa'i las/ /nga rgyal las ni rtsod pa 'byung / /nges par bka' blo bde ba ste/ /gus pa yis ni mthun par 'gyur/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag lam ni
437a3(mdo sde): ji lta bu| |log pa'i lam yang ci 'dra zhig / bla med byang chub lam du ni/ /ji ltar sems can rab tu 'god/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ lam ni pha rol
437a4(mdo sde): phyin pa drug / theg pa chung ngu log pa'i lam/ /shes rab thabs la bslab pa ni/ /sems can lam la 'dzud pa'o/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bur na nor chen 'gyur/ /
437a5(mdo sde): de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig /gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu/ /gang gis de dag 'gro tshim byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ nor bdun dang ni rtag
437a6(mdo sde): tu ldan| |chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o/ /de dag gter ni gzugs yin te/ /rab tu rnyed nas tshim par byed/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gi ni pha ma gang / /nye du'i tshogs
437a7(mdo sde): ni ji lta bu| |g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig / gang gis mkhas pa de dag mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ ma ni shes rab pha ni thabs/ /nye du byang
437b1(mdo sde): chub phyogs rnams yin/ /dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te/ /des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bdag med rtogs nas ni/ /byams pas 'gro ba khyab
437b2(mdo sde): par byed/ /bdag med pa dang byams pa dag /de la ji ltar mtshungs par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ gang dag stong nyid rab shes pa/ /de ni bdag med
437b3(mdo sde): khong du chud/ /gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa/ /de ni de yi byams pa mchog /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro med na/ /las dang
437b4(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin/ /ji lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dam pa'i don du 'ong med de/ /gang du'ang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ /kun rdzob
437b5(mdo sde): tu ni lam 'jug cing / /rnam par smin pa nye bar ston/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang / /smon lam rnam par spangs par ni/ /mtshan nyid gcig tu
437b6(mdo sde): rab rtogs nas/ /de kho na ni ji ltar shes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med/ /mtshan ma don du gnyer med pa/ /mtshan nyid
437b7(mdo sde): gcig cing don gcig ste/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo bstan to/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/ /stong par rtog pa ji lta bu/ /sems can lta ba ji lta
438a1(mdo sde): bu| |yongs su smin byed ji lta bu/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes rab kyis ni stong par rtog /thabs kyis sems can
438a2(mdo sde): rnams la lta/ /snying rjes yongs su smin par byed/ /des ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis/ /skye ba med cing 'byung med par//
438a3(mdo sde): tshul mchog 'di 'dra shes nas ni/ /gang gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ mi skye ba dang mi 'gyur ba/ /de ni shes rab spyod
438a4(mdo sde): yul lo| |bsam bzhin du ni gang skye ba/ /de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gtong la dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji lta bur ni phyir mi ldog /ji ltar
438a5(mdo sde): bzod pa phun sum tshogs/ /ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ mnyam par gnas par gtong la dga'/ /chos kyi
438a6(mdo sde): dbyings las phyir mi ldog / mi skye ba la bzod pa ste/ /chos shes nas ni rnam par nges/ /sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ byang chub snying po snying po gang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan
438a7(mdo sde): nyid gang / /ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ byang chub snying po nam mkha' ste/ /
438b1(mdo sde): byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang yang kun nas gti mug med/ /de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
438b2(mdo sde): thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/ /de dag gis bzod pa rab tu thob nas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste 'di skad ces kyang gsol
438b3(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ /gang gi slad du bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rna ba 'di lta bu thob pas sangs rgyas ni/ bdag cag gi ched du byung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ sil snyan dang / glu
438b4(mdo sde): dbyangs 'di dag las the tshom 'dri ba'i sgra 'di lta bu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris pa de dag thams cad kyi lan btab pas 'khor 'di'i dogs pa
438b5(mdo sde): thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag cag kyang chos snang ba dpag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sil snyan de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i
438b6(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyis na/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag /de dag thams cad ni/ sangs
438b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs su blta'o/ /bzhin bzang dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs kyis nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu byung na/ sil snyan las chos kyi sgra ci'i phyir mi
439a1(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ bzhin bzang dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis gsol pa/
439a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyi mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig /bam po bzhi pa/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i
439a3(mdo sde): slas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig kha dog sna tshogs kyi do shal thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
439a4(mdo sde): bos phyag bcal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i mu tig gi do shal de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab bo/ /mu tig gi do shal de dag phul ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi
439a5(mdo sde): mthus de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la mu tig gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de
439a6(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ ngos shin tu rnam par phye ba sha stag go /khang pa brtsegs pa de dag na rin po ches spras pa'i khri rtsa ba'ang
439a7(mdo sde): rin po che las byas pa/ lha'i ras bcos ma'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /khri de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
439b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo / /de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu
439b2(mdo sde): ste yid rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed
439b3(mdo sde): nas dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ste dang pa thob nas thams cad kyis sgra skad dang / dbyangs gcig tu tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
439b4(mdo sde): bstod do/ /bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba/ /don dgongs mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab/ /don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab bslab pa/ /sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag
439b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tha ba 'jig /dgon par bzhugs dgyes bsnyengs ba mi mnga' ba/ /rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa po/ /bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag
439b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /spyan sngar dri bral nyon mongs mi mnga' ba/ /sa yi dbang po pha rol dgra 'joms pa/ /pad+mo lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa/ /bde gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag
439b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nang na mig dang 'drar spyod cing / /nyi zla 'di yi 'od ni spa bkong ba/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes/ /'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
440a1(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags shing / /mgon dang dpung dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur/ /khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig /mtha' yas
440a2(mdo sde): dbyangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /brnyes dang ma brnyes nam yang chags mi mnga'/ /'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs/ /chags sred 'khri shing dra bgrol
440a3(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dul ba thugs ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag /nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab bzhugs shing / /'gro la
440a4(mdo sde): zang zing mi mnga' sbyin stsol pa/ /sbyin pa'i gnas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /smra mchog dam pa mtshan gyi 'od 'phros pa/ /lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs/ /'jam
440a5(mdo sde): zhing snum la snyan pa'i gsung gsung ba/ /srid pa gsum las 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa mi mnga' ba/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshags//
440a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la ston mdzad pa/ /chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes
440a7(mdo sde): drug / ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'grel/ /'gro drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser gyi kha dog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi gnas dbang po dul la
440b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston gyi zla lta'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mchog yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ /skye rgu 'di dag bsgral dka'
440b2(mdo sde): chu bzhi sgrol| / bsgoms shing dbang po thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal/ /thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab stsal/ /bslangs na dbang po dgyes
440b3(mdo sde): par rab 'gyur ba/ /pha rol dag la sbyin pa mchog stsol ba/ /gtong dpa' bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can nga rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'gal
440b4(mdo sde): bgyid rnams/ /'phags pa bla na med pa'i lam mchog la/ /rnam par 'dren pa chen po khyod kyis bkod/ /phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas/ /las dang nyon mongs zil gyis
440b5(mdo sde): mnan te bzhugs/ /'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som nyi gcod/ /bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa'i chos la dgyes shing mnyam par bzhag /chos rnams kun la
440b6(mdo sde): mnga' dbang pha rol phyin/ /bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog /bcom ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'chos pa mi mnga' g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa'i
440b7(mdo sde): stobs po che/ /mi mchog lam dang lam la lags la mkhas/ /rlung dmar lta bur ci la'ang chags mi mnga'/ /gzir bar gyur gsal pha rol shin tu gnas/ /thub pa bas ma 'tshal ba'i
441a1(mdo sde): bang mdzod mnga'/ /spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang+gA yi/ /bye ma snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod/ /mthu brnyes mi g.yo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /chags pa'i skyon mi
441a2(mdo sde): mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs/ /gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis brten/ /de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dang na dang rga shi rnam par spangs/ /tshe rabs bye ba
441a3(mdo sde): bsam mi khyab pa dgongs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis/ /'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab tu 'dral/ /'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud/ /phyag dang zhabs
441a4(mdo sde): la bkra shis mtshan mnga' zhing / /bkra shis bgyid las 'jam pa'i ngan slong ba/ /bcom ldan bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs rnams la ni dbang gi pha rol phyin/ /zang zing
441a5(mdo sde): mi mnga' chos kyi sbyin pa stsol/ /thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab brdungs pa/ /chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya'i rigs rus rgyal po'i las byung ba/ /dbang po zhi zhing thugs kyang
441a6(mdo sde): rab tu zhi/ /ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnam gzigs pa/ /bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno pa yi/ /ral gri thogs nas byang
441a7(mdo sde): chub drung lhags kyang / /khyod kyi ba spu tsam yang ma g.yos te/ /bcom ldan ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi yi dam pa bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ /sku rnams kun la nongs pa bgyis
441b1(mdo sde): kyang bzod/ /yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chi bas dpa'/ /bzod gsung bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthu brnyes bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa
441b2(mdo sde): bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod/ /chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dus bgyis nyam chung snying po med bar mkhyen/ /skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba
441b3(mdo sde): ma lags sel/ /khyod kyi mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags/ /ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can long ba sdug bsngal mgon med pa/ /de dag khyod kyis dkon mchog
441b4(mdo sde): gsum tshim bgyis/ /khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs dang bsam gtan dang ni dbang po bsgoms/ /khyod kyis bdud ni
441b5(mdo sde): dpung dang bcas pa bcom/ /srid pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa/ /thub pa dbang po bsgoms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos bstan pa/ /mtshungs med byang chub la ni chags
441b6(mdo sde): mi mnga'/ /grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsungs pa/ /bcom ldan gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren pa rmi 'drar chos rnams thugs su chud/ /'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'dra rab
441b7(mdo sde): tu bskor/ /'dus bgyis yang dag tu ni rmi lam 'drar/ /mkhyen nas sems can mang po dran par mdzad/ /khyod kyi ljags mchog dag pa dri mi mnga'/ /ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil
442a1(mdo sde): 'khor khebs/ /ljags ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgya lta bu/ /ljags skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ba/ /'gro ba
442a2(mdo sde): rnams la 'dod pa'i skyon mi gsung / /'dod pa'i chags bral smad pa ma lags pa/ /byang chub mchog la srog chags mos par mdzad/ /nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs
442a3(mdo sde): ba| |ser sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'/ /mi yi dam pa gser ltar dpal stug pa/ /khyod kyi mtshan dang grags pa chub par grags/ /gnas dang dbang po rnam par
442a4(mdo sde): 'byed la mkhas/ /'di na bzhugs shing 'gro ba'i mig tu gyur/ /gnas dang yig 'bru tshig gi don bslab pas/ /khyod kyis chu bo bzhi la zam pa btags/ /glang po rin thang ma
442a5(mdo sde): mchis sbyin pa mdzad/ /'dren pa mi dang lha rnams sgrol ba po/ /khyod kyi yon tan mtha' ma mi rnyed de/ /mgon po khyod la bdag ni thal mo sbyor/ /mi yi mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pas//
442a6(mdo sde): mi mjed dzam+bu'i rgyal por gyur lags na/ /'dir ni dbang po dang pas thal sbyar nas/ /skyabs su nye bar mchi ba smos ci 'tshal/ /phung po gsog ste nyam chung snying po med/ /stong pa sgyu ma
442a7(mdo sde): chu zla 'dra bar ni/ /gau tam khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen/ /phung po khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sred pa'i srad bus dam du mdud bor te/ /srid pa'i 'gro bar dra bar
442b1(mdo sde): rab grags pa/ /srid par 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de/ /bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis bral/ /tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu'i gsung brjod pa/ /sho be ma lags mi 'gyur
442b2(mdo sde): 'drid ma lags/ /phun tshogs gsung de de dag thos nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar te skyabs su nye bar mchi/ /phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir reg pa na/ /nags tshal bcas par rnam pa drug
442b3(mdo sde): g.yos kyang / /'dir ni gzhan la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis/ /bdud phyogs dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha yi rgyal po che dang mkhas pa gang / /khyod kyis chos don gnyer
442b4(mdo sde): zhing mchis pa rnams/ /de dag so sor chos bstan thos nas su/ /zhabs gnyis la ni rab tu gtugs par bgyid/ /de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan
442b5(mdo sde): 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
442b6(mdo sde): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bud med kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ ji ltar bdag cag bud med kyi
442b7(mdo sde): dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos de bcom ldan
443a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i slas de
443a2(mdo sde): dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sring mo dag de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ji ltar bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos
443a3(mdo sde): po thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams
443a4(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sring mo dag chos gcig
443a5(mdo sde): dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
443a6(mdo sde): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems bskyed
443a7(mdo sde): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brjed pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus
443b1(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
443b2(mdo sde): phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos 'di gnyis dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo
443b3(mdo sde): dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa
443b4(mdo sde): gsum yongs su dag pa dang / ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med
443b5(mdo sde): bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos
443b6(mdo sde): po thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / g.yo med par bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med par tshul khrims bsten pa
443b7(mdo sde): dang / g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag
444a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du
444a2(mdo sde): gnyer ba dang / chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / bsam pa thag pa nas bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa dang / rtag par rgyun du skyes pa'i lus thob par sems

444a4(mdo sde): ro| |sring mo dag / gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang pa dang /

444b1(mdo sde): gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
444b2(mdo sde): yongs su dor ba'i phyir gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa dang / de dag dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems

444b5(mdo sde): pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar sred pa ma yin pa dang / rgod pa dang 'jo ba la sred pa ma
444b6(mdo sde): yin pa dang / glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna ba dang sgra dang / sna dang dri dang / lce dang ro dang /
444b7(mdo sde): lus dang reg la dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/ sring mo dag /chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /
445a1(mdo sde): sring mo dag /gzhan yang chos dgu dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
445a2(mdo sde): chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma yin pa dang / bdag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du smra ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / gang zag tu
445a3(mdo sde): smra ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin te/ sring mo dag /chos dgu po 'di dag

445a5(mdo sde): las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems
445a6(mdo sde): mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa skyed pa dang / srog gi phyir yang rdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang /
445a7(mdo sde): tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang / pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phrag dog med pa dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal mngon par mi sgrub pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang ldan par
445b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring mo dag /chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te skyes pa'i dngos po thob par
445b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /sring mo dag /gzhan yang bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te/ de gzugs la dbu ba brdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags shing myos par mi 'gyur
445b3(mdo sde): ba dang / tshor ba la chu'i chu bur lta bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba'ang
445b4(mdo sde): ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes la smig rgyu lta bur so sor rtog cing bud med kyi 'du shes mi skyed/ skyes pa'i
445b5(mdo sde): 'du shes mi skyed pa dang / 'du byed rnams la chu shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po med par rtogs nas 'du byed thams cad la mi gnas shing
445b6(mdo sde): de la gnas pa mi skyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtogs nas chos thams
445b7(mdo sde): cad la chags pa med/ zhe sdang med/ gti mug med pa dang / lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams dang ldan pa dang / chu'i
446a1(mdo sde): khams dang ldan pa dang / me'i khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi khams dang ldan par lus la so sor rtog go /lus 'di ni/ bsdus pa rtswa dang / shing
446a2(mdo sde): dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin gyi/ phyin ci log sngon
446a3(mdo sde): du song bas rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi byung ba'o/ /gzhan yang bud med mig la kha zas las skyes pa sha'i gong bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben par
446a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben par
446a5(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa'o/ /gzhan yang bud med lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang / ngag la brag ca lta bur 'jug pa dang / sems la sgyu ma

446b1(mdo sde): dngos po las sgyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs shing rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

452b7(mdo sde): cad ni| yongs su spyad pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
453a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de'ang lha dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir bar gyi bskal pa bcu tham par bzhugs par 'gyur
453a2(mdo sde): r o| |bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
453a3(mdo sde): chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
453a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
453a5(mdo sde): ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba lung bstan nas mya ngan
453a6(mdo sde): las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ bar gyi bskal pa de'ang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur
453a7(mdo sde): te| bar gyi bskal pa de ni/ dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing mgu ste yid
453b1(mdo sde): rangs shing rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis sa las steng gi bar snang la shing ta la
453b2(mdo sde): bdun tsam du 'phags te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa rgya cher spel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs
453b3(mdo sde): pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang / /dri ma med de nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na/ /de phyir de dag
453b4(mdo sde): thub sras thu bor 'gyur/ /rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med/ /thams cad med de gzung med gsog dang gsob/ /chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas/ /'dus byas
453b5(mdo sde): dag pa skyo bar 'gyur ba med/ /la las sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang / /shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon mthong ba/ /dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar/ /phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po
453b6(mdo sde): med| |gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu ba brdos pa bzhin/ /tshor ba 'di ni chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gzungs/ /'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med/ /srid
453b7(mdo sde): gsum 'di ni sems yid rnam par shes/ /rgyal bas de bzhin sgyu 'dra gsog tu gsungs/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas ni/ /'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med/ /
454a1(mdo sde): khams bzhi po ni chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang / /skye mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang / /chos 'di gsog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa/ /de dag rgyal pa'i
454a2(mdo sde): chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin/ /rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang / /de bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang / /rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad/ /stong pa
454a3(mdo sde): nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag / bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang / /de ltar shes rab chags med ma spros par/ /gang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyur pa de/ /pha
454a4(mdo sde): rol phyin pa'i pha rol rab tu phyin| / bdag med kho na nyid phyir byams pa mnyam/ /nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag /zhi phyir dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi/ /lam
454a5(mdo sde): 'di tshangs pa'i lam ste rtag tu zhi/ /bsdu ba bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di/ /rnam par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs/ /'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa/ /de ni
454a6(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin/ /sems can 'di dag bdag med sems can med/ /srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do/ /dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar/ /gang shes de
454a7(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med/ /de ni gang du'ang bdag med rlom sems med/ /gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa/ /
454b1(mdo sde): sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan/ /chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra/ /gang du'ang mi 'ong nam yang 'gror mi 'gyur/ /chos dbyings 'di yi gnas pa rig nas ni/ /rgyal
454b2(mdo sde): bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas/ /gang na'ang yod pa'am med pa med mod kyi/ /rgyu la brten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na/ /mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni/ /sems
454b3(mdo sde): kyi 'khri shing de ltar shes par bya/ /rlung ni nam mkhar mi chags rgyu ba bzhin/ /gzugs med sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas/ /nyon
454b4(mdo sde): mongs gzugs med gsog par mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ni rtsig pa rtswa dang lo ma 'dra/ /blun pa rje med rngo shing ngan pa ltar/ /de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas/ /lus kyi chos
454b5(mdo sde): la gnas par mi byed do/ /tshig ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang 'dra/ /ri dang brag gi brag ca lta bu ste/ /de 'drar sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa/ /sgra rnams kun la 'dod pa'i chags pa
454b6(mdo sde): med| |bdag ni nam mkha'i ngos gnas mi ltung ste/ /mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin/ /chos 'di nam mkha' 'dra bar bsgoms nas ni/ /de ltar sems can sems can
454b7(mdo sde): med mtshungs gnas/ /bskal pa brgya phrag mang por bsregs kyang ni/ /ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma tshig /chos rnams thams cad nam mkhar 'drar shes pa/ /de sreg bskal
455a1(mdo sde): tshe zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro / ri dang ri bar khor khor yug ri/ /de bzhin ri dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun/ /nam mkha'i ngos kyis phye bar rig nas de/ /
455a2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang / /khams bzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par/ /dpa' bo tshul 'di khong du chud pa dag /mkha'
455a3(mdo sde): las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro / srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag /bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa/ /de yi mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang / /sngon gyi rang
455a4(mdo sde): bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med/ /rang byung ba ni mtshan mchog ma yin yang / /sems kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye/ /sems dang yid ni mtshungs pa dben par gyur/ /rgyal ba
455a5(mdo sde): thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam/ /sngon gyi srid par byang chub spyad spyod cing / /dge ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni/ /byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes
455a6(mdo sde): pa| |grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongs dag ste/ /mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam/ /mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis
455a7(mdo sde): rab shes pa/ /yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur/ /bdag ni gzugs min tshor min 'du shes min/ /sems pa ma yin rnam par shes med kyang / /byang chub khong du chud
455b1(mdo sde): pas bdag lung bstan/ /phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan/ /bzod pa gang zhig gzod ma nas zhi yi/ /skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra min la/ /mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa na//
455b2(mdo sde): mi dbang 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to/ /chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam/ /bdag ni bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhin te/ /stong pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /byang
455b3(mdo sde): chub rtag tu mkha' mnyam rang bzhin no/ /zad par bya phyir zad pa shes mi nus/ /mi zad pa ni zad pas zad mi 'gyur/ /zad pa'i sgo yis chos rnams kun ma skyes/ /bzod dang ldan la sangs
455b4(mdo sde): rgyas lung ston to/ /mtshan med gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de/ /yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las grol/ /ma byas byed du ma bcug byung ba min/ /de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas
455b5(mdo sde): bdag lung bstan/ /gal te bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na/ /chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ba yin/ /sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor ma yin/ /chos sbyor khyad par 'phags
455b6(mdo sde): 'di mtshungs shing mnyam/ /khyed cag thams cad sa yi steng na 'khod/ /bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas/ /sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni/ /srid pa gsum na
455b7(mdo sde): chags med ye shes 'jug / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas steng gi bar snang las babs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag
456a1(mdo sde): btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas ni/ bdag gi ched du byung ngo / /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
456a2(mdo sde): 'das| bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa don ma mchis par ma bgyis te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma bslus pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi
456a3(mdo sde): bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di
456a4(mdo sde): lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par
456a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes
456a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin
456a7(mdo sde): gshegs de'i mtshan ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgyas pa/
456b1(mdo sde): tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
456b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
456b3(mdo sde): ston pa| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
456b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te/ thams cad kyang brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ bzod pa rab tu
456b5(mdo sde): thob pa| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go / de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ lo bye ba phrag drug cu thob par gyur to/ /dge ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
456b6(mdo sde): khams de'ang baiDUR+ya las grub pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang / longs spyod dang / nye
456b7(mdo sde): bar spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan rnam par bzhag pa med par gyur to/ /
457a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i
457a2(mdo sde): slas ni| stong phrag bzhi bcu yod do/ /de'i bu ni/ stong tham pa yod de/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs can/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag
457a3(mdo sde): go / rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po sa 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu la lo bye ba tham par
457a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i chos gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams
457a5(mdo sde): c ad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brten nas bud med
457a6(mdo sde): bzhi stong po de dag dang / bu stong po de dag dang / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /des byang
457a7(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang lo bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo brtul zhugs
457b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas rgyal srid thams cad bor te skra dang / kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas
457b2(mdo sde): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu thu bo re re rgyal por bcug nas pha'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
457b3(mdo sde): ltar na| rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to/ /rgyal po gzhon nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas rgyal bu gzhon
457b4(mdo sde): nu tha chung snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gtogs te/ de ni/ chos kyis rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med par chos dang mthun par dbang byed du bcug go /
457b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar rgyal po sa 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
457b6(mdo sde): phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab tu bzung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
457b7(mdo sde): pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am/ yid gnyis su gyur pa lta na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'di de'i tshe
458a1(mdo sde): de'i dus na rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ da ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
458a2(mdo sde): spyod do| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
458a3(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed tshun chad de'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang /
458a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar gyur to/ /'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par bsgrubs pas 'di la ngas 'di ni/ ma
458a5(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung yang bstan to/ /de nas
458a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
458a7(mdo sde): b com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i rgyu ba nas yun ring du
458b1(mdo sde): lags pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin no/ /ji

458b3(mdo sde): kyi bu| gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyu zad pa/ 'gags pa/ bral ba/ rnam par gyur pa/ rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang / rgyu gang
458b4(mdo sde): dag med pas zad pa/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa'am/ lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas
458b5(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud byung ba dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa'am/ lung du

459a1(mdo sde): ma bstan pa'ang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas pa/ gtan tshigs
459a2(mdo sde): dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ thogs pa med pa'i
459a3(mdo sde): ye shes dang ldan no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

459a5(mdo sde): bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir rang gi khang khyim dang / 'khor gyi khyams de'ang bcom ldan 'das la phul te 'di
459a6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rtag tu 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/ des na/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang
459a7(mdo sde): po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur
459b1(mdo sde): ro| |de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po'i bya dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya bas bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
459b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'am ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs su lags kyang bdag cag ni/ sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs
459b3(mdo sde): sgra dang / glu dang / gar la rab tu chags/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / byug ba dang / phye ma la bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na/ ji ltar bdag cag
459b4(mdo sde): bag mchis par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
459b5(mdo sde): bdag cag la stsal bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bzhin bzad/
459b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir deng phyin chad sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug cu rtsa bzhi byung bar khyed la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe
459b7(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang / dben pa'i sgra dang / mi skye
460a1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra
460a2(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can med pa'i sgra dang / srog med pa'i sgra dang / gang zag med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i
460a3(mdo sde): sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams pa'i sgra dang / snying rje'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang /
460a4(mdo sde): 'ong ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang / rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med pa'i sgra dang / brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i
460a5(mdo sde): sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / rten pa'i sgra dang / rten pa med pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos
460a6(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang
460a7(mdo sde): po'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang / lam gyi sgra dang / zhi gnas kyi sgra dang / lhag mthong gi sgra dang / thabs kyi sgra dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i
460b1(mdo sde): sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / bdud char gcad pa'i sgra dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang /
460b2(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan dang / chu'i zla ba dang / brag ca lta bu'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i
460b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang / dbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / smig rgyu dang / chu shing gi phung po dang / sgyu ma dang / snying po med pa'i sgra dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya
460b4(mdo sde): zhing chos sgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzang dag /de ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las gang gis khyed bag yod par byang chub kyi
460b5(mdo sde): phyogs kyi chos rnams sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur
460b6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang byang chub 'di byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu
460b7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos bstan pa dang / ji tsam du dro bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
461a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ngo / /
461a2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag /de bzhin gshegs pas
461a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi don nyid do/ /de ltar na/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du de dag go cha gang gis sems
461a4(mdo sde): can tshad med grangs med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam du gzung bar 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyon no/ /grogs po dag /rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar nga da
461a5(mdo sde): ltar bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su bzung pa mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad
461a6(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba yin par rig par bya'o/ /grogs po dag /byang chub sems dpa' la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad
461a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis rim gror byas pa ni/ sems can thams cad la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag /byang chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs
461b1(mdo sde): pa ni| sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba nye bar bsgrubs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag /tha na byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rdub
461b2(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to/ /
461b3(mdo sde): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
461b4(mdo sde): d ang | thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan
461b5(mdo sde): 'das la mngon par gtor to/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos 'di snyam du bsam ste bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu
461b6(mdo sde): 'phrul gyis bdag gi gnas nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs pa ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang
461b7(mdo sde): la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de'ang
462a1(mdo sde): bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs na/ de ltar na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong
462a2(mdo sde): pos yid las byung ba lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'phang du dpag tshad lnga pa/ khyon du dpag tshad lnga pa/ kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/ shing sna tshogs kyis
462a3(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ rin po che'i skud pa mig mang ris su bres pa mngon par sprul nas shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng+ge'i khri
462a4(mdo sde): bkra ba| blta na sdug pa/ 'phang du mi bdun yod pa/ ras bcos ma zung brgya stong mang po bkram pa mngon par sprul/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge
462a5(mdo sde): 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon par sprul/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan zhing zhabs 'bring du 'brang ba brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
462a6(mdo sde): ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul to/ /de nas mi 'am
462a7(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la
462b1(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba'i slad du shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan bshams pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs su gsol/ de nas seng+ge'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das
462b2(mdo sde): kyang bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do/ /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rdzu 'phrul
462b3(mdo sde): gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas de nas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad dang / bu brgyad stong po de dag dang /
462b4(mdo sde): gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phrag du ma dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po nyid kyang rin po che'i thag pa thogs
462b5(mdo sde): nas shing rta la btags te nam mkha' las drangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i dkyil nas gshegs pa la mi 'am
462b6(mdo sde): ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bo de dag gis sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs blangs nas mchod pa byed de mdun du dong shing bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
462b7(mdo sde): par bstod do/ /mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po/ /gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag /sil snyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol bgyid cing / /yang dag bsngags pas 'dren la
463a1(mdo sde): bstod pa bgyid/ /mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid gyur/ /gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs/ /bden pa'i yon tan la
463a2(mdo sde): ni rtag gnas pa/ /yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra/ /g.yas g.yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong / /ji ltar ri rab brtan
463a3(mdo sde): zhing mi g.yo ba/ /de ltar khyed kyi sku ni dbal gyis mdzes/ /'dren pa khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ /chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi/ /nam mkha' lta
463a4(mdo sde): bur dag cing dri mi mnga'/ /bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang / /brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha/ /nyi ma zla ba
463a5(mdo sde): skar mar bcas pa'i 'od/ /khyed kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur/ /shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan/ /sems can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas/ /
463a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ /'jig rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba bo/ /bden pa bzhi la sgom
463a7(mdo sde): zhing dpyod mdzad pa/ /rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi stobs kyis bsnyengs mi mnga'/ /sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes/ /bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga'
463b1(mdo sde): zhing | |rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par bzhag / legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang / /khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas ma lags/ /khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu snyan/ /
463b2(mdo sde): zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchi/ /sgra ni sems can gang gis thos gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur/ /sems can kha lo sgyur pa spu gcig tu/ /stong
463b3(mdo sde): gsum rgya mtsho'i cha ba rnams zhugs gyur kyang / /sems can rags pa rnams la'ang mi gnod la/ /rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yong mi gda'/ /stong gsum gyi ni ri bo ri rab dag /phyag
463b4(mdo sde): gcig gi ni mthil du bzhag nas su/ /zhing mang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad kyang / /khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis/ /khyod ni bskal pa brgya phrag bsam yas nas/ /brtul
463b5(mdo sde): zhugs dka' thub tshul khrims yon tan dang / /sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bslabs/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen
463b6(mdo sde): bkur mdzad/ /de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung / /thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ /khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'/ /rim gror ma bgyis zhum
463b7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur zhing / /rim gro bgyis pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags/ /dog sa lta bur snyoms shing mi g.yo ste/ /'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad+ma bzhin/ /chos rnams
464a1(mdo sde): stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang / /chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang / /dbu ba brdos 'dra rmi lam glog 'dra dang / /smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu
464a2(mdo sde): mkhyen| |ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis/ /gdod nas stong zhing mi g.yo rjes ma mchis/ /nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis/ /dngos po bas bar dngos po
464a3(mdo sde): ma mchis 'dra/ /las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las/ /byung ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par/ /tshul 'di rnam par sbyang ba mdzad pas na/ /de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs
464a4(mdo sde): rgyas zhes bgyi/ /gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa/ /de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis/ /de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te/ /srog chags de rnams kyi ni
464a5(mdo sde): rnyed pa lags/ /bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod/ /kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su/ /byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te/ /gang zag mchog
464a6(mdo sde): 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog / nam mkha' la ni dpag tu nus kyang gda'/ /rgya mtsho'i chab ni bas bgyir nus kyang gda'/ /nyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung gda' yi/ /sangs
464a7(mdo sde): rgyas yon tan pas bar 'gyur mi gda'/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing / gser gyi kha
464b1(mdo sde): dog lta bur sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang / 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / bya
464b2(mdo sde): rgod kyi phung po'i ri'ang rab tu khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po'i
464b3(mdo sde): khab kyi grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / grong rdal ba dang / khyim bdag tu bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
464b4(mdo sde): dang | dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
464b5(mdo sde): thogs te bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings par rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /sdong po'i slas
464b6(mdo sde): rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do/ /mi 'am ci mo'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad du grag par gyur to/ /de ltar mi 'am
464b7(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po sdong po dbung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhag go /de nas
465a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen
465a2(mdo sde): po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang shing rta de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
465a3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang
465a4(mdo sde): shing rta de las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong
465a5(mdo sde): dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal ba dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos
465a6(mdo sde): dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas
465a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la sku ma mnyel tam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas phyogs gcig tu
465b1(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po g.yog 'khor dang
465b2(mdo sde): b cas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po 'khor dang bcas pas
465b3(mdo sde): ci zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po slas dang bcas/ bu dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang
465b4(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
465b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du
465b6(mdo sde): skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
465b7(mdo sde): rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi 'am ci'i bdag po sdong po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod
466a1(mdo sde): kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyi/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho bos kyang thob par 'dod do/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos smras pa/ rgyal
466a2(mdo sde): po chen po/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang / sems can thams cad la dbul lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
466a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag gang yang med do/ /rgyal po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni/ ser sna can ma yin te/ de
466a4(mdo sde): dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi bskyed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi bgyid/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal
466a5(mdo sde): po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de'ang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal
466a6(mdo sde): po chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems can la sbyor ba dang / sems can gyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur
466a7(mdo sde): ro| |rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de/ de gnyis las khyod kyis dam pa'i
466b1(mdo sde): chos thos nas des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug gi ling rtog chen pos mtshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byung ba'i sems bsal nas khyod kyis chos la chos kyi snang ba
466b2(mdo sde): chen po thob ste/ chos kyi snang ba des khyod da ltar sgrib pa med pa thob cing gnas pas khyod kyis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems
466b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te ci nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa'ang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu
466b4(mdo sde): gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
466b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan
466b6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na/ chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis gang
466b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i snod
467a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros dang /
467a2(mdo sde): don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
467a3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs
467a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing nyam thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i
467a5(mdo sde): snod snying rje dang / chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug
467a6(mdo sde): pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba dang / mi ltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nyung zhing
467a7(mdo sde): bya ba nyung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu
467b1(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po dang / chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa'i
467b2(mdo sde): snod spong stsa pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba'i
467b3(mdo sde): snod zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spang pa'i snod rten cing 'brel
467b4(mdo sde): par 'byung ba dang / mi 'khrugs shing phyad par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
467b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi snod phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o/ /
467b6(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad
467b7(mdo sde): kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur cig / bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
468a1(mdo sde): kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ khyod kyis 'khor 'di skyo bar 'gyur du 'ong gi /khyod rang gi
468a2(mdo sde): gnas su song zhig / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang yongs su skyo ba de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
468a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpas ni/ skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags/ ji ltar na/ yongs su mi skyo ba lags/ bcom
468a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems
468a5(mdo sde): can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med par thos na skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med
468a6(mdo sde): pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i de dag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par
468a7(mdo sde): bya'o| |mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad
468b1(mdo sde): med pa de'ang bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /zhes
468b2(mdo sde): thos na mi skrag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de bdag gis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa bsags pas
468b3(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub ste/ bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
468b4(mdo sde): na| yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
468b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa la re ba dang / skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa ma yal bar 'dor
468b6(mdo sde): zhing yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu mi 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
468b7(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/
469a1(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dbang ba dang / lus dang
469a2(mdo sde): srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems
469a3(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo
469a4(mdo sde): bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba mthong na yongs su skyo ba dang / bsod nams byed par sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa
469a5(mdo sde): tshol pa la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la mi ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs
469a6(mdo sde): su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
469a7(mdo sde): ste| slong ba la bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed cing zhe sdang ba'i sems med la bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med de tshur shog / legs par 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i
469b1(mdo sde): tshig smra ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams
469b2(mdo sde): kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston cing zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di
469b3(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi
469b4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson
469b5(mdo sde): 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / yon tan chung du tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing gong du mi tshol ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
469b6(mdo sde): na| / yongs su skyo bar reg par bya'o/ /mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
469b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtag tu brtson pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par
470a1(mdo sde): byed par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir de la mi chags pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/ byang chub sems
470a2(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi pa sgrub pa 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la lan btab
470a3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi pa sgrub
470a4(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa 'di thos sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ thos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ khyod byang chub
470a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar spyad par bya'o/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ de
470a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po/
470a7(mdo sde): ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir khyod kyis
470b1(mdo sde): ston cing / /de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos rang gi pi wang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so/ /pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i
470b2(mdo sde): r gyal po sdong po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis pi wang gi sgra de las seng+ge bsgyings pa ltar shing sA la du ma g.yo ba'i sgrar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di
470b3(mdo sde): dag byung ngo / /phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang / /chos thos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag yongs su skyo ba med par spyod/ /bde ba
470b4(mdo sde): spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang / /sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa med/ /brtan pa spyod dang bden pa
470b5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / /bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyod pa yin/ /dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa dang / /dngos po
470b6(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin/ /tshul khrims spyod pa ma nyams spyod pa dang / /lus dang ngag ni
470b7(mdo sde): yongs dag spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag ngan pa'i ngang tshul spyod pa med/ /brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang / /khro skyon yongs su gcod
471a1(mdo sde): pa'i spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gnod sems med par spyod pa yin/ /brtson 'grus spyod dang mthu rnams spyod pa dang / /
471a2(mdo sde): 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin/ /bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyod pa dang / /lus dang

471a7(mdo sde): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag gang du'ang chags pa med par spyod/ /dad pa spyod dang dpa' spyod pa dang / /dran dang g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog
471b1(mdo sde): gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag yongs su gcod pa med par spyod/ /bsam gtan spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang / /mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog

471b4(mdo sde): spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa yin/ /bya ba spyod dang chos rnams sdod pa dang / /mtha' kun yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
471b5(mdo sde): spyod pa| / de dag gang du'ang lta bar spyod pa med/ /dag par spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang / /nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcod spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod

471b7(mdo sde): de dag sgo na lam spyod pa med pa yin/ /nyi ma spyod dang sla ba spyod pa dang / /pad+ma lta bu mgos pa med spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag lhar bcas 'jig
472a1(mdo sde): rten phyag bya ba/ /brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang / /dkar po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /

472a3(mdo sde): spyod pa| |de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med/ /lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang / /shes rab mig ni yongs su dag spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /
472a4(mdo sde): de dag yongs su rtog par spyod pa med/ /dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhi spyod dang / /ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag lha
472a5(mdo sde): dang mi ni mang pos bstod/ /'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang / /g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag
472a6(mdo sde): rtag tu don la 'bab pa yin/ /dpa' bo spyod dang shin tu brtan spyod pa/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'jigs par byed spyod dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag byang

472b1(mdo sde): ma rig spyod pa med/ /dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dpen spyod pa/ /rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin/ /gtso
472b2(mdo sde): bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang / /'jig rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag chung du la ni spyod pa med/ /rigs pa spyod
472b3(mdo sde): dang thabs la spyod pa dang / /bsam gtan bde las ldog par spyod pa dang / /byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ /de dag mi shes spyod pa med pa yin/ /lta ba spyod dang rnam par lta
