472b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags brgyad stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

473a4(mdo sde): rang gi skye bo dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bzod pa gsol
473a5(mdo sde): nas sil snyan dkrol/ me tog gi char phab/ 'od zer gyi dra ba phyung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig
473a6(mdo sde): thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
473a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
473b1(mdo sde): stsal pa| kau shi ka / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos khyod 'ba' zhig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyi/ kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa thob pa ma gtogs
473b2(mdo sde): par gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad
473b3(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zil gyis non to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
473b4(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis non to/ /kau shi ka /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis
473b5(mdo sde): mi non to/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' la zil gyis gnon par sems pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
473b6(mdo sde): dpa' las ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa las ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan
473b7(mdo sde): pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces kye ma'o/ /bdag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las
474a1(mdo sde): nyams so/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu lha'i bu 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus bar gyur te 'dug
474a2(mdo sde): pa des lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yang / 'di ltar gang rab tu dben pa rnam par sgrub par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i
474a3(mdo sde): chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed pa de ni/ sems can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa ma lags/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i
474a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa ma lags te/ phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o/ /yab/ skyon med pa la zhugs te rgyud tshig cing sa bon tshig ste theg pa chen po'i snod du
474a5(mdo sde): ma gyur ba la da bgyir ci mchis/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las lha'i bu stong tham pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
474a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub
474a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bstar pa ni/ bdag la mngon sum du gyur
474b1(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar
474b2(mdo sde): m a mdzad las mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cud zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du

474b4(mdo sde): chos de 'thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od zer spung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od zer srung / byang chub sems
474b5(mdo sde): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i
474b6(mdo sde): chos la bzod par thob par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu zod par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe
474b7(mdo sde): na| 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu/ /byang chub sems dpa'
475a1(mdo sde): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

475a6(mdo sde): rnams la byang chub tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi
475a7(mdo sde): rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / skye mched rnams la byang chub tshol yang skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la
475b1(mdo sde): byang chub tshol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/ 'od zer srung / byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye

475b4(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas chos kyi dbyings su 'du bar shes pa dang / chos

476b1(mdo sde): ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/ blo rgya che zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa/ chos rin po che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems

476b3(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyi ma dang / zla ba'i snang ba

476b5(mdo sde): cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / stong phrag brgya'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba khrag
476b6(mdo sde): khrig brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang ba thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi snang ba

477b1(mdo sde): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyes par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis

477b3(mdo sde): ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i

477b6(mdo sde): brgya'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na/ kun dga' bo/ de la ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang

478a1(mdo sde): gcig bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'ang tshad ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das

480a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos yun ji srid du gnas pa de srid du lha dang / lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin rnams ni/ pham par 'gyur/ lha rnams ni/

481a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnams shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ ta re be/ a re be/ a no be/ sa ra be/ hu lu ma hA hu
481a2(mdo sde): lu| hu lu hu lu/ a bad Te/ bi ka da Te/ pa ra tshe da ni/ ni gr-i ni hA te/ pra g+hA ta ni/ id Ti id Ti/ bid Ti bid Ti/ ad tshe gad tshe/ ma ra ni gra ha na/ sarba pa ra pra
481a3(mdo sde): pA di ni gra ha na/ sarba mi th+ya pra yA/ ta nan ni gra ha na/ sarba b+hU ta gra ha na/ bud+d+ha bar ni ta d+harma ni ya ta sha ya b+hU ta na/ bud+d+ha bar ni ta na/ tsa tur ma hA rA dza nir de sha na/ man+t+ra
481a4(mdo sde): pa la na/ a ba tA ra/ pra k+She Na ni gra hA ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka' stsal
481a5(mdo sde): pa| skyes bu dam pa dag / ngas bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ci nas yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / nub par mi 'gyur bar
481a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir khyed gnyis kyi lag tu bzhag go / gtad do/ /de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya
481a7(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyas par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rigs
481b1(mdo sde): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu
481b2(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
481b3(mdo sde): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chad pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi rlabs lags
481b4(mdo sde): par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las mchi ma zag cing nga ro phyung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
481b5(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te chos bstan pa de la ni/ bdag tha na spu zing des bgyid pa tsam yang ma
481b6(mdo sde): mchis so/ /gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
481b7(mdo sde): cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rton pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pa de bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag nyid rnyis par
482a1(mdo sde): gyur pa snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la phyag brkyang ba stsal du gsol/ gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par
482a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'ang ma gsung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can/ khyod dang mthun pa'i sems can chos zab mo
482a3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu la ma mos pa ni/ mang / gang dag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ nyung gi /mya ngan ma byed/ smre sngags ma 'don cig /sdig can/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa'i
482a4(mdo sde): steng nas rdul blangs pa snyed kyi sems can ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so/ /sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs zab
482a5(mdo sde): mo 'di la ma mos te/ de dag thams cad ni/ khyod dang mthun no/ /sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang mthun gyi/ de bas na/ sdig can dga' bar gyis shig /
482a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med pa ni/ byang chub la yang dag par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos
482a7(mdo sde): la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /dge slong brgyad stong ni/
482b1(mdo sde): nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos
482b2(mdo sde): khyab par gyur te/ lha'i me tog gi char ni/ rab tu bab/ sil snyan brgya stong dag ni/ ma dkrol par rang 'khrol lo/ /lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni/ steng gi bar snang
482b3(mdo sde): la kye ma bdag cag gis dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad
482b4(mdo sde): pa sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa 'di ni/ grong khyer 'khor mo 'jig tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa de bas ches mchog
482b5(mdo sde): go |gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid ba dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang / tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang
482b6(mdo sde): ba'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang
482b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar
483a1(mdo sde): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhugs pa pha rol
483a2(mdo sde): tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub
483a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom
483a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par dga'o/ /'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
483a5(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+d+he dpal gyi lhun po dang / dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
